86b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ni 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /de bzhin ar du gyur pa ste/ /'di ni sgrib pa rnam sel lus/ /a ni chos kyi dbyings nyid du/ /de bzhin du ni nges par 'gyur/ /a las skyes pa sgra rdo rje/ /e las skyes pa reg bya rdo rje/ /ro yi rigs kyi gtso bo nyid/ /a las
86b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pas lus dbye bas/ /oM las skyes pa gzugs rdo rje/ /gyur te de bzhin mi'i bdag po/ /a las skyes pa dri rdo rje/ /dpal gyi bzang mo chos kyi dbyings/ /sgra yi rigs kyi gtso mo dang/ /phyag na rdo rje yi ni gzugs/ /nam mkha' i snying po dri rdo rje//
86b6(rgyud 'grel): ro yi mchog gi rigs gtso dang/ /'jig rten mgon po yang ni zung/ /sa yi snying po gzugs rdo rje/ /reg bya sgrib pa rnam sel dag /zung du yang ni 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar rigs ni drug po dag /rigs rnams yon tan dbang gis ni/ /yang dag par
86b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rig par bya/ /ya la zung gi rim pa yis/ /stobs dang gnod mdzes ma ni zung/ /gsal ba nyid du 'gyur pa yin/ /rarku lkugs dang nga rgyal ma/ /rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin/ /wa dang ra ni 'di nyid las/ /nga rgyal byed pa lkug byed ma/ /
87a1(rgyud 'grel): la yA gnas mdzes brtson 'grus ma/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /shes rab thabs ni yan lag dngos/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig gang la khas phyogs pa'i/ /rdo rje 'chang dpal kun du bzang/ /
87a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur pa yin/ /mi bskyod phyag na rdo rje dang/ /don yod grub pa mkha' snying po/ /dri med nor bu med pa dang/ /yang dag par na sa snying po/ /'khor lo'i phyag dang sgrib sel ba/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /'od dpag med dang
87a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon/ /rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin/ /dpal gyi yum dang chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje dbyings dang sgra rdo rje/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /dpal gyi sgron ma reg rdo rje/ /gos dkar mo'i rigs dbye bas/ /ro yi rdo rje ma nyid do/ /
87a4(rgyud 'grel): ma mA kI dang gzugs rdo rje/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma/ /slar la yang ni stobs po che/ /don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung/ /rin chen phyag las lkug pa nyid/ /rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin/ /'od dpag
87a5(rgyud 'grel): med dang rlom byed ma/ /rengs pa nyid dang rnam snang mdzad/ /rlung dang me dang chu sa las/ /brtson 'grus lag med lkug ma dang/ /nga rgyal can ma rim pa bzhin/ /nges pa kho na gsal bar ni/ /gnod ma rung ni rab tu grags/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni nang
87a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su/ /ston pa lha mo sogs bum pa/ /lhan cig rgyal ba yi ni sku/ /sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku/ /sgra rdor la sogs byang chub sems/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa yi ni mu/ /khro bo rnams ni sprul pa'i sku/ /yon tan gyi ni dbang gis
87a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa/ /sku yi rdo rje zung du 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku dang lhan cig tu/ /sku rdzogs pa yi rgyu ru'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi sku/ /zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /chos rnams
87b1(rgyud 'grel): ston par byed pa yi/ /sems dang longs spyod rdzogs pa yi/ /zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o/ /ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku/ /srog chags rnams la thar ba ster/ zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /shes rab thabs kyi yan lag
87b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos/ /mthun dang mi mthun pa yi rigs/ /nyi zla a ka la sogs pa/ /srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba/ /ye shes rnam shes dbye ba ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /rdo rje gsum ho swA hAr ldan/ /spyi bor mgrin pa snying ga dang/ /lte ba gsang ba spyi bo ru/ /'di
87b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni lus byin brlabs/ /mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po ni/ /lha mo rnams kyi 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phan tshun rdo rje nyid/ /cod pan du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /res dga' sangs rgyas lnga yis ni/ /gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa/ /g.yas pa ru ni pad
87b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur/ /rin chen lce yi pad+ma 'dzin/ /rab mchog nor bu byed pa ni/ /don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan no/ /drug gi cod pan ral pa mdzod/ /yon tan gyi ni dbang gi 'gyur/ /lhag ma 'khor lo gzhan dag go /stong pa
87b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang chos kyi dbyings/ /rigs gsum gyi ni dam tshig dang/ /ye shes mchod pa rjes chags dang/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yi/ /de yi rang bzhin bdag nyid ni/ /sgrub pa po yis mchod par bya/ /du ba la sogs bum pa rnams/ /snying kha
87b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa brgyad rnams kyi dag pa yin/ /rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /spyi bo yi ni lhan cig skyes/ /rtsibs ni bcu drug pa ru grags/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo yi/ /mi'i bdag po nyis 'gyur ni/ /byang chub sems
87b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs dag pa'o/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /nor lha gdengs can gyis sgres pa'i/ /'jigs pa la sogs dag tu'o/ /lag pa rkang pa dag gi tshogs/ /stong pa drug dang me'i grangs/ /las kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dag /blu dang
88a1(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo'i bcu drug rnams/ /sor mo rnams kyi tshigs kyi mtshams/ /bya ba'i 'khor lo dag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dpal dus dag bar/ /me'i bdag por 'gyur pa ni/ /lo dang zla sogs dbye bas so/ /sems kyi snang
88a2(rgyud 'grel): ba snang ba med/ /nyi ma so so'i dbang gis ni/ /sna tshogs yul ni rnam dag pa/ /du ba la sogs rlung dag pa/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lor gnas pa'o/ /drag po chung ma bcas mnan pa/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/ /
88a3(rgyud 'grel): khyab bdag zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/ /bdud mnan bdud tshogs bcom pa'o/ /dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dang/ /ljon shing zhes pa de bzhin du/ /sku'i rdo rje la sogs bzhin/ /bum brgyad lus ni bdud rtsi brgyad/ /rgyal ba rnam par rgyal bum pa/ /
88a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dang rdul bstan pa'o/ /'du byed don yod grub pa ste/ /tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ /'du shes 'od dpag med pa'o/ /gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /khu pa rkang dang khrag dang ni/ /dri chu dri chen rnam
88a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i/ /khams drug rnam dag lha mo drug /yul dang yul can rnam dag pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas/ /khro bo lnga ni stobs lnga nyid/ /gzhan ni dbang po lnga yin no/ /rgan byad la sogs brgyad dang 'khor/ /pad+ma'i
88a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab mar song pa rnams/ /nyi dus chu tshod rnam dag pa'o/ /bden bral la sogs zla bcu gnyis/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar song ba rnams/ /chu tshod kyi ni dbugs grangs tshad/ /klu dang gtum mo rnams gsang ba/ /mi yi bdag po nyis 'gyur ro//
88a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rnams kyis ni dag pa'o/ /de bzhin spyan ma la sogs pa/ /rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis ni/ /lus kyi bya ba dag pa'o/ /sgra rnams grub pa ma lus pa/ /ba spu rnams ni 'byung ba'i tshogs/ /sa yi steng na gnas rnams so/ /de nyid rnams ni
88b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso mtshan tsho/ /rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis ni/ /kham rnams dag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje rnams ni nang phyag rgya/ gtso bo yis ni snying du ni/ /zla stengs yang dag gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje can dpal sna tshogs yum/ /srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba/ /dus gsum ye shes sbyar bas so/ /
88b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dag pa las chos gyi sku/ /chos las longs spyod rdzogs skur 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs las sprul pa'i skur/ /gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag por ni/ /sems can gyi ni don gyi phyir/ /bzhi pa gnas ni nyal ba dang/ /slar la yang ni gzhan ma
88b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ lus kyi dbye bas sad pa'o/ /de ltar lus kyi dbye ba yis/ /srog chags rnams kyis lus la yang/ /rnam pa bzhi ni gnas pa yin/ /sprul pa longs spyod rnams la yid/ /lus dang dbang gi rjes byed ba'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sems
88b4(rgyud 'grel): ste ba/ /rigs kyi dbang gis gyur pa yin/ /chos kyi sku yi gnyid log pa/ /dag pa'i bde bar gyur pa ste/ /'di ni nyin dang mtshan dag gis/ /thig le gsum gyi grol pa'i mthar/ /de yi phyir ni mi 'dzag don/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su ni/ /rnal 'byor
88b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi bsgom par bya/ /g.yon du srog ni rgyas 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin g.yas su rdul ba dang/ /de ni g.yon brkyang gnas pa'o/ /gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /dgu la lag 'gro yis bsnun pa/ /rgan byang la sogs pa yi lha/ /snying po ha yi ye shes
88b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ skad cig ma ru snang ba ste/ /ye shes gzi brjid sad pa'o/ /lte ba la ni rnam snang sogs/ /bsreg cing spyan ma mig la sogs/ /thams cad bsreg nas spyi bor gang/ /zla ba bzang las 'dzag pa ni/ /thig le de ni rdo rje can/ /shes rab chos 'byung la
88b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa/ /slar yang thig le nyid las ni/ /ma lus par ni spras pa dag /sna tshogs pa yi rgyan dang ldan/ /me long nang song lta bu'o/ /ye shes 'khor lo rang 'byung ba/ /'dod pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /srid pa rnam pa gsum zhes pa/ /rim pa yis ni sbyangs
89a1(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /phyi nang ye shes mchod pa ni/ /srid pa gsum ni ma lus pa/ /skad cig gcig gis dgug par bya/ /zla nyi a dang ka la sogs/ /rnam pa gsum du 'gro 'ong ba/ /sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs
89a2(rgyud 'grel): drug /gser ni btso ma'i 'dab ma la/ /sku dang gsung thugs sbyor ba yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma dga' la sogs/ /ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba yi/ /rdo rje gsum ni bsgom par bya/ /shes rab pad+mar sems thig le/ /lhan cig skyes la bde dbang gis/ /mi shigs pa
89a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgom par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa bsdud rtsi lnga la sogs/ /rigs kyi gtso mo bzhi yis ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma las skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi nye bar bskul ba'o/ /dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum//
89a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar de ni mnyam song ba/ /bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o/ /shes rab sbyor ba mi 'dzag gang/ /sgrub pa chen po nyid 'gyur te/ /phra mo yi ni sbyor bas so/ /dang po stong pa'i byang chub nyid/ /de nas thig le zla 'dus pa/ /de nas sku ni bskyed pa nyid/ /
89a5(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog ro yi rigs kyis ni/ /yi ge rnams ni dgod pa nyid/ /'di rnams thun mong bsnyen pa ste/ /rdo rje rnam pa bzhi dang ni/ nang bu ma yi ni sgrub pa'o/ /'di ru thabs ni rnam pa bzhir/ /bsgrub pa'i yan lag de bzhin no/ /so sor sdud pa rnam pa bcu/ /rgyal ba
89a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni dbang por 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsam gtan mi bskyod pa/ /srog dang rtsol ba ral gri can/ /slar la yang ni rnam pa bcu/ /bzung ba rin chen phyag rgya can/ /g.yung mo rjes su dran pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa ru ni 'gyur/ /dpal gyi ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /re re yang
89a7(rgyud 'grel): ni lnga ru dbye/ /slar la yang ni gang dbye ba/ /a la sogs dang ka la sogs/ /so sor sdud pa yul can ni/ /yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams/ /yul la 'jug pa med pa'o/ /shes rab rtog pa dpyod pa rnams/ /dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang/ /bsam gtan sems ni gcig pa'o/ /
89b1(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo 'di ni snang ba gang/ /lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba/ /nam mkha' de ni rjes dran 'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol ba gnyis kyi lam/ /ma 'khrugs pa ru 'gyur ba ni/ /dbu mar srog ni 'jug pa'o/ /thig le ru ni srog 'jug cing/ /gnyis kar 'gro dang 'ong ba
89b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bzung ba nyid ni sems gcig pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /lhan cig skyes pa de dbang gis/ /ye shes sku ni ting 'dzin pas/ /'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis/ /gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sna tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs so/ /phyag
89b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum/ /rnam pa gsum ni srid dbang gis/ /las dang kun rtog bzang mo yis/ /so sor sdud pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yul dang rnam par bral ba dang/ /sngags rnams kyis ni byin brlabs nas/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /
89b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol ba dag pas na/ /zla ba nyi ma dag dang bral/ /byang chub sems dpas mchod par 'gyur/ /bzung ba yis ni stobs kyis ni/ /nyon mongs la sogs bdud bcom zhing/ /stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur/
89b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes dran gyis ni dag par 'gyur/ /dri med 'od 'phro'i dkyil 'khor te/ /gzhan yang ye shes sku las so/ /de phyir dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /so sor sdud la sogs pa yis/ /
89b6(rgyud 'grel): gal te gzir bar ma gyur na/ /sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod mi 'grub/ /sgra la sogs pa'i yan lag ma'i/ /pad+ma rdo rje nor bu ru/ /thig le bzung ba bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyen pa dang po'i sbyor ba ni/ /nam mkha' ru ni rnam pa bcu/ /'khor lo can 'gro blta ba'o//
89b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs ni mthar byed kyang blta pa/ /bdud rtsi'i lam du song ba yang/ /nye ba'i bsnyen po yan lag drug /shes par la sbyor zla thig le/ /gzhan yang rdo rje nor bu ste/ /yi ge gsum ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bde ba ma nyams gcig zhi ba/ /lhan cig skyes
90a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ru ni 'gyur/ /bsgrub chen ye shes sbyor bas so/ /srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni/ /mgo bo'i bar ni phan pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba 'bras ster ba/ /de las steng ni mi phan pa/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'o/ /sems can nyes
90a2(rgyud 'grel): pas bzlog pa'i rgyu/ /gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas su/ /mchog tu bde ba'i gong 'phang du/ /'di ni sbyar bar bya ba nyid/ /phung po med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba la 'jug mod/ /'on kyang 'jig rten grags pa med/ /dbus su srog dang 'jug pa ni//
90a3(rgyud 'grel): yul dang rnam par bral ba nyid/ /sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud pa'o/ /pad+mar bcug pa'i rang rdo rje/ /spros pa las ni de bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i dbus su zhugs par bya/ /sa la ma lhung ba bde ba/ /shin tu chags pa'i chags par song/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba 'di//
90a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dngos grub don gyi phyir/ /mchog tu yang ni khyab pa'i bdag/ //dpal ni gsang las gsang ba yi/ /de ltar yan lag rnam pa bzhis/ /gal te bsgoms pas skyo na ni/ /de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya/ /oM kA la tsakra ya huM hAM swAhA/ oM
90a5(rgyud 'grel): hAM h+riM hAM swA hA/ oM badzra d+hwA twI shwa re huM ho swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha ye swAhA/ oM ratna saM b+ha bA ya swA hA/ oM a smri ta b+hA ya swAhA/ oM bai ro tsa nA ya swAhA/ oM lo tsa nA ya swA hA/ oM mA ma kI ye swA hA/ oM paN+Da rA ye swA hA/ oM tA rA ye swAhA/ oM
90a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA Ni ye swAhA/ oM kha garb+hA ya swAhA/ oM k+Shi ti garb+hA ya swAhA/ oM le ke shwA rA ya swAhA/ oM sarba ni ba ra bi skaM bi ne swAhA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM g+han+ta badzra ye swAhA/ oM rU pa badzra ye swAhA/ oM rA sa badzra ye swAhA/ oM sngar sha badzrya
90a7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM shapda badzra ye swAhA/ oM d+d+harma d+hA tu badzra ye swAhA/ oM big+h+nan+ta kA ya swAhA/ oM pradz+nyan+ta ka ya swAhA/ oM padmA nA kA ya swAhA/ oM ya mAn+ta kA ya swAhA/ de nas bzlas pa skyo ba na/ mchod pa bcu dang sgeg sogs dang/ /chang dang bdud
90b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsis mched nas ni/ /de nas bdud rnams tshar gcod pa'i/ /phreng ba'i sngags kyi bstod par bya/ /oM na mo badzra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bi d+hI satwe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): na mo badzrA grad+he n+d+ra rA dze b+hya(rgyud 'grel): na mo bi shwa mA trai/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA de bIb+hya:na mo badzra DA ki nI b+hya(rgyud 'grel): na mo b+ha ga ba te kA la tsakrA ya/
90b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra b+hai rA ba d+hI kA rA ya/ ma hen+d+ra nI la barna sha rI rA ya/ ma ra kle sha h+ri dA ya/ krAn+ta shi ta rak+ta tsa ra nA ya/ kriSh+Ne dak+ta si ta kaN+DwA ya/ nI la si ta pI ta rak+ta daSh+TrA ka rA lo gra b+hI khaN mu khA ya/ kriSh+Na rak+ta shi ta sa bye ta ra skand+hA ya/ twA da sha b+hu dzA ya/ sha Twi sha ti kA rA ya/ badzra
90b3(rgyud 'grel): kharga tI shU la kArta kri bA Na oM ku sha Da mu ru ka mung+ga ra tsa kra kunda daN+Da pa ra shu badzra g+haN+Ta khe Ta kha TwOM ka pA la tsA pa pA sha ratna ka ma la shaM kha khA darsha brahma shi ro ga dza tsarma d+h+rik+ka rA yA bya g+h+ra tsarma ni ba sa nA ya/ kand+he muN+Da mA lA ba lam bi ne/ shi ra si badzra paTTa mu ku Te ka pA la
90b4(rgyud 'grel): mA lA d+d+ha tsan+d+ra d+ha rA ya/ kuN+Da la ru tsa ka kaNShI kA me kha lA nU pU ra b+hasma ya dz+nyo pa bI ta sho ro ma Ni mahA mu dra nA gen+d+ra bi b+hu Sha NA ya/ badzra Da ki nI san+to Shi tra h+ri sa yA ya/ in+d+ragni ya ma nirra tya ba ru Na bA yu/ ku be re shA na brahma/ piSh+Nu bi nA ya ka kA rti ke ya nandi mahA ka la gra ha na
90b5(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha tra k+She tra pA la/ su ren+d+rA su ren+d+rA pha Nin+d+ra b+hu ten+d+ra na ren+d+ra saM stu ta tsa ra NA ya/ rigs drug bkod pa'i bstod pa dang/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje'i bstod pas bstod/ /de nas mtshan phyed gtor ma sbyin/ /oM oM badzra tsan+d+ra sarba d+harma su bi shud+d+hA sarba d+harma su
90b6(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+hA ya swAhA/ oM A:badzra sUrya sarba d+harma pra bo d+ha ka sarba d+harmAM pra bo d+ha ya swAhA/ oM huM badzrA na la sarba d+harmAM pra dI pa ka sarba d+harmAM pra dI pA ya swAhA/ oM ho sarba d+harma badzrA mri tA ka ra sarba d+harma badzrA mri taM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya yis
90b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma byin rlabs zin nas ni/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi spyan drang bya/ /oM ha hA hi hI badzre b+hai ra bA karSha ya karSha pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ band+d+ha ya band+d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ dza:hUM baM ho:/sarba DA ki nI ni trid yi huM hUM phreM phreM phaT/ de rjes mgron
91a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams byon pa dang/ /lhar bskyed dbang bskur byin brlabs pa'i/ cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs par bya/ /mchod pa rnams dang gtor ma bsngo/ /oM brahma/ biSh+Nu/ nai ri tya/ bA yu/ yA ma/ agni /sa mu dre shwa ra/ in+d+ra yak+She b+hya:sa
91a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ri bA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba liM/ gand+haM/ puShpaM/ d+hU paM dI paM ak+Sha taM da da ma he te tsA ka tya sa pa ri bA ra shI g+h+ra mi daM pa li grih+na du kha dan+tu pi ban+tu dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): san+ti pta sarba satwa nAM shan+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra na gub+hiM kurban+tu huM hUM phaT/ badzra d+ha rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ slar
91a3(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod cing bstod pa dang/ /yig brgyas phrin la so sor bshags/ /gtsug tor du ni rtse lnga pa'i/ /rdo rje ru ni gyur pa yin/ /phyi nas rtse mo nyis 'gyur du/ /gyur pa chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /des ni nyis 'gyur du bsgres pa/ /lhan cig skyes par 'gyur
91a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang/ /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'o/ /de yi nang du rtse gcig go /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma la gnas pa/ /phyag rgya sgom pa'i don du
91a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su ni/ /'dod chags zad don nyid du ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje myang don du/ /sngags pa rnams la gsungs pa nyid/ /nyes par bya ba kho na min/ /nyi ma so so'i dus su ni/ /zas kun bde ba'i don du ste/ /mi 'ju ba yi rgyu
91a6(rgyud 'grel): ru ni/ dpal gyi spyod pa dngos grub rgyur/ /ro bsreg gnas su mtshan mo ni/ /'gro ba rtse ba'i don du min/ /rnal 'byor pa gang srog gcod pa'i/ /nyin dang mtshan du byed pa na/ /de ni srog 'jig pa ru gsungs/ /sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni/ /snying la
91a7(rgyud 'grel): od par rab gyur pa/ /de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar/ /'dzin pa yang ni byed pa gang/ /rnal 'byor par yang de gsungs so/ /bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba/ /gzhan gyi bud med du ni 'gyur/ /bsten pa chags bral
91b1(rgyud 'grel): min pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni/ /ri bong can yang zhu ba'o/ /btung ba chang gi btung ba'o/ /mthe bong tshig nas gtsug tor du/ /chos kyi dbang gi 'gro ba ni/ /nya mthar thug pa rang gi sems/ /gtsug tor nas ni rang gi sems/ /yang ni 'di ni 'gro 'gyur
91b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug bar/ /rnal 'byor ba yi spyod pa des/ /nyi ma re re'i dus su ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/ /spyir dang 'dor ba lus tshad pa/ /mchog gi kha yi pad+ma las/ /tshig mi 'byung zhing gnyid log pa'o/ /'gul dang na dang rdul
91b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /yid ni 'khrul dang brgyal ba ni/ /du ba la sogs rdo rje can/ /de rnams gsal ba rnams pa bcu/ /sog tsan lus kyi gnas skabs so/ /'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /nges pa kho nar gsal ba las/ /su zhig rgyal bar su 'dod pa/ /
91b4(rgyud 'grel): thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang/ /nyin dang mtshan mor lhung ba ni/ /mA ma kI ni de chang ngo/ /go ku la sogs mig la sogs/ /nyi ma re re bzhin spros pa/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba/ /lha rnams dag pa'i lus la'o/ /stong
91b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems de brtson ba yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde ba/ /de ni skye gnas 'khrig pa min/ /nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang/ /bud med sbyor ba yid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzag pa ni tshul khrims so/ /bzod pa sgra sogs mi 'jug pa/ /gnyis kar song ba'i le
91b6(rgyud 'grel): lo ni/ /rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so/ /bsam gtan shes rab sems dang ni/ /bde ba lhan cig par song kun/ /'gro ba thams cad brjed pa'o/ /sems can don du de rdzu 'phrul/ /srid pa'i don ni mi byed pa/ /thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o// //
91b7(rgyud 'grel): dri med blo gros 'od zer gyis ni mun pa thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams/ /skye bos bla ma'i 'dod pa gang zhig dang po de ni gzung bar byas nas su/ /bcings las grol 'dod de ni bdag gis nges grol byas pa'o/ /de ltar dag pa dri med gang yin de
92a1(rgyud 'grel): yis rtag tu 'gro ba'i yid/ /dus 'khor zhabs zhes de la gnas pa'i go 'phang rtag tu bsam gyur cig// //dus kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs dus kyi zhabs chen pos mdzad pa
92a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta bi shwa sh+rI dang/ lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//) // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI nak+Sha tA
92a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la sA d+ha na me ka da sAM ga nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba/ dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /nyin
92a4(rgyud 'grel): mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu/ /pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /lha yi mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi/ /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bri/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis/
92a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nas bshad pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rten dang yo byad bsams nas ni/ /dngos grub yan lag bcu gcig bsgom/ /bsrung dang kha sogs dag pa dang/ /bdag nyid dag bya bdag bsrung dang/ /tshogs gnyis bsags dang dkyil 'khor bskyed//
92a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyi brlabs dang dbang bskur dang/ /phra mo'i thig le'i rnal 'byor dang/ /mchod bstod rjes kyi bya ba'o/ /cho ga de dag re re la'ang/ /cho ga dang ni ting 'dzin dang/ /nga rgyal bzung ba gsum gsum mo/ /dang por tho rangs sngar langs nas/ /
92a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ rol mos gnyid sad pa ru bsams/ /thal sbyar sngags 'dis phyag bya'o/ /oM sarbbA bI ra yo gi nI na ma(rgyud 'grel): kA ya bak+tsit+ta praN me banda ni ka ro yA mi/ de nas khams bsangs maN+Dal bya/ /me tog tsham bu
92b1(rgyud 'grel): lha grangs bzhin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rten yang dgod/ /mchod pa rnams dang rol mo dang/ /gtor ma dag kyang bsham par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje shugs su bsgom/ /spyi bo sogs su yi ge dgod/ /rdo rje bsams la bka' sgo ba/ /hUM lus dag sems la
92b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus 'di yis/ /sku gsum las byung bkos par bya/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das nas/ /zhig 'gyur 'di la
92b3(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med/ /rdo rje 'bar ba bde chen po/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i la sogs 'dis/ /brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /gnas 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs/ /rdo rje rnams la me dpung 'bar/ /sngags 'dis bgegs rnams sreg bar byed/ /oM A:
92b4(rgyud 'grel): huM ho haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): h+rA(rgyud 'grel): h+rA(rgyud 'grel): h+rA(rgyud 'grel): h+rA(rgyud 'grel): ra ra ra ra/ badzrA na la sarbbA pa ra Na d+harmA pra la ya swA b+ha ba mA ra kA yi ka big+h+na bi nA yA kA dI nAM/ dA sha dig+ga tA nAM kA ya bAk+tsit+tA naM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hasmI ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT zhes pas bdud rnams bsreg par bsam/
92b5(rgyud 'grel): oM A:huM ra badzra tsan+d+ra sUrya rA hu la kA lA gnA ya/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na prA kA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /bdag nyid sa dang rtsig pa bzhi/ /steng du mnga' yi dra ba ni/ /tho rangs grib ma'i bar du bsgom/ /yang na gnam sa 'byor
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ro/ /oM huM pa sha kA ya badzra kU TA gA raM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pas me dpung ra pa bsgom/ /oM hAM yAM rAM bAM laM badzra kA sha bo te dzo ra ka pri thi bi badzra swA b+hA ba pany+tsa d+hA tu b+hu badzra maN+Da la ni ku ru ku ru swAhA/ 'byung ba lnga brtsegs gyur pa las/ /ra ba sum
92b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan gzhal yas khang/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsam/ /oM pa(rgyud 'grel): bi shwa badzra pad+maM ku rA ku ru swAhA/ oM ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra sUrya badzra sUrya sa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pas gdan rnams bsam par bya/ /oM huM kro d+he n+d+ro hAM kro d+hA nA mAdz+nyA dA ya ka
93a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ dbus su rdo rje shugs khro bo/ /'chad par 'gyur bar bdag nyid bsam/ /oM hi badzra kro d+ha rA dza ma hA uSh+NI Sho d+ha di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM yaM badzra kro d+hA rA dzA tri pa la big+hAn+thA ka purba di shir k+ShaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM raM badzra kro d+ha rA dza dzaM
93a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ka duShA pra dz+nyAn+ta ka rak+Sh+NAM di shi ra k+Shi ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM waM badzra kro d+ha rA dzi ma na ka bI ra ga padmAn+ta kot+ta rir shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM laM badzra kro d+he rA dza stam+b+ha ka ya mAn+ta ka pa shtsi ma di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM wA(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dza ma hA ba la bA ya byI
93a3(rgyud 'grel): di sha ra NAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM wA(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dzA tsa le shAndi shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dza Tak+ki nai ri tyAM de shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM ya(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dza nI la daN+Da agne yyAM di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM hA(rgyud 'grel): badzra
93a4(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha rA dza sum b+hA d+ho di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ sngar gyi rdo rje shugs kyis ni/ /dbang po'i bu ga so so las/ /khro bo bcu dag spros nas ni/ /rang rang phyogs su gdan dgod do/ /da dA nyi nyI Nri NrI mu mU nli nlI/ sngar bzhin zad par bcu yang spro/ /
93a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi ra ba'i phyi rol bsrung/ /g+ha g+hA dzhi dzhI Dh+ri Dh+rI b+hu b+hU d+hli d+hI/ de bzhin phyogs skyong bcu yang spro/ /gsung gi ra ba'i nang du bsrung/ /ga gA dzi dzI Tri TrI pu pU dli dlI/ de bzhin bza' bcu spros nas ni/ /de yi phyi rol bkod la bsrung/ /kha
93a6(rgyud 'grel): khA/ tshi tshI Thi ThI phu phU thli thlI/ de bzhin klu rgyal bcu yang spro/ /sku yi ra ba'i nang du bsrung/ /ka kA tsi tsI Tri TrI pu pU dli dlI/ 'byung po bcu yang spros nas ni/ /de yi phyi rol bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta rak+Sha tsakra swa b+hA bAt+ma
93a7(rgyud 'grel): konyahaM/ sngags kyi nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lor yan lag ste dang po'o// //bdud rtsi lnga dang stobs lnga yi/ /ri lu sran chung tshang tsam bya/ /yaM raM kaM go ku da ha na bi mu ma ra shu/ rlung me thong par bcu
93b1(rgyud 'grel): po bsam/ /oM badzra tsan+d+ra sarbba d+harmA su bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba sarba d+harma npi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ zla ba oM kyi dag par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sUrya sarbba d+harmmA bra bo d+ha ka sarbba d+harmmAnpa bo d+hA ya swAhA/ nyi ma A:yi 'od kyi spel/ oM huM badzrA na la sarbba d+harmmA pra di pa kA sarbba d+harmmA nA pra dI pa ka ya swAhA/ sgra
93b2(rgyud 'grel): gcan hUM gi 'bar bar bya/ /oM ho sarba d+harmmA badzrA mri ta ka ra sarbba d+harmmA nA badzrA mri ta ku ru ku ru swAhA/ dus me ho yis bdud rtsir bsam/ /rang nyid lce rtse hUM yig las/ /rdo rje gyur te 'od 'phros pas/ /bdud rtsi bkug ste myangs par bsams/ /oM sarbba bI ra yo gi ni pra Na yA mi
93b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ gtsug tor steng du paM las ni/ /zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje dkar/ /paM gi mtshan bzhi rgyas la/ /las gzhan dag la nye sogs sbyar/ /oM A:huM ho/ haM k+Sha pradz+nyo pA ya/ At+ma ka kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na/ a d+hi pa ti/ ma mA kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrAM badzraM mri taM swA b+hA gi ku ru ku ru band+ha d+hA bya? yA nya ? ni?
93b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hA baM swAhA rdo rje la sogs zhu ba'i chus/ /lus kyi dri ma thams cad dor/ /zhi ba zla ba lta bur dkar la dag par bsgom/ /las gzhan rang rang kha dog go /swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sarbba d+harmma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ des dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o/ /bdag nyid dus 'khor
93b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis yum dang ldan pa yi/ /dpral bar oM las mdza' yas bsam/ /mgrin par A:las rin 'byung bsam/ /snying gar hUM las don yod grub/ /lte bar ho las rnam snang mdzad/ /gtsug tor haM las mi bskyod pa/ /gsang bar k+Sha las rdo rje sems/ /rigs drug po ni
93b6(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya/ /a i ri u li a e ar o al ha ya ra la wa la/ lag g.yon sor me'i tshigs gsum la'o/ /lA wA rA yA hA/ A la aau Ar i A/ lI a'u rI/ a'i A g.yas pA sor tshigs gsum la dgod/ oM h+ra(rgyud 'grel): sarbbAstra ra/ dzA mA ra kle shAnd+ha ka ra/ badzra tik+Sh+Na du:kha tshe da ma ma ka ra
93b7(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha ya swAhA/ lag pa'i yi ge rdo rjer 'gyur/ /oM A:huM he ha k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): kA ya bAk+tsit+tA d+hi pa ti/ badzra kA ya ma ma kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na badzra badzra kA ya swa b+ha paM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ mdzes pa'i phyag rgya kun tu reg /rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus su bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kA ya swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ rdo rje'i
94a1(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /bdag dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o// //de nas lag pa thal sbyar te/ /oM h+rAM h+ri da ya na ma/ oM h+rlaM shi ra si wa shaT/ oM h+rrAM shi kha ya wa shaT/ oM h+rluM ka ba tsa ya hUM/ oM h+ra Ne tra bo ShaT/ oM h+ra(rgyud 'grel): aSh+Ta ya phaT/ go cha dang ni mtshon
94a2(rgyud 'grel): cha'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya shi ra si si kha(rgyud 'grel): ka ba tsa ne twASh+Ta badzra sha DAM ga swa b+ha bAt+ma konyahaM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /go cha'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o/ /rang gi snying gar paM las ni/ /pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng/ hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer lnga ldan
94a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur spro/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal sras rnams/ /spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs/ /'od zer slar la snying gar bsdu/ /zla dkyil ka sogs sde tshan drug /ring thung brtsegs pa bcu gnyis las/ /mchod rdzas lha mo gyur pa spro/ /oM ts+tsh+dzdzh+nya badzra gand+he gand+ha a tsa nAM ku ru ku
94a4(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ oM ts+tsh+dzdzh+nyA badzra ma le mA lA rtsa ni ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM TThDDh+NA badzra d+hu pe d+hU pA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM TTDDh+NA badzra pra dI pre pa dI pArtsa ni ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM p+phbb+hma badzra mri te nai bidya pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM p+phbb+hmA badzra k+Sha te k+Sha ta pha lArtsa ni ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+na badzra la sye sa b+hA b+ha ra Na
94a5(rgyud 'grel): pu dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+nA badzra ha sye g+ha Na TA darsha pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+nga badzra wA dya wa dya pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+ngA badzra nri/ tye nri tya pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM skpShshth+ka badzra gI te gI tA pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM skpShshth+kA badzra ka me sarbba bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi swA
94a6(rgyud 'grel): twA nAM kro d+hA di nA badzra su ra ta pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ /sna tshogs mchod pa byas te sdig pa rnam pa mang po bshags bgyis la/ bsgrub pa pos ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bas gsum la gus su mchi bar bgyi/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang
94a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs dge ba gang byas pa'i dge 'dun dang de dag kun la rjes su yi rang nas ni sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su 'jug /sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs
94b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gsol/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dag la byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ 'dir ni sems can don phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag 'gyur smon lam gdab par bgyi/ bsod nams rtsa ba gsum sogs dran/ /ye shes
94b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni stong nyid bsgom/ /phyi dang snod bcud thams cad ni/ /dngos dang bral bas stong pa nyid/ /rgyud la 'das pas mtshan ma med/ /'bras bu med pas smon pa med/ /skye 'gag med pas 'dus ma byas/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/
94b3(rgyud 'grel): oM a ni mi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko ho/ oM a na b+hI saM skA ra dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs/ /thig le'i bdag nyid skar mda' bzhin/ rim pas bsdus te 'dzin med par/ /sa chu me rlung
94b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i khams/ /rang bzhin shugs pas yul dang bral/ /kun gzhi rnam shes 'od gsal bsgom/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta thU n+ya tya dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ de yi nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o/ /tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o// //de nas stong nyid
94b5(rgyud 'grel): dang las ni/ /nyi steng sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje dra gur rtsibs bcu yi/ /lte bar a las chos 'byung ngo/ /h+k+Sh+mlwryaM hUM yaM hUM/ hUM raM hUM/ hUM baM hUM/ hUM laM hUM/ hUM maM hUM/ hUM k+ShaM hUM/ hUM haM hUM/ rlung gnag zlum po rgyal mtshan can/ /me dmar gru gsum g.yung
94b6(rgyud 'grel): drung mtshan/ /chu dkar zlum po pad+mas mtshan/ /sa gser gru bzhi 'khor los mtshan/ /de dag steng dang 'og tu yang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya gram mo/ /de stengs lhun po kha khyer ldan/ /nyi zla pad+ma sgra gcan bcas/ /de steng oM mam bruM las ni/ /gzhal yas khang
94b7(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs mchod rten ni/ /rin chen rang bzhin gru bzhi ni/ /rin chen snam bu pha gru dang/ /dra ba dra phyed mnga' yab dang/ /sgo dang rta babs bcu gnyis dang/ /re khA gsum dang lnga po gnyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /snying po ye shes 'dab ma dag /rdo rje
95a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /phyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ pang sogs ka ba bcu drug dang/ chu skyes rdo rjer bas mdzes/ /lha yi snam bu dag gis bskor/ /de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa brgyad//
95a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor la/ /pang 'dab bzhi brgyad bcu drug pa/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor/ /phyi rol gling ni bcu gnyis dang/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che/ /rnga bo che dang
95a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shing/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor/ /dbus kyi pad+ma lte ba'i steng/ /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dang/ /bdud dang drag po yab yum dang/ /bdud ni gdong cig kha dog dmar/ /lag bzhi mda' dang lcags kyu ga-yas/ /g.yon pa gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin/ /
95a4(rgyud 'grel): yum ni dga' mo dang bcas ga-yas/ /drag po gdong gsum mdog dmar po/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha TwAM 'dzin/ /dbu ma'i yum bcas g.yon du gdeng/ /de steng mngon par byang chub pa/ /a i ri/ u le/ a e al o al/ ha ya ra wa la i A(rgyud 'grel): lA
95a5(rgyud 'grel): pA rA yA hA/ Al/ aau Ar/ lI a'u rI a'i A/ zla ba yi ge mtshan pa steng/ /me 'ong ye shes dang po'o/ /l+la wwa/ yya/ Dd+ha Dd+hha/ l+la wwA/ rra yya hha/ ssa nypnypha? 95a6(rgyud 'grel): dza tsha tsa/ Na Dha Da Tha Ta/ ma b+ha ba pha pa/ na d+ha da tha ta/ th+ka sha Sha nypa sa/ la pa ra ya ha/ /la pa ya Da Dha nyi ma yi ges mtshan pa 'og /mnyam nyid ye shes gnyis pa'o/ /bar du dri za'i yi ge hUM/ so sor rtog pa gsum pa'o/ /hi yig
95a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig gyur rdo rjer gyur/ /bya grub ye shes bzhi pa'o/ /phaT kyi sha chas yongs su rdzogs/ /chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o/ /gtso bo sku mdog sngon po la/ /kha dog phyogs bzhi dag tu gsungs/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni nyer bzhi pa/ /mgrin gsum
95b1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gnyis brkyang bzhugs pa/ /dbus zhal mthing ga mche gtsegs drag /g.yas pa dmar po chags pa che/ /g.yon pa dkar po zhi ba'i zhal/ /rgyab ni ser po ting 'dzin bzhugs/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs bcu gnyis spyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dang/ rdo rje
95b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dbu brgyan pa'o/ /glang chen stag lpags na bza' can/ /mgrin gsum gnag dmar dkar po'o/ /dpung pa drug ni sngo dmar dkar/ /phyag dar bcu gnyis de bzhin no/ /phyag mgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /gnag dmar dkar po'i rim pa bzhin/ /
95b3(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu/ /ser dkar dmar gnag snga rims bzhin/ /tshigs kyi phreng ba sngo dmar dkar/ /rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang/ /gri gug mnga' dang lcags kyu dang/ /Da ru tho ba 'khor lo mdung/ /dbyug pa dgra sta g.yas pas 'dzin/ /dril bu
95b4(rgyud 'grel): phub dang kha TwAM ga /thod pa gzhu dang zhags pa dang/ /rin chen pad dkar dung dang ni/ /me long lcags sgrog tshangs mgo ga-yon/ /cod pan snyan cha mgul rgyan dang/ /gdu bu dpung rgyan ska rags dang/ /zhabs gdub rnams ni rdo rjes brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba do shal dang/
95b5(rgyud 'grel): thal ba phreng ba gtsug nor bu/ /klu chen bcu yis de bzhin brgyan/ /g.yon dkar g.yas dmar brkyang pa'i zhabs/ /yum ser zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab zhal gnag /gri gug lcags kyu DA ma ru/ /phreng ba g.yas pas 'dzin
95b6(rgyud 'grel): pa mdzad/ /thod pa zhags pa pad+ma dang/ /rin chen nor bu g.yon na 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams gtso bo dag dang mthun/ /g.yon brkyang gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud/ /de nas 'khor lo drug po la/ /oM A:hUM ho haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /de nas 'gro drug sems can rnams/ /
95b7(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas dkyil 'khor de la gzhug /yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs te/ /snyoms 'jug sgra yis rnam snang sogs/ /nang du bkug nas bzhugs par bsam/ /yab yum byang chub sems kyis ni/ /b+ha gar de la dbang bskur bya/ /
96a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can de rnams dkyil 'khor lta/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sogs su gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /mchog dga' i bde bas gang bar bsam/ /k+Sha k+ShaM k+Sh+rI k+Shu k+Shli/ k+ShA k+ShI k+Sh+rI k+Shu k+ShlI/ k+Sha k+She k+Shar k+Shu k+Sh+yal k+Shi:
96a2(rgyud 'grel): ?k+Sha Nai k+ShAra? k+Sh+rOo klAl k+ShaM k+Shha k+Sh+ya k+Sh+ra k+Shpa k+Shla/ k+ShhA k+Sh+mA k+Sh+rA k+ShlA k+ShlA/ de sogs lus kyi dkyil 'khor lha/ /phyung la dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /spyi mgrin snying gar oM A:hUM/ gtsug tor haM bsams lte ba du/ /ho las gtum mo ye shes 'od/ /rab 'bar gtso bo yab
96a3(rgyud 'grel): yum gnyis/ bde chen 'od du zhu ba las/ /tshad med bzhi yi lha mi'i glus/ /'gro ba'i don du gzhengs pas bskul/ /spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor
96a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhengs la bdag chags mdzod/ /bdag ni srin mo mA ma kI/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor gzhengs la bdag chags mdzod/ /gos dkar bdag ni bu mo ste/ /rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bu'i
96a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag cag mdzod/ /sgrol ma bdag ni cha mo ste/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dri med gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags
96a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /lha mos klu mdzad bcom ldan khyod/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ /rdo rje can gyis bdag bsrungs mdzod/ /lha mo'i bla mas 'dod can 'dod pa mdzad don bzhengs/ /de ltar bskul ba gsan nas ni/ /chos sku stong pa'i rang
96a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin las/ /mig 'phru lta bu bzhengs mdzad de/ /hUM pheM spro zhing bskul bas zhu/ /rdo rje dang ni gri gug hUM du gyur/ /de bzhin gtso bo yab yum bzhengs/ /de nas 'khor gyi lha spro'i phyir/ /rdo rje pad+mar byin brlabs la/ /thabs dang shes
96b1(rgyud 'grel): rabs snyoms 'jug sgras/ /chos kyi dbyings nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /bkug la yab kyi zhal du thim/ /b+ha ga gnas rgyud yum gyi ni/ /pad+mar zhugs te b+ha gar brgyud/ /yum gyi zhal nas yab zhal du/ /zhugs nas yab kyi rdo rje nas/ /sa bon yum gyi pad+ma ru/ /
96b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge spros nas phyogs phyogs gnas/ /de nas phyag mtshan de las sku/ /de la phyir spros gdan la dgod/ /a dang rdo rje las gyur pa/ /mi skyod zhal gsum phyag drug sngo/ /spros nas slar yang gtso la thim/ /rdo rje dbyings phyug sku mdog sngo/ /spros nas slar yang gtso bor
96b3(rgyud 'grel): thim/ /snying po ye shes 'khor lo yi/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad zla ba'i steng/ /a a/ aM a(rgyud 'grel): ha hA/ hi ha(rgyud 'grel): lha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad de/ /shar du nag mo 'bar ma ste/ /sku dang mdun gyi zhal mdun gnag /g.yas dmar g.yon dkar rgyab ser zhal/ /spos
96b4(rgyud 'grel): dang tsan dan gur gum snod/ /bla ba ga bur ldan snod g.yas/ /dril bu pad+ma lha shing gi /me tog dang ni phreng ba g.yon/ /nub tu ser 'bar mdun zhal ser/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab sngo zhal/ /dung dang nor bu gling bu dang/ /Da ma ru ni phyag g.yas na/
96b5(rgyud 'grel): pi wang rgyud mangs dang ni mda'/ /dril bu 'khrol dang ra dang g.yon/ /byang du dkar 'bar dbus zhal dkar/ /g.yas gnag g.yon ser rgyab zhal dmar/ /'o ma'i snod dang chu snod dang/ /lha'i sman dang chad snod g.yas/ /bdud rtsi'i snod dang
96b6(rgyud 'grel): grub ba'i bcud/ /a ru ra dang 'bras zan g.yon/ /lho ru dmar 'bar dbus zhal dmar/ /g.yas ser g.yon sngo rgyab dkar zhal/ /mar me mu tig do shal dang/ /cod pan gdu bu phyag g.yas na/ /na bza' dang ni sku regs dang/ /rna cha dang ni rkang rgyan
96b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon/ /shar lhor du ba nag mo dang/ /nub byang mar me ser mo dang/ /byang shar mkha' gsal dkar mo dang/ /lho nub mig rgyu dmar po bzhi/ /zhal ni phyogs bzhi'i lha mo mtshungs/ /phyag brgyad thams cad rnga yab bsnams/ /mnyam brgyad pa
97a1(rgyud 'grel): yi stabs kyi bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gi yab/ /yum ni pad+ma'i bzhugs stabs so/ /mtshams kyi gru chad bzhi dag la/ /oM A:huM ho/ chos kyi dung dkar byang shar du/ /gaN+DI dmar po lho nub mtshams/ /shar lhor yid
97a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu gnag /dpag bsam shing ser byang nub po/ /'dod ma log ma bdun cu gnyis/ /phyogs na bco brgyad 'gyid bag can/ /'khyud pa'i stobs kyis phyag sbrel nas/ /kha khyer la gnas mchod par byed/ /de nas thugs kyis pad+ma la/ /phyogs
97a3(rgyud 'grel): la nyi ma gdan dag la/ /i ri/ u li/ shar du don yod grub pa gnang/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan dmar/ /byang du snang ba mdza' yas dkar/ /nub tu rnam par snang mdzad ser/ /mtshams su zla ba'i gdan dag la/ /a'i rI a'u lI/ shar lhor sgrol ma

97b5(rgyud 'grel): can/ /pad+ma mthar byed rmugs byed ma/ /gshin rje mthar byed brtson 'grus ma/ /yab bzhugs de ru yum 'khyud cing/ /yum bzhugs sa ru yab 'khyud pa'o/ /kha khyer mchod pa'i lha mo dang/ /'dod lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de nas gsung gi

98a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo/ /rgyal byed dpal ldan 'khor lo can/ /nag mo 'khor lo dbyug tho g.yas/ /pad+ma dung ni g.yon na'o/ /lho ru ma he pad+ma'i steng/ /ha h+ri ra ri rri h+ri ru ri rli raM/ lte bar phag mo 'dab ma la/ /keng rus dus mtshan rab

98a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mnga' ni g.yas/ /dril bu gzhu ni g.yon na'o/ /byang nub dang pa pad+ma'i steng/ /k+ShA tAM lA lrI k+ShlI lu l+lI lA(rgyud 'grel): lte bar tshangs ma 'dab ma la/ /gtsang sbra ma dang pad+ma'i mig /chu skyes can dang blo gros ma/ /ngag dbang glu ma kleg dran ma/ /ser mo pad+ma

98b3(rgyud 'grel): nya nyI nyri nyu nyli nyaM/ dzha dzhi dzh+raM dzhu dzhli dzaM/ dza dza dzri dzu dzli dzaM/ tsha tshi tsh+ri tshu tshli tshaM/ tsa tsi tsri tsu tsli tsaM/ dbus su bden bral dzI rdo rje/ /'dab mar rim par nya rdo rje/ /nyi rdo rje dang ni nyi rdo rje/ /nyu rdo rje dang ni nyI rdo rje/ nyaM rdo rje dzhi rdo rje/ dzha rdo rje dang/ dzhi rdo rje/ dzhu rdo rje dzhI rdo rje/ dzhi rdo rje la sogs pa

98b7(rgyud 'grel): tsa rdo rje sogs sum cu'o/ /dmar po pad+ma mdung thung ga-yas/ /rin po che dang me long ga-yon/ /byang smad chu srin pad+ma'i steng/ /ma mi mri mu mlaM maM/ /b+ha b+hi b+h+ri b+hu b+hli baM/ ba bi bri bu blI baM/ pha phi phri phu phli phaM/ pa pi pri pu pli paM/ lte bar rgya mtsho dri rdo rje/ ma rdo rje sogs
99a1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu po/ /dkar po zhags pa rin chen g.yas/ /gru zhags chu shel g.yon na'o/ /byang shar byi ba pad+ma'i steng/ /pA pE prI pU plI pa(rgyud 'grel): phA phI phrI phu phlI phA(rgyud 'grel): bA bI brI bU blI bA(rgyud 'grel): b+hA b+hI b+h+rI b+hU b+hlI b+hA(rgyud 'grel): mA mI mrI mU mlI mA(rgyud 'grel): lte ba tshogs bdag
99a2(rgyud 'grel): pri rdo rje/ pA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /dkar po dgra sta rdo rje g.yas/ /zhags pa rin chen nor bu g.yon/ /nub smad glang chen pad+ma'i steng/ /na ni nrI nu nli naM/ d+ha d+hI d+h+ri d+hu d+hli d+haM/ da di dri du dli daM/ tha thi th+ri thu thli thaM/ ta ti trI tu tli taM/ lte bar brgya byin dri rdo rje//
99a3(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /ser po g.yas pa rdo rje mda'/ /dril bu gzhu ni g.yon na'o/ /nub byang dang po pad+ma'i steng/ /tA tI trI tU tlI tA(rgyud 'grel): thA thI th+rI thU thlI thA(rgyud 'grel): dA dI drI dU dlI dA(rgyud 'grel): d+hA d+hI d+h+rI d+hU d+hlI d+hA(rgyud 'grel): nA nI nrI nU nlI nA(rgyud 'grel): lte bar tshangs pa dri rdo rje/ tA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /
99a4(rgyud 'grel): ser po khab dang dgra bsgreng g.yas/ /pad+ma ril pa spyi blugs g.yon/ /shar stod mkha' lding pad+ma'i steng/ /nga ngi ngri ngu ngli ngaM/ g+ha g+hi g+h+ri g+hu g+hli g+haM/ ga gi gri gu gli gaM/ kha khi khri khu khli khaM/ ka ki kri ku kli kaM/ lte bar khyab 'jug
99a5(rgyud 'grel): dri rdo rje/ nga rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /sngon po 'khor lo dbyug tho g.yas/ /pad+ma lnga skyes dung ni g.yon/ /lho stod ma he pad+ma'i steng/ /kA kI krI kU klI kA(rgyud 'grel): khA khI khrI khU khlI khA(rgyud 'grel): gA gI grI gU glI gA(rgyud 'grel): g+hA g+hI g+h+rI g+hU g+hlI g+hA/ ngA ngI ngrI ngU nglI ngA(rgyud 'grel): lte bar gshin rje dri rdo rje
99a6(rgyud 'grel): ka rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /sngon po dbyug pa ral gri g.yas/ /lcags sgrog zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /byang stod khyu mchog pad+ma'i steng/ /th+ka th+ki th+kri th+ku th+kli th+ka/ sha shi sh+ri shu shli shaM/ Sha Shi Sh+ri Shu Shli ShaM/ nypa nypi nypri nypu nypli nypaM/ sa si sri su sli saM/ lte ba
99a7(rgyud 'grel): drag po sh+ri rdo rje/ th+ka rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /ljang gu g.yas pa rtse gsum mda'/ /g.yon pa sbrul bcas kha TwAM gzhu/ /nub stod glang po pad+ma'i steng/ /sA sI srI sU slI sA(rgyud 'grel): nypA nypI nyprI nypU nyplI nypA/ ShA ShI Sh+rI ShU ShlI ShAM(rgyud 'grel): shA shI sh+rI shU shlI
99b1(rgyud 'grel): shA(rgyud 'grel): th+kA th+kI th+krI th+kU th+klI th+kA(rgyud 'grel): lte bar gnod sbyin Sh+rI rdo rje/ sa sogs rdo rje sum cu po/ /sngon po rin chen be con g.yas/ /ne'u le rkyal pa pad+ma g.yon/ /rdo rje skyil krung phyed par bzhugs/ /shar sgor phag gi shing rta dang/ /lho sgor rta dang byang seng ge /nub sgor glang chen shing rta'o//
99b2(rgyud 'grel): yaM raM waM laM/ la(rgyud 'grel): wa(rgyud 'grel): ra(rgyud 'grel): ya(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog ma dang dbyug sngon shar/ /nag mo ral gri rdo rje g.yas/ /phub dang sbrul zhags g.yon na'o/ /khro gnyer can dang 'dong rgyal lho/ /dmar po mda' dang lcags kyu g.yas/ /gzhu dang zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /skul byed ma dang mi
99b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo byang/ /dkar mo tho ba mdung g.yas na/ /pad+ma me long g.yon na'o/ /'od zer can dang stobs chen nub/ /ser mo 'khor lo dbyug pa g.yas/ /dung dang rin chen g.yon na'o/ /khro mo'i stabs ni sngar bshad zin/ /kha khyer la ni 'od mdog go /rta babs ka ba brgyad kyi 'og /
99b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la/ /hya hyA h+ra h+rA hwa hwA hla hlA/ nag mo stobs rgyu pad+ma shar/ /dmar mo nor rgyas dung skyong lho/ /dkar po mdza' yas rigs ldan byang/ /ser po 'jog po pad chen nub/ /bdud rtsi bum pa rdo rje g.yas/ /pad+ma rin chen g.yon na'o/ /de nas dur khrod
99b5(rgyud 'grel): ming dang gdan/ /shar du rtse gsum bse yi gdan/ /shar lhor mi zang b+hi ruN+Da/ /lho ru ro bsreg dom gyi gdan/ /byang du rus sbal g.yag gi gdan/ /byang shar byis shir pha wang gdan/ /nub tu rul ba'i drir seng ge /nub byang rus sbal zos mig sngon/ /de rnams steng du 'khor lo yi/ /
99b6(rgyud 'grel): k+kh+g+g+h+nga ts+tsh+dzdzh+nya wwryk+Sha TThDDh+Na lwryha p+phbb+hma snypShshth+ka t+th+d+d+h+na/ khyi gdong bya rog gdong ma gnag /phag gdong bya rgod gdong ma dmar/ /stag gdong 'ug gdong ma gnyis dkar/ /ce spyang mkha' lding gdong ma ser/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa bsnams/ /rol pa'i stabs kyi gnas pa'o/ /
99b7(rgyud 'grel): rgan byad brgya byin yab yum yin/ /phag mo rgya mtsho yab yum mo/ /dbang ma bden bral yab yum mo/ /drag mo me lha yab yum mo/ /khyab 'jug ma dang tshangs pa mo/ /gdong drug ma dang tshogs bdag mo/ /khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin 
100a1(rgyud 'grel): no/ /gshin rje dang ni chu ma'o/ /nor sbyin ma dang khyab 'jug ma/ /rgya mtsho dang ni gshin rje mo/ /phan tshun 'khyud pa sngar bzhin bshad/ /pad+ma ce sbyang yab yum yin/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang mkha' lding gdong/ /nor rgyas klu dang stag gdong ma/ /
100a2(rgyud 'grel): dung sbyong ma dang 'ug gdong ma/ /mdza' yas klu dang phag gdong ma/ /rigs ldan klu dang bya rgod gdong/ /'jog po klu dang khyi gdong ma/ /pad+ma che dang bya rog gdong/ /yab yum sngar bshad bzhin du'o/ /gzhan yang dur khrod brgyad po ni/ /ma mo klu dang srin dang bcu/ /
100a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong zhing skyo'i zhing chen bza' / /ri mo lha chen mchod rten dang/ /rnal 'byor dpa' bo brgyad brgyad sogs/ /ro dang ce spyang dur khrod sogs/ /lo zla zhag dus rgyu skar sogs/ /dga' byed dril rna nag po che/ 'bring gi ri Ti zhing skyong dang/ /pho nya 'phrog
100a4(rgyud 'grel): ma grub pa sogs/ /bye ba phrag ni phyed dang bzhi'o/ /sngar gyi kha khyer 'dod log ni/ /tsa(rgyud 'grel): tsha(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): dzha(rgyud 'grel): nya(rgyud 'grel): Ta(rgyud 'grel): tha(rgyud 'grel): Da(rgyud 'grel): Dha(rgyud 'grel): Na(rgyud 'grel): pa(rgyud 'grel): pha(rgyud 'grel): ba(rgyud 'grel): b+ha(rgyud 'grel): ma(rgyud 'grel): ta(rgyud 'grel): tha(rgyud 'grel): da(rgyud 'grel): d+ha(rgyud 'grel): na(rgyud 'grel): shar bstod/ sa(rgyud 'grel): nypa(rgyud 'grel): Sha(rgyud 'grel): sha(rgyud 'grel): th+ka(rgyud 'grel): la(rgyud 'grel): wa(rgyud 'grel): ra(rgyud 'grel): ya(rgyud 'grel): ka(rgyud 'grel): kha(rgyud 'grel): ga(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): nga(rgyud 'grel): th+ka(rgyud 'grel): haM:
100a5(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha:nyaM dzhaM dzaM tshaM tsaM/ NaM DhaM DaM ThaM TaM/ maM g+haM baM phaM paM/ naM d+haM daM thaM taM/ th+ka shaM ShaM nypaM saM/ yaM raM waM laM/ daM g+haM gaM khaM ki/ kAM haM h+kaM/ gsod 'dod sdang 'dod khengs 'dod ma/ /rgyal 'dod rengs 'dod bskyed 'dod ma/ /rol mo 'dod dang rgyan 'dod ma/ /bza' ba 'dod
100a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dri 'dod dang/ /gos 'dod 'khrig pa 'dod pa'o/ /'phrug 'dod kha chu spong 'dod ma/ /yan lag dri 'dod gang 'dod ma/ /gdan 'dod 'o thug 'dod ma dang/ /stan la nyal 'dod rgyal srid 'dod/ /'dod 'dod 'chi 'dod tshig 'jam 'dod/ /skam
100a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod skrod 'dod reg 'dod ma/ /'gugs par 'dod dang 'chi bar 'dod/ /phur bus 'debs 'dod 'dod ma'o/ /yan lag thams cad 'phrug bzhed ma/ /dri chen dri chu gtod bzhed ma/ /sems can bslu 'dod gsod 'dod ma/ /lhag ma za 'dod
100b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yul 'dod ma/ /bcings bzhed byis pa khro bzhed do/ /'dod pa log pa log ma ste/ /gsod log zhe sdang logs sogs sbyar/ /thabs kyang shugs kyis shes par bya/ /gzhan yang zad par bcu dag ni/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi ru bsrung/ /bza' bcu gsung gi
100b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi ru ste/ /bum pa klu dang rab gtum gyi/ /steng 'og lha yang rta babs la'o/ /oM suM bi shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM zhes bya bas lha'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o/ /de nas ye shes bzhugs pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang
100b3(rgyud 'grel): dag dgyes pa'i mchog /sras bzangs 'grogs dang 'khor dang rtsa lag bcas/ /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs ni mang pos bskor/ /sangs rgyas yab yum bcas pa dgongs su gsol/ /dza:hUM:baM ho:/ h+ri:rang snying zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje hUM dang ldan pa la/ /dza:
100b4(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje shugs khro bo/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni nyi shu drug /mdog rgyan phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhin/ /nag po ser pa'i phyag lhag gnyis/ /glang chen pags pa gon pa bzung/ /rkang brgyang shing rta la bcibs nas/ /chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems/ /lte bar
100b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /bzung la nga ros spyan drang ngo/ /hUM las shes rab mthar byed kyis/ /rdo rje thog ste bzhugs par mdzad/ /bi las gshin rje mthar byed kyis/ /zhags pa thogs te gcig tu byas/ /ho las pad+ma mthar byed kyis/ /dril bu thogs te mnyes
100b6(rgyud 'grel): par byas/ /hi las bgegs ni mthar byed kyis/ /dbyug pas gnyis med ro mnyam byas/ /de nas sngon bzhin lha mo rnams/ /spros la mchod bstod mnyes par byas/ /h+ra h+rI h+rAM h+rUM hlI h+rAM/ mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce/ /lus yid go cha'i lha yis brgyan/ /de nas
100b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs/ /dpral bar zla stengs cho ga gsum/ /sku yi rdo rje yab yum bskyed/ /dbus dkar g.yas gnag g.yon dmar zhal/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma gnyis/ /ral gri dril bu rin chen ga-yon/ /spros nas phyogs bcur gang bar bsam//
101a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can sku 'dul don mdzad nas/ /tshur 'dus mdun bzhugs gsol ba gdab/ /oM a biShtsin+ta mA kA ya badzra d+ha ra/ de nas sku rigs lha mo rnams/ /shel bum bdud rtsis gang ba yis/ /bdag la dbang ni bskur
101a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam/ /thob nas dpral ba'i zla ba la/ /sku yi rdo rje zhugs nas ni/ /byin gyis brlabs cing 'di skad brjod/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag/ /ding bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /
101a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag/ /ding bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /dpral bar zla stengs oM dkar bsgom/ /mgrin par nyi ma cho ga gsum/ /gsung gi rdo rje yab yum

101b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs drug ste/ /lte ba gsang ba gtsug tor du/ /ka ho:swa haM ni dgod par bya/ /'khor rnams la yang de bzhin no/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA k+tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag ste bdun
101b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mdun du bzhugs/ /oM hAM hAM hAM h+rI huM hUM hliM hlIM/ oM A a'i rI a'u lI badzra Da ki n+yo badzrA mri ta g+ha Tai rA b+ha Shiny+tsaM tu maM swAhA/ oM aM iM ri uM liM sarba bud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): badzra mu ku TaM ma ma pany+tsa bud+d+ha t+ma
101b4(rgyud 'grel): kaM band+hA yan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): ha hA haM hA(rgyud 'grel): pheM ho sarba pA ra mi ta ma ma badzra pa TwAM band+ha yan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM ho dz+nyA na badzrnyI na swa b+hA be kA ru Na pradz+nyAt+ma ke badzra badzra g+haN+Da sa bye ta ra ka ra yorma ma badzra satwa/ sa pradz+nyo da dan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM a A/ e i/ ar Ar/
101b5(rgyud 'grel): o aau/ al Al/ aM a(rgyud 'grel): sarba b+ho d+hi satwa(rgyud 'grel): sa b+hAryA/ sarba karmo pa b+ho ga badzra pa taM ma ma da dan+tu swAhA/ oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA sarba kro d+ha rAM dza(rgyud 'grel): sa b+hAryA mai tri kA ru Na mu di to pek+Sha/ sa ma ta swa haM baM/ badzra bUrbaM ga maM nA ma me da dan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM e waM
101b6(rgyud 'grel): e wAM pad+ma badzra tsih+no pradz+nyo pa yan+tu mA lA/ d+hi pa ti badzra su kha dz+nyA nAM ga dz+nyA na ma me da dan+tu hUM phaT/ dbang bdun gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /oM A/ ra rI u lI pany+tsa d+hA tu bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ /cod pan rigs lngas dbu rgyan bkon/ /oM a i ri a li pany+tsa ta thA ga ta
101b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ri shud+d+he swAhA/ oM a A aM a:ha hA hUM hA/ pheM ho da sha pA ri ma ta ta pa ri pU ra Ne swAhA/ oM A:hUM ho:sUrya tsan+d+ra bi sho d+ha ka swAhA/ oM a A/ e i ar Ar o aau al Al(rgyud 'grel): aM a(rgyud 'grel): bi Sha yan+d+ra ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ oM ha hA ya yA ra rA la lA
102a1(rgyud 'grel): tsa tur prahma bi ra bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ oM haM k+Sha d+harma tsakra pra bard+ha ka swAhA/ zhes pas dbang bdun bskur bar bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sapta b+hU mi prA pa to haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ba'o/ /oM oM pradz+nyO pA yau ka la shA b+hi She ka ma mA da dA taM huM hUM phaT/
102a2(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM pradz+nyO pa yau badzra satwa bi shwa mA ta ro pradz+nyA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kaM me da dA tAM huM hUM phaT/ zhes pas dbang gsum bskur bar gsol ba btab pas bdag tshul bzhin du bum pa dang/ /gsang dbang shes rab ye shes sku/ /oM oM badzra satwe na badzra ka la shA b+hi She ke nA
102a3(rgyud 'grel): d+hi Shi k+to badzra satwa pu trwa tsa la b+hU mi labd+ho haM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra satwe na gu hyA b+hI Shek+te badzra satwa yu ba rA dzo na ba b+hU mi labd+ho haM/ oM huM badzra satwe na pradz+nyA dz+nyA ne nA b+hi Shi ke nA b+hi Shi kA haM dwi ti ya badzra d+ha ro haM d+harma me g+ha b+hu mi labd+ho haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ngo/ /oM ho pradz+nyo pa
102a4(rgyud 'grel): yAt+ma ka badzra satwa ma hA mu drA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kaM me pra yats+tsha/ oM A huM ho(rgyud 'grel): phaT zhes pas gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /bla med dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /oM haM d+harma d+hA twA k+Sha ra tsa tunwA b+hi She ka to badzra satwe nAt+ma na hi dwi tI yo dwA da sha b+hU mi labd+ho haM badzra satwa ma hArtha(rgyud 'grel): pa ra mAk+Sha
102a5(rgyud 'grel): ra(rgyud 'grel): trai lokya bi dza ya kA la tsakra b+ha g+ha wA me paM kA ra(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas thob pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /de nas phyag rgya drug bcas la/ /oM haM ha(rgyud 'grel): bA ma dak+Shi Na kar+N+Na yo ra badzra kunDa li huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM a(rgyud 'grel): ka TyaM kaN+The badzra me kha lA badzra kaN+Thi huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a
102a6(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): bA ma dak+Shi Na ka ra yor badzra ru tsa ko huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hA mA ma dak+ShiN pa da yor badzra nU pu re huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM bAM pany+tsA ka ra ma hA shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba badzra shi ro/ ma Ni shi ra si sarbaM ge basma huM hUM phaT/ oM aM Ard+ha ra rI shwa ra badzra rd+ha tsan+d+ra badzra paTTo
102a7(rgyud 'grel): d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a A(rgyud 'grel): aM sarba swa rai ka tri swa ra swa b+hA ba/ badzra yadz+nyo pa bi ta skand+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcas la/ /oM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): du dAn+ta b+hi ma na k+Sha yaM ka ra byA g+hA tsarma/ ka Tau huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sha tri sha da swa da sapta ta h+ri swa dwirg+ha
102b1(rgyud 'grel): byany+dza na swa b+ha ba dai tye ku la sha ta si ro b+hirmuN+Da mA la skand+ha ba laM bi ni skand+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hi h+ri hu hli pany+tsa skand+ha bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba shi ra si ka pA la mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+Sha k+ShA k+Shi k+ShI k+Sh+ri k+Sh+ri k+ShU k+ShU k+Shli k+ShlI k+ShaM k+Sha:ha hA hi hI h+ri h+rI hu hU hli hlI ha ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba big+h+na bid ri ta ga dza tsa ra ma pa
102b2(rgyud 'grel): TArd+ha rak+ta sh+ra ba ta hUM pheM phaT/ de nas g.yas kyi phyag rgya bca' / oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra khaDga hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra kri shU laM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra karti ra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA na hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzrA gu sha hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra Da ma ru ka
102b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra mud+ga ra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra tsakra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra kun+ta hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra danda hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra pa ra shu hUM phaT/ de nas g.yon gyi phyag rgya bca' / oM hwAM badzra gaN+DI ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra khe Ta ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra kha TwAM ga ho phreM phaT/
102b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hwAM badzra ka pA la ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra tsa pa ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pA sha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra radna ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra padmo ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra shaM kha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzrA darsha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra sh+rIM kha le ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM tsa du rbe ta mu kha swa b+hA ba prahma
102b5(rgyud 'grel): shi ro ho phreM phaT/ de nas klu'i phyag rgya bca' / oM hUM badzra dza ya nA gand+he badzra dza TA mu ku Ta band+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badzra bi dzA ya nA gan+d+re badzra band+he band+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT/ oM hyaM hyA badzra karko Ta ka badzra padmo pA ma dak+Shi na kunDa la yo/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/
102b6(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rAM h+rA badzra pA su ki shaM ka pA la pA ma dak+Shi Na ru tsa ka yo tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hUM hwA badzrA nan+ta ku la kau me kha la kaN+Thi ka ya(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hlaM hlA badzra tak+Sha ko mahA padmo bA ma dak+Shi Na pA da nU pu ra yo tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pas nga rgyal
102b7(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur bar yan lag ste brgyad pa'o/ //sngar bshad lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sngags brjod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /oM A huM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sngon du mchod yon dbul ba ni/ oM pra ba ra satkA raM mahA rasminpa tIts+tsha swAhA/
103a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas me tog sogs dbul rin chen gser gyi me tog sna tshogs dri mchog spos sogs mar me dang/ dril bu me long bla re dang ni sna tshog 'bras bu ba dan gar dang rol mo dang/ sna tshogs mchod pa byas te gzhan rnams
103a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu po bdag nus ji ltar gsungs bzhin dbul/ bdud rtsi sngar bzhin byin bshad pa/ /hUM byung rdo rje'i lce yis myang/ /oM bud+d+ha ya ma na(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM sad+gA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+ha bi ka kA yA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma kA yA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM saM b+ho ga kA yA ya na

103a4(rgyud 'grel): gis mchod par bya/ /de nas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod/ /gang la thog mdza' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri ste ro dang ni/ /reg bya gzugs dang sems te rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing rtsa lag thar par byed pa med/ /sa bon gsal
103a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su ma lus srid pa ru ni bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin mi mnga' ba/ /mtshan med mya ngan 'das par bya ba bral zhing yon tan bral ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje dpe zla med cing skyes bu kun 'gro spros pa med/ /brtsegs
103a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la gnas rna ba sna dar kha mig mgo bo lag pa rkang pa rnams kun du/ 'byung ba'i mdza' dang 'byung po'i mgon te gnas pa'i srid pa 'dzin cing bya ba rnams kyi rgyu/ /rig pa dang po rnal 'byor gyis bgrong go 'phang mchog gis bde ba dus 'khor la 'dud do/ /
103a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu mdzad cus pa yis gzugs can dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid nyi ma dang gnyis pa/ /ye shes rdo rje 'od zer mchog gi go 'phang la gnas chog drag de la phyag 'tshal lo/ dkar po 'jig rten gsum mgon ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzags
103b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag bzhugs/ /bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems tsam sngags kyi gzugs la sum cus yongs su bskor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo la/ /mkhas pa
103b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs kyis nyi mdzad nyams myong gdug pa rnams la mi gdug pa/ /gang zhig gang du rang gi yid la las byas de yi 'bras bu de ru bskyed par byed/ /'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs srid gsum bskyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang
103b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gcig dang du ma ma yin gcig ste mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon pa mdun dang rgyab/ /steng 'og kun nas dkar dang ljang khu kha dog chen po sna tshogs gzugs can thung ngu ring po ste/ /ring thungs su dang yon tan med pa
103b4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dang bcas skyes bu bud med skyes bu min/ /gang zhig kun nas rten byas gcig tu b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dug /gzhan yang bstod pa ci rigs bya/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta mahA pU dza badzra swa b+hA bAtpa ko haM/ mchod bstod nga
103b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bzung bar bya'o/ /mchod pa dang bstod pa'i yan lag ste dgu pa'o// //dpal ldan rdo rje can ni lo dang zla ba dbye ba'i dus kyi dag par 'gyur ro mi dbang kye/ /sems kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin bzhin dbang gis sna tshogs rnam par dag/
103b6(rgyud 'grel): ngu ba la sogs rlung rnams dag par rang snying pad+mar gtso bo'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o/ /drag po nyon mongs slas bcas bdud kyi tshogs bcas bdud kyi gtso bo zhabs kyi 'og /dung dang gaN+DI nor bu ljon pa dag ni de bzhin sku'i rdo rje rdzogs/ /bdud
103b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i yan lag gis ni bum pa brgyad de rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang sems sogs/ /'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med rin chen 'byung gnas 'du shes dpag med 'od/ /gzugs ni 'khor lo can te ri bong stobs dang khrag dang dri chu
104a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dag /lha mo drug gi khams rnams kyi ste yul dang yul can gyi ni byang chub sems dpa' sras dang bcas/ /stobs kyi khro bo lnga ste gzhan rnams las kyi dbang po lnga pos so/ /tsA muN+Da la sogs pa thun tshar brgyad kyi pad+ma'i 'dab
104a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod rnams/ /lha min la sogs zla ba bcu gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab gnas rtsa dang dbugs kyi grangs rnams so/ /klu dang gtum mo gsang pa la ste rgyal po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag /de bzhin 'dod pa la sogs des ni rang
104a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya ba dag /skra yi sgrub pa ma lus dur khrod sa gnas ba spu rnams kyi 'byung po'i tshogs rnams so/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya/ /de nas pad+ma rnam par sbyangs/ /a yis
104a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /hUM gis yi ge rdo rje bcas shes rab la ni mthun phyir ro/ /hUM rigs rang gi yab kyi rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo lnga par rnam par bsgom/ /de dbus a las pad 'dab brgyad/ /de nas rdo rje pad+mar dgod/ /de nas rnal 'byor hUM phaT brjod/ /
104a5(rgyud 'grel): bsrub cing bde chen bsgom par bya/ /gtum mo lte bar rgyus klu bcom/ /ho yi ye shes dbus nas su/ /dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid 'bar/ /phung khams skye mched la sogs bsregs/ /ri bong spyi bo las 'bab pa/ /thig le'i gzugs te rdo rje
104a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ /gnas bzhi rim bcas slar steng 'og /rgyan ldan me long gnas lta bur/ /dus gsum ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /gsung dag ye shes 'bar bar gcig /dung can rgyan chen gtum mor brjod/ /lte stengs rigs dan d+hU ta'i sna/ /srog lnga sna rtser
104a7(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar gzhug/ /srog 'gags stong nyid ma bcos dang/ /de la yid bzhag bsgom par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA gaN badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rnam dag dran pa'i thig le dang/ /phra mo bsgom pa'i yan lag ste bcu pa'o/ /de nas nga rgyal
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bya'o/ /bsgom pas skyon sngags bzlas te/ /las la shis pa'i phreng ba bzung/ /sngags kyi sgra spangs grogs po ru/ /gang 'gyur ba yi sngags de bzlas/ /oM na mo badzra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha b+ho ti satwe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): na mo badzra kro d+he n+d+ra rA dze b+hya(rgyud 'grel): na mo bi shwa ma trai/ na mo bud+d+ha bo
104b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hi satwa de be g+hya na mo badzra DA ki ni b+hya/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te ka la tsakrA ya badzra b+hai ra ba b+hI ka rA ya/ ma hen+d+ri la par+N+Na sha pa rI rI ya/ ma ra kle sha h+ri dA ya/ krAn+ta si na rak+ta tsa ra NA ya/ /kriSh+Na rak+ta si ta kaN+TA ya/ nI la si ti pI ta rak+ta daMSh+TA ka ra lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kriSh+Na rak+ta si
104b3(rgyud 'grel): ta sa dye ta ra skand+hA ya/ dwa sha b+hu dzA ya/ ShaTa bid sha ti ka rA ya/ badzra khaDga Ti shU la karti ka /bA NAM ku sha Da ma ru ka /mung+ga ra/ tsakra kun+ta/ daN+Da/ parshu/ badzra g+ha N+Ta khe Ta/ kha TwAM ga /ka pA la/ tsa pA pA sha /ratna ka ma la shi khi/ a darsha/ sh+rI kha lA/ brahma/ shi ro ga dza tsarma
104b4(rgyud 'grel): d+h+rik+ka rA ya/ byA g+h+ra/ tsarma Ni ba sa nA ya/ skand+he muN+Da mA lA ba laM be ni/ shi ra si/ badzra paDDa ma ku Te badzra/ ka pA la ma lArd+ha tsan+d+ra d+ha rA ya/ kunDa la ru tsa ka/ kaN+Thi kA/ me kha lA/ nU pU ra/ b+hasma yadz+nya pa bI ta shi ro ma Ni/ mahA mu drA nA gen+d+ra bi b+hU Sha NA ya/ badzra DA ki nI san+to Shi tri
104b5(rgyud 'grel): h+ra da yA ya/ in+d+ra gni ya ma nai rritya ba ru Na ba yu ku pe re shA na brahma bik+Sh+NA bi nA ya ka kAn+ti ke ya nandi mahA kA la gra ha/ nak+Sha trak+She tra pA la su ren+d+rA pha Nin+d+ra b+hu ten+d+ra na ren+d+ra si shu ha tsa ra NA ya/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): h+k+Sh+mlwryaM ka la tsakra du rdAn+ta da ma ka dzA
104b6(rgyud 'grel): hi dza dA ma ra NAn+ta ka tre lokya bi dza ya/ ma hA bI re shwa ra/ badzra b+hai ra ba/ badzra kA ya/ badzra gA tra/ badzra ne tra/ badzra shwa tra/ badzra g+ha Na/ badzra dzi h+ra/ badzra dan+ta/ badzra na kha/ badzra ke sha /badzra lo ma/ badzrA b+ha ra Na/ badzra hA sa/ badzra gI ta/ badzra nri tye/ badzra yu d+ha
104b7(rgyud 'grel): ka ra/ badzra kro d+ha rA dzA d+hi pa ti/ badzra DA ka/ badzra DA ki nI dza la ba ra bri ti/ shI g+h+ra a gats+tsha gats+tsha/ badzra satwa dz+nyA yA sarba mA ra big+h+na bi nA ya ka kin+na ra kiM pu ru Sha ga ru Da gand+ha rba yak+Sha k+Sha sa b+hu ta mahA bro ta/ kum+b+ha Na Da a pasmA ra/ k+She tra pA la/ pe tA Da/ pU ta na/
105a1(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Ta nA ga gra hA da ya ye sarba dzwa ra/ sarba byA d+hi/ k+Shu dro ba tra pa kA ri Na(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwa nAM sarbba pa kA ra ra tAM shA sarbany+dza(rgyud 'grel): shI g+h+raM badzri ku she nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ a'ur d+ha di shi ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya pUrba di shi ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ dakI Na di shi ga tA nU kri Sh+yA
105a2(rgyud 'grel): kri Sh+ya/ ut+ta ra di shi ga tA nA gri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ ra shtsi ma di shi ka twa dI kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ bA ya bya de shi ga tA nA kriSh+yA kriSh+ya/ a'i sha na di shi ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ nairri dya di shi ga na tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ agne ya di shi ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ a d+ho de shi ga tA nA kriSh+yA kri Sh+ya/ A kA sha maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ ba yu
105a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ te dzau maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ to ya maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pri thpI maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ kA ma d+ha tu maN+Da la ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ rU ba d+ha tu ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ oM rU pa d+hA tu ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ kA ya d+hA tu ga tA
105a4(rgyud 'grel): nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ bA ga b+hA tu ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ tshit+ta d+hA tu ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tsa skand+ha ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tsi d+hA tu ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tse dri ya ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tsa pi Sh+ya ya ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tsa karme na drI ya ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ pany+tsa karme n+d+rI ya
105a5(rgyud 'grel): bi Sha ya ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ sarba to ya tra ku tra tsit+ta ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ mahA sma shA ne badzrA gni dzwa li ta b+hU myAM ni pa ta ya ni pa ta ya/ badzra pA she na sarba b+hU dze Shu band+ha ya band+ha ya/ badzra sh+riM kha la yA sarba pA de Shu ne ro d+ha ya ni ro d+ha ya/ ma ma sarba satpa Shu kA ya
105a6(rgyud 'grel): bak+tsi t+to ba dra ba ka ra ra tAn+tA na ma hA kro d+ha badzre Na tsUr+Na ya tsur+Na ya/ badzra khaDge na ni krin+ta ya ni krin+ta ya/ badzra tri shU le na b+he da ya b+he da ya/ badzra kart+ti kA ya ha na ha na/ badzra pA Ne na bind+ha bind+ha/ badzra kI laya kI laya kI laya/ badzra mung+ga re NA ko Ta yA/ badzra tsakre Na ts+tshe da ya
105a7(rgyud 'grel): ts+tshe da ya/ badzra kun+te na b+hinda b+hinda/ badzra daN+De na tA Da ya tA Da ya/ badzra par shu na ts+tshinda ts+tshinda/ sArd+ha tri ko Ti khaN+Di kri twA shma shAn b+hU myAM sarba b+hU te b+hyo ba liM ku ru ku ru/ badzra Da ma ru ke na badzra DA ki nI rA bA ha ya bA ha ya/ badzra DA ki ni b+hyo mA ra kA yi kA naM ru d+hi raM ni
105b1(rgyud 'grel): be da ya ni be da ya/ pany+tsA mri ta hA ri Ni b+hya(rgyud 'grel): pany+tsA mri taM ni be da ya be da ya/ sarba badzra DA kI nI sa hi ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwA nAM shAn+ti ki /poSh+Ti kAM rak+ShA ba ra Na gupti ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho h+k+Sh+mlwryaM swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM h+rAM h+rIM h+rIM huM h+rlIM h+rAM swA hA/
105b2(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM kA la tsa krA ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho phaT swAhA/ oM dA na pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shI laM bA ra mi ta yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM k+Sha n+ti pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM bIrya pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM d+hyA na pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM
105b3(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM u pA ya pA ra mi tA ye hUM phaT swAhA/ oM pra Ni d+ha na pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM bA la pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM dzA ya g+ha Te b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM bi dzA ya g+ha Te b+hyo huM phaT
105b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM sarba tsih+no b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba mu drA b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM tsandA ma Na yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmA gaN+Dya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmmA shi khA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM kalpa brik+ShA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM ak+Sho b+hyA huM phaT swAhA/ oM a ma g+ha sid+d+ha ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM radna
105b5(rgyud 'grel): saM b+ha ba ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM a mi tA b+ha ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM bai ro tsa nA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM lo tsa nA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM mA ma kyai huM phaT swAhA/ oM bAN+Da rA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM tA ra yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ryai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra pA Na yai huM
105b6(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ oM kha garbbA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM k+Shi ti garbbA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM lo ke shwa rA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ni pa ra Na bi skaM b+hi ne huM phaT swAhA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM gand+ha badzrA yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ru pa badzrA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM
105b7(rgyud 'grel): ra sa badzra yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM sparsha badzrA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM shapta badzrA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmmA d+hA tu badzra yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM uSh+Ni ShE ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM bigtTAn+ta ka ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM pradz+nyA na kA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM padmAn+ta kA ya huM phaT
106a1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM ya mAn+ta kA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM stam+b+ha na ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM ma Ni ma n+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM sto b+hi n+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM a ti bI ryA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM a ti ni lA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba d+ha ri NI b+hyo huM phaT
106a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM Sha DaM gA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra tsA rtsi kA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bA rA hyai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ma he shwa ryai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra indDya na huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra brahma n+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra mahA la k+Sh+mye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kau mAryai
106a3(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra baiSh+Na byai huM phaT swAhA/ oM aSh+TA Sh+Ta ke na tsa tu(rgyud 'grel): Sh+ThaShi badzra yo gi nI b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM Sha Da triM shA tits+tsha b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra baiSh+Na bai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra nirri tya yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzrA gni ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM pradz+nyo d+d+ha ye hUM phaT
106a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM badzre na drA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzre shwa ra ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra brahma Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bi nA ya kA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra karti ke yA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ba ya bai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ya mA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra yak+She b+hyo huM phaT
106a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM bA ru N+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM ba ya byai huM phaT swAhA/ oM yA mi n+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM yak+Shi n+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA ba lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM a tsa lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM Tak+ki rA dzA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM nI la danDA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM
106a6(rgyud 'grel): sum+b+ha rA dzA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM ro drA k+Sh+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sh+rIM kha la yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM tsundA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+h+ri kuTTyai huM phaT swAhA/ oM maryI tsyai huM phaT swAhA/ oM pra tye ka mA sa b+he d+he ne Sha Sh+Ti ut+ta ra triM sha ta badzra ti thi de bI b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/
106a7(rgyud 'grel): oM ShaTa tri sha ta phra tIts+tsha b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra dzA yA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kar ko Ta kA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bA su ka yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM nan+tA ya huM phaT/ oM badzra raksha ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzre mahA padmA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ku
106b1(rgyud 'grel): li kA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra shaM kha pA lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra pad+ma ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bi dza yA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM shwa nA syA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM sU kA rA syA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM byA btA syA hUM phaT swAhA/ oM dzUM ka kA syA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ga du DA syA huM phaT swAhA/ oM u lU kA syA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM gri d+h+ra syA huM phaT swAhA/ oM kA kA syA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+hU te b+hyo hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra tsan+d+rA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sUryA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra mang+ga lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bud+hA ya
106b3(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bri haspa ta ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra shukrA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sha nai shtsa rA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ke tA bai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ra hA be huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kA lAgna ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra d+h+ru bai huM phaT swAhA/ oM
106b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra gastya ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra k+She trA b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM dwA ra sha rA si b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM Sha Ta sha ka lA b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM da sha dik+kA le b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra randi ke shwa rA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra mahA kA lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM
106b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+haN+Da kar+N+NA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra b+hi gi ne huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba k+She tra pA le b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba dU ti b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM hA rI tyai huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmmA tsakrA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+ha dra g+ha TA ye huM phaT
106b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM badzra dun+tu b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+ho d+hi brik+ShA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM ru bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi satwe b+hyo na mo huM phaT swAhA/ pho nya badzra nyi badzra nyri badzra nyu badzra nyli badzra nyi badzra huM phaT swAhA/ oM dzha badzra dzhi badzra dzh+ri badzra dzhu badzra dzhli badzra dzhi badzra huM phaT swAhA/ oM dza
106b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra dzi badzra dzI badzra dzu badzra dzli badzra dzi badzra huM phaT swAhA/ oM tsha badzra tshi badzra tsh+ri badzra tshu badzra tshli badza tshi badzra huM phaT swAhA/ oM tsa badzra tsi badzra tsri badzra tsu badzra tsli badzra tsam badzra huM phaT swAhA/ de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i sa bon kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /oM ba ru
107a1(rgyud 'grel): N+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM ba ya be huM phaT swAhA/ oM ma ya n+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM yak+Sha n+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM nI la daN+Dhye huM phaT swAhA/ oM Tak+ki rA dzA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM a la ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM mahA bA lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM sum+b+ha rA dzA ya
107a2(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ro tak+Sha huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sh+ri kha lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra nunde huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra b+h+ri ki ri huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ma ri tsya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra shat+triM sha ta ts+tshi b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra dza yA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra
107a3(rgyud 'grel): karko TA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bA su ki huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzrA man+ta huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra tak+Sha kA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra mahA pad+ma ma huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra ku la na ka ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra shaM kha pA lA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra padmA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bi dza yA ya huM phaT
107a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM shwa na syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM byAg+ha sye huM phaT swAhA/ oM dzpu ka syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM ga ru Da syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM u lU ka syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM g+h+ri d+h+ra syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM ka ka syai huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba shud+d+he b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra tsanda ya huM phaT swAhA/
107a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra sU ryA huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra maM ga lye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bud+d+ha ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM bri hpa ta yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra shu krA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sha nai shtsarA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kArta ri huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra rA hu la huM phaT swAhA/ oM
107a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra ka lAgn+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra d+h+ru be ni huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra gastya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sarba nak+Sha tre b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM dwA da sha rA shi b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM Sho Da sha kA la b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzrA nande bI shwa rA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra mahA kA
107a7(rgyud 'grel): lA yang huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra g+haN+Da kar+NA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra b+h+ri gi ra Te huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba k+She Ta pA li b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba dU ti b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM ha ri ti b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba gu ru bud+d+ha b+ho
107b1(rgyud 'grel): ti satwe b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmmA tsakrA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+ha dra gaN+DI ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra dundu b+hyo huM phaT swAhA/ oM bo b+hi brik+Sha ye huM phaT swAhA/ de nas mchod bstod ci nus bya/ /khro rgyal la sogs gtor ma sbyin/ /dge ba 'di yis rnam gsum sred pa la
107b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub 'gyur bar shog /thub pa 'khor bcas gtso bo'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob gyur pa/ srid pa rnam gsum la gnas sems can bcom ldan dus 'khor stobs kyis de bzhin
107b3(rgyud 'grel): shog /bsod nams de yis sems can mi 'gyur mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud/ spyi bor rdo rje rtse lnga ru/ /gtso bo yab yum gshegs su gsol/ /thugs kar rtse dgu du ba sogs/ /dpral bar rtse mo bcu drug bsgom/ /rigs lnga yab yum
107b4(rgyud 'grel): bum par gshegs/ /mgrin par rtse mo sum cu gsum/ /sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba gshegs/ /lte bar rtse mo drug cu lnga/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol/ /gsang bar phyi yi sgo srung gshegs/ /bya ba'i rdo rje bden bral sogs/ /
107b5(rgyud 'grel): las la klu dang rab gtum gshegs/ /de nas lha'i rnam par ldang/ /cho gas gnas rnams bsrung bar bya/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ya ti badzra satwa haM do daN+Da da ma ko huM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /lha'i nga rgyal gyi spyod lam bya'o/ /rjes kyi bya ba'i yan lag ste
