107b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig pa'o// //sangs rgyas byang sems rgyud 'grel las/ /dbri mnan ma byas cho ga bsdus/ /dge ba bla med byang chub bsngo/ /nongs gyur bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dus 'khor
107b7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o/ (//dpal du dkyil 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kA la
108a1(rgyud 'grel): tsakra sA d+ha na nA ma ni/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam
108a2(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs/ /spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral/ /skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hUM yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor/ /bden
108a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du/ /sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa/ /de dag blangs te bri bar bya/ /bstan
108a4(rgyud 'grel): bcos brtsam pa'i dus med cing/ /mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang/ /bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol/ /dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyis bya ba byed par 'dod pas/ zhi ba la
108a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs las kyi bye brag gis/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su/ bla ma dang/ rgyal ba dang/ de'i sras rnams la gus pas/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su
108a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mchod pa dang maN+Dal la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams pa la 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la/ /shin tu gus pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal pa la sogs pa rnams dang/ phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po
108a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dbang po rnams dang mnyam por bzhag pa ste/ ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam khar bcug nas/ lus dang ngag dang/ yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya
108b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang/ yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par
108b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ oM A:hUM ho ho k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyo pA yA ta ma ka kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa ti ma ma kA ya bAk+tsit+tata dz+nyA na badzri badzra badzrA mri ta swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru kand+d+ha d+hA twA ya twA nA ni(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha baM swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod la/ gtsug tor du baM yig yongs su gyur pa las
108b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zla ba ni dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo/ /de nas gtsug tor nas bsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa rjes pa ltar bsam mo/ /de ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la'o/ /dbang la sogs
108b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhung ches kyi dog nas ma bris so/ /de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ zhes pas brjod do/ /de nas dpral bar oM yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po/ mgrin
108b5(rgyud 'grel): par a:yig yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po/ thugs kar huM yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po/ /lte bar ho yig yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku gdog ser po/ gtsug
108b6(rgyud 'grel): tor du haM yig yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu gsang gnas su k+Sha yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni/ gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang ldan
108b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa dang rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o/ /de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /oM h+ra(rgyud 'grel): sarbA sta rA dza mAr kle shan+ta ka ra badzra tiklta du(rgyud 'grel): kha ts+tshe dam ma ka ri bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi
109a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi lag pa mnye ba ni lag pa dag pa'i nges pa'o/ /de nas a la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni/ a i ri u li/ a e ar aau al/ ha ya ra wa la/ rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa
109a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te/ mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas brtsams te/ mthe'u chung gi tshogs kyi bar du la yig la sogs pa dgod pa ni/ lA wA
109a3(rgyud 'grel): rA yA/ Al o Ar i a(rgyud 'grel): lI a'u rI a'i A/ rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no/ /de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su hUM yig kha dog sngon po bsam/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan
109a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gtsug tor nas brtsams nas/ rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhing sngags brjod pa/ oM A:huM ho haM k+Sha:/ ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na d+hi ba te badzra k+Sha yA ma ma kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na badzri badzrA kA ya swA b+hA baM ku ru ku ru swAhA/
109a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kA ya swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag pa'o/ /de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas/ de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni/ lag pa
109a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de/ oM hlI h+ri da yA ya nA ma/ zhes pa'o/ /mgo bor oM hUM si ra se swAhA/ zhes pa'o/ /gtsug tor la oM h+rIM she khA yai bau ShaT zhes pa'o/ /yan lag thams cad la oM h+rrIM ka ba tsa ya hUM
109a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o/ /oM h+rI nai dra la wa Sha Ta zhes pas so/ /mig la oM h+rA(rgyud 'grel): astA ya phaT zhes pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba la
109b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis/ mi dge ba'i bya ba la g.yas pas dgod do/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya si ra(rgyud 'grel): shi kha ka ba tsa ne tra astra badzra Sha Di ga swa b+ha bat+mako haM/ zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gyi
109b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dang por 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ni/ de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir/ de yang dang por yaM yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hUM yig yongs su
109b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro/ /de nas raM yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang/ waM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dang/ laM yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa bzhin du/ /kha dog nag
109b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du huM yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis gnyis dang bcas pa rnams/ gzhu'i dbyibs dang/ gru gsum dang/ zlum po dang/ gru bzhi'i rnam
109b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la rlung yab dang/ bkra shis pad+ma dang 'khor lo rnams kyi spras pa ge bar bya'o/ /de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams dang/ grong khyer gyi mtshams dang/ phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa
109b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste/ de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa grub bzhi rgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang/ de ltar rab gsum bsgom pa dang/ de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra
109b7(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang/ de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang/ steng du mnga' i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang/ dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma 'am/
110a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /dbus kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no/ /'on kyang 'di'i bye brag ni hUM yig yongs su gyur
110a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ oM yig yongs su gyur pa 'am/ b+h+ruM yig yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang dang/ baM yig yongs su gyur pa 'am/ oM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dang/ raM yig yongs su gyur pa las
110a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya'o/ /de ltar ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms nas/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ oM A:hUM ra badzra tsandA sUrya ra huM ka lAgna ya/ ka ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na badzra pra k+Sha rAM
110a4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM huM bi shwa k+Sha ya badzra kU DA gA raM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so/ /oM pa:bi shwa badzra pad+ma ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa ni pad+ma'i sngags so/ /om ra:badzra sUrya badzra sUrya sA naM ku ru ku
110a5(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so/ /de nas de'i steng du aM yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las/ zla ba'i dkyil
110a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba dbyangs yig sum cu a(rgyud 'grel): tsheg drag dang klad kor dang bcas pa bsgo
110a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ a i ri u li 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o/ /de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas a e ar o al rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o/ /de nas rkyen gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga'o/ /
110b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa bco lnga'i mthar thig le ni aM yig ste/ bcu drug pa 'di rnams ni g.yon bskor gyis so/ /de nas g.yas bskor gyis nag po'i phyogs kyis dang po la sogs pa dgod pa/ lA wA rA yA hA/ /Al o Ar e A/ lI u rI a'i A/ de ltar bco lnga
110b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni A:ste 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o/ /de nas de'i steng du a:yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo/ /
110b3(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang/ ha ya ra la wa rnams dang/ /sde tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa lnga dang/ de nyid kyis brjod pas la wa ya Da Dha rnams bzung ste/ l+la wwa Dha DhDha
110b4(rgyud 'grel): l+la wwa rra yya hha ssa wwa Sh+Sha shsha Sh+Sha/ t+ta ththa d+da d+h+d+ha n+na/ p+pa phpha bba b+hb+ha mma/ TTa ThTha DDa DhDha N+Na/ tstsa tshtsha dzdza dzh+dzha nynya/ k+ka kh+kha g+ga g+h+g+ha ngnga/ rnams ti bzhi bcu tham pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g.yas bskor gyis so/ /de ltar g.yon bskor du/ ra g+ha ga kha ka/ nya dzha dza
110b5(rgyud 'grel): tsha tsa/ Na Dha Ta Tha Ta/ kam b+ha ba pha ba/ na d+ha da tha ta/ th+ka sha Sha wa/ sa ha ha ha ya ra wa la Dha Da ya ba la ste/ de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zhes so/ /de nas de dag gis dbus su hUM yig sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs
110b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM gis mtshan pa so sor rtogs ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig gis spras pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas lus kyi yan lag thams
110b7(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs pa haM yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo ste/ 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i
111a1(rgyud 'grel): pags pa 'dzin pa la/ kha dog ser po zhabs rkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma/ phyag gnyis kyi gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud
111a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi sham thabs spyangs pa/ khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las/ phyag rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa/ oM haM ha/
111a3(rgyud 'grel): bA ma dak+Shi na kaN+Na yor badzra kunDa le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM aM a:ka TyeM kaN+The badzra me khA badzra kaN+Thi ka huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a A bA ma dak+Shi Na ka ra yor badzra ru tsa ko huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hA bA ma dak+Shi Na pA da yor badzra nU bu re huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ha baM pany+tsA kA ra mahA shU n+ye swa b+hA wa badzra shi ro ma Ni shir si sarbAM ge b+hasma huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM ard+ha na ri shwa ra badzrA rd+ha tsan+d+ra badzra phaT phaT/ urd+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a a(rgyud 'grel): oM sarbA so rai ka tri swa ra swa b+hA ba badzra ya dz+nyo pa bI ta skand+he huM hUM phaT phaT/
111a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni phyag rgya drug gis cho ga'o/ /de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i glang po'i pags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i sngags rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+Sha:durdAn+tA/ b+hI ma nak+Sha yaM ka ra byA g+h+ra tsarma ka Tau huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): triM sha hswa ra sapta ti h+ra(rgyud 'grel): swa
111a6(rgyud 'grel): dirg+ha bya ny+dza na swa b+hA ba dye tya ku la sha ta si ro b+hirmu N+Da mA la skand+ha ba laM bi ni skand+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hi h+rI hu hlI pany+tsa skand+ha bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba shi ra si ka pA la mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar phyag rgya bcu rnams pha
111a7(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbye ba dang/ gnas bcu drug gi dbye bas stong pa nyid bcu drug ces pa ni phyag rgya dgod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de nas g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi sa bon rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha badzra huM phaT/ oM
111b1(rgyud 'grel): k+Sh+ra baDhA huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra tri shU la huM phaT/ /oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra kad+ha ri huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra bA Na huM phaT(rgyud 'grel): oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzrAM ku sha huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra Da ma ru ka huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra mung+ga huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra badzra tsakra huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra:
111b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra kunda huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra baN+Da huM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ra(rgyud 'grel): badzra parshu huM phaT/ zhes pa rnams ni g.yas kyi phyag mtshan rnams so/ /de nas g.yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams ni/ /dang por haM yig brjod par bya/ oM hwAM badzra gaN+De ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badzra khe tra ho pheM phaT/ oM
111b3(rgyud 'grel): b+hAM badzra kA pa la ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badzra no pa to pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pA sha ho pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra ratna ho pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pad+ma ho pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra shi kha ho pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzrA darsha'o pheM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra sh+riM kha le ho pheM phaT/ oM hwAM tsa tu h+re ta swa b+hA ba brahma shi ra ho pheM phaT/ zhes pa rnams
111b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon pa rnams su mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas glang po'i pags pa'i sngags rnams brjod pa ni/ /oM k+Sha k+ShA k+Shi k+ShI k+Sh+ri k+Sh+rI k+Shu k+Shu k+Shli k+ShlI k+ShaM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): ha hA hi hI h+ri h+rI hu hU hli hlI haM hA/ sarba big+h+na bi da ri ta ga dza tsarma phaTTA rd+ha rak+ta sh+ra ba ta huM pheM/ phyag g.yas dang
111b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas nas bzung ba ni/ g.yas kyi mgo bo'i phyogs kyi lag pa dang/ g.yon gyi rkang pa nas bzung bar bsam pa ni pags pa bzung ba'i rim pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po bcu dgod pa'i sngags ni oM huM badzra dza ya nA
111b6(rgyud 'grel): gen+d+rA badzra dza TA mu ku Ta b+hand+ho tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badzra bi dza yA na gen+d+ra badzra paTTa phanb+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hyaM hyA badzra karko Ta ka badzra padmo bA ma dak+Shi Na kuN+Da la ya(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+raM h+rA badzra ba su ki shaM kha pA lo bA ma dak+Shi Na
111b7(rgyud 'grel): ru tsa ka yo/ tiSh+Tha tiShtha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hwaM hwa badzrA na n+ta ku li kau me khA la kaN+tha ka yo(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hAM hyA badzra tak+Sha ko mahA padmo bA ma dak+Shi Na pA ra nU pu ra yo(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dgod par byas la/
112a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bcas pa'i rkang pa bcu drug pas bsdams pa rnams bskrad pa dang/ bdud la sogs pa bskrad pa'i sngags dus kyi 'khor lo'i sngags pas yang nas yang du bzlas pa 'di
112a2(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ oM na mo badzra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+hya/ na mo badzra kro d+hen+d+ra rA dze b+hya/ na mo bi shA mA tre/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa de bi b+hya/ na mo badzra DA ki nI b+hye/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te kA la tsa krA ya/ badzra bai ra pa b+hI ka rA ya ma hen+d+ra nI la
112a3(rgyud 'grel): baN+Da sha ba rI rA ya/ mA ra kle sha h+ri da yA krAn+ta sI ta rak+ta tsa ra NA ya/ kriSh+Na rak+ta si ta kaN+ThA ya Ni la si ta pI ta rak+ta daMShDA ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kriSh+Na rak+ta si ta sa bye ta ra kand+ha ya/ dwa da sha b+hu dza ya/ Sha Da biM sha ti ka rA ya/ badzra
112a4(rgyud 'grel): khaDga tri shU la karta ri bA Na aM ku sha ma ru ka mung+ga ra tsakra kun+ta daN+Da parshu badzra g+haN+Da khe Ta kha TwAM ga ka pA la tsA pa pA sha radna ka ma la shaM kha A darsha sh+rI kha la brahma shi ro ga dza tsar ma d+h+rik+kA rA ya/ byag+h+ra tsarma Ni ba sa nA ya/ kand+he muN+Da mA lA
112a5(rgyud 'grel): ba laM bi na shi ra si badzra pa TTa mu ku Te badzra ka pA lA ma lArd+ha tsan+d+ra d+ha ra ya/ kuN+Da la ru tsa ka kaN+Di ka me kha lA nU pU ra b+hasma yadz+nyo pa bI ha shi ro ma Ni ma hA mu drA nA gen+d+ra bi b+hu Sha NA ya/ badzra Da ki nI saM te She ta h+ri da yA ya/ in+d+ragni ya ma nai
112a6(rgyud 'grel): ri tya bA ru Na bA yu ku be re shA na brahma biSh+Nu bi nA ya ka karti ke ya nandi mahA kA la gra ha nakA trak+She tra pA la/ su re na su ren+d+ra pa NI da b+hu ten+d+ra na ren+d+ra saM stu ta tsa ra NA ya/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so/ /bdud
112a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so/ /rkang pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dogs pas ma bris so/ /de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs
112b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po la oM yig dgod do/ /mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la A:yig dgod do/ /snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag pa la hUM yig
112b2(rgyud 'grel): dgod do/ /lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do/ /gtsug tor dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): dgod do/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor drug
112b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te/ rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang/ rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa dang/ rtse mo dgu pa dang/ rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang/ rtse mo lnga pa dang
112b4(rgyud 'grel): yang rtse mo sum cu gsum pa zhes pa ste/ rdo rje rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste/ yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sor gcig bsgom par
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor gnyis pa'o/ /dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o/ /mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o/ /lte ba'i
112b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor dgu pa'o/ /gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas g.yon gyi dpung mgo'i tshigs la ra dri du dli daM/ g+ha g+hi g+h+ri g+hu g+hli g+haM /ga gi gri gu gli gaM /kha khi khri khu khli khaM /ka ki kri ku kli
112b7(rgyud 'grel): kaM /zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ste/ thung ngu drug gi dbye ba dang/ ka'i sde tshan yongs su gyur pa rdo rje rtse mo sum cu rtsa gcig pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dpung mgo g.yas pa'i tshigs la/ k+kA:k+klI k+kU k+krI k+kI k+kAM/ kh+khA(rgyud 'grel): kh+khlI kh+khU kh+khrI kh+khI kh+khAM
113a1(rgyud 'grel): g+gA:g+glI g+gU g+grI g+gI g+gAM /g+g+hA:g+g+hlI g+g+hU g+g+h+rI g+g+hI g+g+hAM/ ngnga(rgyud 'grel): ngnglI ngngU ngngrI ngngI ngngAM/ zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa ste ring po drug gi dbye ba dang/ k+kA:I sde tshan yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gcig pa bsam mo/ /de ltar
113a2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams la rdo rje bsgom par bya ste/ de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar gru mo g.yon pa la co'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid do/ /gru mo g.yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid do/ /de ltar g.yon
113a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshigs la Ta'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams so/ /g.yas pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshigs la ring po rnams so/ /g.yon gyi sbyin mgo'i tshigs la pa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams so/ /g.yas kyi spyi mgo'i tshigs la ring po rnams so/ /pus mo
113a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams so/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po rnams so/ /long bu g.yon pa'i tshigs la sa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /long bu g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid do/ /
113a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni tshigs rnams la rdo rje dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ /rdo rje de rnams kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshang dang mnyam pa/ de nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rim pa de bzhin bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams la/ lag pa g.yon
113a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthe chung nas brtsams te/ rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la thung ngu drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan de la sogs pa drug drug las byung pa'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar g.yas kyi mthe bo'i tshigs
113a7(rgyud 'grel): steng ma nas brtsams te/ tshigs lnga la ring po drug dang ldan pa'i k+kA la sogs pa drug drug yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams so/ /g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la co'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams so/ /
113b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams las so/ /g.yon gyi sor mo'i steng gi tshigs la Ta'i sde mtshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid rnams so/ /g.yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las so//
113b2(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa g.yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar pa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyis bdag nyid las so/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ring po rnams kyi bdag nyid las so/ /de nas g.yon pa'i tshigs rnams snga ma ltar
113b3(rgyud 'grel): ta'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyi bdag nyid las so/ /g.yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid las so/ /de ltar g.yon pa'i tshig rnams la sa'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid rnams las so/ /g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams
113b4(rgyud 'grel): te rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongs su dag pa la ljang gu dang/ nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po'i kha dog rnams/ so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyis so/ /de nas rna ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje dgod pa ni/ de nyid las gsungs
113b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar/ rna ba dag tu a A dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sna bug dag tu e i dag las so/ /mig dag tu ar Ar dag las so/ /lce dang mchu dag la o aau dag las so/ /rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la al
113b6(rgyud 'grel): Al dag las so/ /yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag la aM a:dag las te/ 'di rnams kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog gi g.ye ba dang ldan par sor gcig gi tshad kyis so/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rnam la rdo rje sor
113b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa zhes pas so/ /de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha hA dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /lce dang rkan dag la ya yA dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/
114a1(rgyud 'grel): lag mthil dag la ra rA dag las so/ /rkang mthil dag la wa wA dag las so/ /'phongs kyi g.yas g.yon dag la la lA dag las so/ /de ltar rdo rje'i lus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnam
114a2(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni/ de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar/ de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi tshogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba
114a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsregs nas/ steng du ljang gu 'bar ba dang/ 'og tu sngon po 'bar ba dang/ shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang/ lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang/ byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba dang/ nub dang nub byang du ser po 'bar ba dang zhes sogs
114a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi tshogs bsregs pa ri sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM A:hUM ho haM k+Sha:h+ra:h+ra:h+ra:h+ra:ra ra ra ra badzra a na las ? bar Na d+harmA pra la ya swa b+hA ba sarba mA ra kA yi ka big+h+na bi nA ya kA dI nAM da sha dig+gA twA naM kA ya bak+tsit+tA ni/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT zhes pa ni bdud rnams rnam par
114a5(rgyud 'grel): sreg pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi chos rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang/ ra ba gsum dang/ ra ba lnga rnams kyis nang dang/ phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du/ khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spro bar bya'o/ /de nas yang
114a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la/ de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ha ya ra wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsam mo/ /de'i steng du ha las byung ba'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag
114a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g.yon pa nas spros te/ gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba 'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can g.yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o/ /de ltar hA yig
114b1(rgyud 'grel): ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g.yas nas bton nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i steng du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do/ /de ltar yi yig las byung ba'i bgegs mthar byed kha dog nag po/ sna bug g.yon nas byung nas shar
114b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar yAM yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbyug sngon can kha dog nag po sna bug g.yas nas bton te/ me'i mtshams su nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do/ /rI yig las byung ba'i shes rab mthar
114b3(rgyud 'grel): byed sku mdog dmar po/ mig g.yon nas bton nas lho phyogs su zla ba 'am/ nyi ma la dgod do/ /de ltar rI yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po mig g.yas nas bton te bden bral du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod
114b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de ltar wu yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pad+ma mthar byed dkar po lce las bton te/ byang du zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do/ /wu yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi g.yo ba dkar po dri chu'i lam nas bton te/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams
114b5(rgyud 'grel): su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do/ /li yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te/ nub phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do/ /de ltar li yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs po che ser po
114b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gtsug tor nas bton te/ rlung gi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o/ /yang na bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/ dus kyi 'khor lo dgos pa'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang
114b7(rgyud 'grel): gi phyi rol du zad par nam mkha' la sogs pa spro ba ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya Na ma na rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs sku bsgoms la nga ngA las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par
115a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te/ gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnang mdzes rgyal po'i 'og tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar nyi nyI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par
115a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar Nri N+Nri dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par me lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar mu mU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par chu/ /
115a3(rgyud 'grel): byang dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su chu'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar Nli NlI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su sa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar g+ha dzha Dha b+ha d+ha rnams brtsegs pa'i yi ge
115a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni/ g+ha g+ha dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug ljang gu dang sngon po/ ngang pa dang bya khyung la gnas pa/ ra ba la phyogs pa/ steng du bya khyung la gnas pa/ steng du tshangs pa/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu khyab 'jug go /de nas dzhi dzhI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i bden bral dang rlung lha dag /kha dog nag po/ yi dags dang ri dags la gnas pa shar dang me mtshams su'o/ /de ltar lho dang bden bral du/ Dh+ri DhI las yongs su rdzogs
115a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gshin rje dang me lha/ kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du b+hu b+hU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i brgya mtsho bde byed/ kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar nub dang
115a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung dud+hli d+hlI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin/ kha dog ser po glang po che dang bi ma na la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas ra ba bsrung ba'i don du bza' rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /
115b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon du gsungs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ ga dza Da pa da rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas pa las/ ga gA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me/ stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ rab gsum la phyogs ba steng dang 'og tu
115b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de ltar dzi dzI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ shar dang me mtshams su dgod do/ /Dri DrI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i bza' lag dang bkra shis/ me'i dkyil
115b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa/ lho dang bden bral du dgod do/ /de ltar bu bU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o/ /de ltar dli dlI dag las yongs su dag pa'i 'jug rings dang
115b4(rgyud 'grel): spen pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste/ 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol tu bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o/ /de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste/ sngon du gsungs
115b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kha tsha Tha pha tha rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsams nas kha khA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba/ ra ba lnga la phyogs pa steng dang 'og nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /de
115b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar tshi tshI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i karka Ta dang pad+ma dag /shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar Th+ri Th+rI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu bdag dang dung skyong/ /lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la
115b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /de phu phU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dga' bo dang rigs ldan/ byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar thli thlI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pad+ma chen po dang 'jog po nub dang rlung dag tu/ sa'i dkyil
116a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du 'byung po lha ma yin rnams bsgom par bya ste/ sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ka tsa Ta pa ta rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul
116a2(rgyud 'grel): du bsam pa ste/ de nas kyang ra ba la phyogs ba steng dang 'og tu ka kA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ro langs dang ka sha mandu/ nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar tsi tsI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ri na ra dang/ ki pu ru
116a3(rgyud 'grel): Sha khyi dang bya rog gi gdong can dang/ shar dang mer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgod do/ /de ltar TTi TTI dag las yongs su rdzogs pa dri za dang 'byung po/ /phag pa dang bya rgod kyi gdong pa can/ lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la dgod
116a4(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de ltar pu pU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa srin po dang yi dags/ stag dang 'ug pa'i gdong can byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do/ /de ltar tli tlI las yongs su rdzogs pa'i brjed byed ce sbyang gi gdong pa dang/ bya
116a5(rgyud 'grel): khyung gi gdong can/ nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do/ /de rnams thams cad shes rab dang ldan pa'o/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar ye shes dang/ nam mkha' dang rlung dang/ me dang chu dang sa rnams khams drug las byung ba'i
116a6(rgyud 'grel): khro'i rgyal po rnams dang/ gzugs med dang/ gzugs dang/ phyogs bcu skyong ba dang/ gza' rnams dang/ klu rnams dang 'byung po rnams sdo tshan drug gi bdag nyid srung zhing skyong ba/ phyi dang nang rnams su kha sbyor du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas
116a7(rgyud 'grel): dgod do/ /de nas bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams gsal gdab par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar de las gzhan pa bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyus khug cig /rdo rje
116b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas chings shig /khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje phur bu rtse mo mdung gi rnam pa rnams gnas bcur sdang ba la btab par bsam mo/ /sngags rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): huM ho hi k+Sha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT badzra kI la kA ya bAk+tsit+ta
116b2(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA ? d+hi pa te ShaTmu la ShaDphu dza ShaTsa rba tsa ra Na sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA di duSh+TA naM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA nA nI kI la ya kI la hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pa ni gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM l+li badzra mung+gar/ mA rA dI nAM shi ra si kaN+thi h+ri da ye/ nA b+hau gu hya yan+te badzra kI la kA nA ko Ta
116b3(rgyud 'grel): yA kro Ta ya/ k+Sha k+ShI k+Shi k+ShIM k+Sh+riM k+Sh+rIM k+ShuM k+ShUM/ k+ShliM k+ShlIM k+ShaM k+ShAM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ zhes pa ni brdung ba'i sngags so/ /de nas nga rgyal byas nas phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du/ khro bo bcu la bka' sgo ba ni/ de'i don du dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i
116b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa/ srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dbyug sngon can gyis bdud rnams ma lus brdung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus mdza' i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi g.yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson 'grus so//
116b5(rgyud 'grel): DA yis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig rten sa stengs gyur par gnod mdzes rgyal pos nges par byed pa'o/ /gtsug tor can gyis de yi rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyi snga ma bzhin du'o zhes pas so/ /oM huM kro
116b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hen+d+ro haM/ kro d+ha naM mAdz+nyA dA ya ka swAhA/ de nas khro bo rnams la so so'i sngags kyi rkang pas bka' sgo ba/ oM hAM badzra kro d+ha rA dzA ma hoSh+NI Sho rd+ha di shi rak+Sha ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM yaM badzra kro d+ha rA dzA ti pa la sarba big+ha nAn+ta ka pUr ba di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru
116b7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM raM badzra kro d+ha rA dza dzam+b+ha ka duShDa pradz+nyA n+tA tA ka dak+Shi Na di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM wi badzra kro d+ha rA dza bi ra ga padmAn+ta kot+ta ra di shi ra k+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM laM badzra kro d+ha rA dza staM b+ha ka ya man+ta ka pa shtsi ma di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA zhes pa
117a1(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyi las/ oM lAM(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha ra dza ma hA ba le dA ya byAM di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM wAM(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dzA tsa le sha na di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM rA(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dzA Tak+ki nai ri tyA di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/
117a2(rgyud 'grel): oM yA(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dza nI la daN+DAgne yaM di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ aM hUM(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha rA dza sum+b+hA d+ho ti rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams ni/ rgyud kyi sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i cho gas sngags pas dgod par
117a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga tA rak+Sha tsakra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM zhes brjod la nga rgyal bya'o/ /'di ni bsrung pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o/ /de nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas bdag nyid gsung bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor
117a4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ zhal dang phyag bzhugs tshul rnams su skad cig gis bsams la/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar bdag nyid skad cig gis lha'i skur bsgoms nas/ rang gi snying gar paM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma
117a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa/ de'i lte ba'i steng du aM yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su de kho na zhes pa ni/ hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i
117a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa'i sngon du sangs rgyas pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ nam mkha' dbus na bzhugs pa la/ rnal 'byor pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba ni/ sgrub thabs kyi tshig rab tu
117a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus par bya ba'i phyir dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams dang ni de rnams
117b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang rgyas 'debs bdag dang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig brjod par gyur pa'i zhal gyis grangs rnams g.yas bskor gyis ni go bya ste/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyis rtsa ba'i phyag na chu skyes pa dang rang mtshan go
117b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus me 'phrog byed zhal gcig kha dog dkar/ /rig byed phyag na rtse gsum DA ma ru dang dpal gyi dung dang khaTwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rtse mo can gyi mig ldan g.yon du gan rkyal bsgyel ba gnas te g.yas su dran
117b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid/ /kha dog dmar po 'dab lnga lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag la/ gau ri dga' byed ma yis bzung ba dkar dang ba'i g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi snying gar mnan/ /sa bon hUM yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i ral pa'i
117b4(rgyud 'grel): thor tshugs sngon po can/ /mi skyod pa ste zhal gyi pad+ma sprin dang 'od ldan ri bong can rnams rgya mtsho mtshungs/ /dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon rnams sngon po dmar po dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'i mgrin gsum pa/ /g.yon gyi dpung pa'i rim bzhin dkar
117b5(rgyud 'grel): min dmar dang dkar ba rnams te g.yas pa'i dpung pa gsum/ /de bzhin yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa zung gsum phyag gi mgo bo bzhi pa gsum/ /sor mo rnams ni gser dang nyi ma sprin dang ljang gu 'thebs sogs rim pa bzhin/ /de
117b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams rtse mo dbus dang rtsa ba rnams kyi tshigs ni sprin dang nyi ma thig le rnams/ /mi mgo skam po lnga rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pas nyid kyi dbu la brgyan/ /mgrin la mgul brgyan nyid dang sked la ska rags rna rgyan gyis ni rna ba la/ /lag pa dag la yid
117b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ong lag gdub rkang pa dag la rkang gdub mdzes pas spras/ /dbu la dar dpyangs sku la thugs kar mchod phyir thogs pa rnams kyis brgyan/ /so so'i zhal rnams spyan gsum dang ldan nor bu rdo rje zla/ dbu nyid la ste mi mgo brgya yis phreng ba mgo 'dzin
118a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas/ /stag gi sham thabs dang ldan rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum gri gug /mda' dang lcags kyu cang te thod pa 'khor lo dung rnams/ /dbyug pa dgra sta g.yas min rnams te dril bu phub chung khaTwAM ga dang
118a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa mnga' gnas zhags pa rin chen/ /chu skyes dang ni dung dang mchog gi me long lcags sgrog rig byed gdong ldan mgo bo rnams kyi phyag nyid rnams la mtshan/ /phreM yig gri gug las byung bud med gzugs can sku mdog ser mo/ /dpal
118a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las gzhan bzhugs pas rab tu 'khyud pa/ /phyag rgya dang ldan klu yi phyag gis pad+ma sna tshogs yum gyi dbu la dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan la gnas/ /gri gug lcags kyu cang te phreng ba rnams ni rim
118a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du/ /thod pa zhags pa chu skyes rin chen rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin ma/ /gser dang zla ba dang ni sprin dang nyi ma rnams dang ldan pa'i/ /gang zhig zhal bzhi rnams na me yi spyan dang rab tu ldan ma/ /aM yig rdo rje dag las
118a5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' gang zhig ye shes rnam dag pa/ /sngo dang nyi ma zla ba'i zhal gsum spyan dgu rdo rje 'dug stangs gnas pa'i mnga' bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sngon po gri gug dgra sta dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo rnams ni rim pa
118a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /phyag drug las min ral pa dang ldan sku la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yis 'khyud/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa dag pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod ljang/ /a dang rdo rje dag las byung ba'i mi bskyod
118a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' i rnam pa dang ni mtshungs/ /mi bskyod nam pa dang mtshungs A dang gri gug las byung rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /a:dang gri gug las byung shes rab pha rol phyin ma rdo rje sems ma'i rnam pa bzhin/ /dag pa'i
118b1(rgyud 'grel): lus la sna tshogs pa'i/ /yum gyis 'khyud pa 'gro ba'i yang/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gang/ /'khor lo'i dbus gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen gtsug ma dang mtshungs pa'i/ /nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa/ /brgyad rnams zhal bzhi phyag brgyad
118b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /mnga' bdag pad 'dab rnams la gnas/ /a yig rnams kyi gsang ba'i thod pa las byung dpal nyid nag mo 'bar ma mdun du gnas/ /na bza' nag mo sprin dang nyi ma gser dang ri bong can gyi zhal rnams rim bzhin/ /bdug spos dang ni tsan dan
118b3(rgyud 'grel): gur gum gla rtsi ga bur dang bcas pad+ma'i snod rnams dang/ /dril bu pad+ma lha shing me tog phreng ba gang las gang ba de nyid rnams la bstod/ /g.yas su a yig dang ni mar me dag las byung ba'i dmar po/ /'bar ma nyi ma ser dang dkar dang nag po'i zhal dang
118b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang/ phyag na mar me mu tig phreng ba cod pan lag gdub rnams dang/ /gos dang ske rags rna rgyan rkang gdub rnams dang ldan la phyag 'tshal/ /g.yon du aM yig dang ni lha bshos las byung ba'i/ /dkar mo 'bar ma dkar nag dmar ser zhal dang ldan//
118b5(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma chu dang sman dang chad dang ro rnams dang bdud rtsi 'bras bu zan snod phyag ldan nyid la 'dud/ /chu bdag tu ni a yig dag las byung ba'i ser mo 'bar ma/ /gser dang zla ba bung ba dang ni drod byed rnams dang ldan ma/ /dung dang gling bu dang ni nor bu cang te
118b6(rgyud 'grel): pi wang dang ni/ /rnga dang mchog gi mkhar rnga zangs dung phyag na bsnams la phyag 'tshal/ /ha hA haM ha/ rnams las byung ba'i ser dang dkar dang dmar dang bung ba'i kha dog ldan/ /rlung dang dbang ldan srin po me''dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams te mar me ma
118b7(rgyud 'grel): me khyer ma dang smig rgyu ma ste dpal gyi du ba ma yis phyag rnams ma lus pas/ /rim bzhin rnga yab 'dzin ma rang rang mdog mtshungs snga ma las byung rnams phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo can dang srin po dbang ldan rlung mtshams rnams la gnas pa
119a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig las byung nor bu dang ni A(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung gaN+DI/ /oM yig las byung chu spyod ho yig las byung dpag bsam shing rnams/ /byung ba'i zla ba nyi ma gser mchog 'od ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /sangs
119a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan dgu pad dkar nyi ma la/ /thams cad rdo rje'i 'dug stangs bzhugs/ /de rnams ral pa'i cod pan can/ /dbang po a yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i don yod grub pa/ /rlung dang 'du byed rang bzhin
119a3(rgyud 'grel): bung ba nyi ma dkar ba'i zhal ldan/ /ral gri dang ni gri gug rtse gsum phub chud thod pa dang ni kha TwAM ga rnams/ /bsnams pa'i dkar min spyan gsum ldan la phyag 'tshal/ /g.yas su ri yig rin chen las byung dpal ldan rin chen 'byung
119a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /dmar po me dang tshor ba'i rang bzhin nyi ma zla ba bung ba'i/ /zhal ldan bdag gi mi'i mnga' bdag mda' dang lcags kyu cang te'u/ gzhu dang rin chen zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /g.yon du u yig pad+ma las byung
119a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med ni dkar po/ /chu dang 'du shes rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'od 'phro sprin dang nyi zhal/ /dpal ldan gos dkar mo yis spras pa thob mdung thung rtse gsum/ /chu skyes dkar po me long phreng ba rnams 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyab
119a6(rgyud 'grel): tu li yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i rnam snang ser po/ /sa dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gser dang zla ba nag po'i zhal ldan/ /sgrol mas spras pa'i 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa rdo rje bsnams dang/ /dpal gyi dung dang lcags sgrog
119a7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu phyag na 'dzin la bstod/ /sangs rgyas rnams mtshungs btsun mo rnams/ /pad+ma dmar dang zla ba la/ /thams cad pad+ma'i 'dug stangs bzhugs/ /kun la rin chen cod pan bsam/ /li yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i spyan ma sa
119b1(rgyud 'grel): khams rang bzhin/ /rnam par snang mdzad mtshungs dang don grub dang bcas rlung mtshams gnas dang/ a'u yig pad+ma las byung bdag gi mA ste chu khams rang bzhin/ /'od dpag med mtshungs rin 'byung dang bcas dbang ldan gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /
119b2(rgyud 'grel): haM yig las byung rgyal ba'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan dpal ldan thugs kyi 'khor lo yi/ /shar gyi sgo ru khro bo'i gdan gyi phyi ru pad+ma nyid la dgod par bya ba ste/ de ltar hi yig las byung gti mug rdo rje'i g.yas su dgod de de bzhin rin chen
119b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /g.yas dgod h+ri hu hlri/ las byung bum pa de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /hlI hUM h+rI h+ri las byung bum pa spyan sogs g.yas su rim bzhin dgod/ /ha yig las byung rnam rgyal bum pa sgo gzhan gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
119b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas ji bzhin rgyal sras rnams/ /'on kyang rin chen cod pan ldan/ /lha mo de bzhin lho mo rnams/ /de ltar rim bzhin rab tu gnas/ /a yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje thugs khar rdo rje nyid/ /sngon po bzung ba rna ba'i dbang
119b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag nyid mnga' bdag mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste/ ljang gu lho'i sgo'i g.yon gyi brtsig pa'i drung du de'i gdan dang mtshungs par bzhugs pa la/ /spyi bo sa la reg ste de'i zhabs la shin tu dga' bas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /e yig
119b6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dag las byung ba'i nam mkha' i snying po don grub dang mtshungs sna nyid kyi/ /dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal gyi rdo rje ma bcas shar sgo'i g.yas na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal/ /ar yig rin chen las byung sa'i snying po rin chen dang mtshungs sku
119b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar po nyid mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan gzugs kyi rdo rje mar bcas lho sgo'i gnas dang/ oM yig pad byung 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med mtshungs ro rdo rjer/ /bcas dang lce dbang rang bzhin byang sgo'i g.yas su gnas la
120a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /al yig 'khor lo las byung sgrib pa rnam sel mdzes pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa yi/ /lus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa/ /gang gi pad na reg
120a2(rgyud 'grel): bya rdo rje ma dang bcas pa nub sgo'i g.yas phyogs na/ /rgyun du yang dag gnas pa de la rtag tu gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /aM yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i kun tu bzang/ /sku la chos kyi dbyings kyis rdo rje ma yis 'khyud/ /yid kyi rang bzhin
120a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar mtshungs/ /shar sgo'i g.yon du gnas pa la phyag 'tshal/ /a yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i sgra yi rdo rje ma ste sgra yi rang bzhin dang/ /dpal ldan phyag dang mtshungs shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang mtshungs byang sgo'i
120a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du gnas/ /al yig dang ni 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dri yi rdo rje ma ste dri'i rang bzhin dang/ /dpal ldan spyan ma dang mtshungs nam mkha' i snying po dang mtshungs rlung mtshams bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /aau yig chu skyes dag las byung
120a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ste gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang/ /dpal ldan bdag gi ma mtshungs sa yi snying po dang bcas dpal ldan la gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /ar yig dang ni rin chen las byung ba yi ro yi rdo rje ma ste ro yi rang bzhin dang/ /dpal ldan
120a6(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar mo mtshungs 'jig rten dbang po dang bcas bden bral la gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /i yig dang ni ral gri dag las byung ba'i reg bya rdo rje ma ste reg bya'i rang bzhin dang/ /sgrol ma dang mtshungs sgrib pa rnam par sel dang bcas pa me mtshams
120a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /A yig rdo rje las byung chos dbyings rdo rje ma ste rdo rje dbyings ma dang mtshungs ma/ de kun tu bzang po dang ni bcas pa nub sgo'i g.yon la gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro rnams ral gcig ma la ser
120b1(rgyud 'grel): lag rkang bshad rang bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams dang mtshungs pa/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs dang sbrul gyis brgyan/ /yaM yig dang ni ral gri dag las byung ba'i bgegs kyi dgra nyid nam mkha' i snying po mtshungs/ /rengs byed ma ni mA rI ci mtshungs spangs nas shar
120b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo ri dbus su chu skyes dkar po dang/ /nyi ma la gnas pa dang raM yig dbyug pa las byung shes rab mthar byed sa snying dang/ /mtshungs dang nga rgyal ma mtshungs btsun bcas lho phyogs la gnas dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang sgor pad+ma zla ba la gnas waM yig
120b3(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dag las byung ba'i pad+ma'i dgra/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang mtshungs ma ni khro gnyer can ma dang ni mtshungs pa dang/ /lam yig thob las byung gshin rje'i dgra nyid sgrib pa sel mtshungs shin tu brtson 'grus ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog dang ni mtshungs pa baM
120b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nub phyogs la gnas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dung dang gzer bu dang/ /dpal 'bras cod pan na bza' dang/ /de ltar phyag mtshan rnams las byung/ /so so'i ming gis mchod byed pa/ /ka tsa Ta pa ta sa sde tshan thung ngu tshogs las byung ba
120b5(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /lha dang gshin rje la sogs g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og /'dir ni rim pa bzhin du glu ma dri ma spos ma gsol zas ma/ /lha mo sgeg mo gar ma ma lus phyag gnyis zla ba'i zhal dang ldan/ /pa Ta ha dang snod mar me/ /mu tig
120b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng dang phreng chu skyes/ /rim bzhin phyag mtshan las byung ba/ /lha mo thams cad sa bon mdog /sA tA pA TA tsA kA'i sde tshan ring po brtsegs par gyur las byung ba yi/ /chu sogs g.yon gyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og rnams la/ /de ltar rim
120b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du sgra ma bzhad ma bdud rtsi ma rnams dang/ /mar me ma dang phreng ba ma dang 'dod pa ma rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes pa ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pa'o/ /lha mo tsa rtsi ka sogs sa ga'i rkang thabs dang/
121a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig spyan gsum rig byed lag dang ldan pa yi/ /lte ba'i pad+ma la gnas gshin rje rtsa rnams kyi/ /rnam par dag pa'i rin chen dang ldan cod pan can/ /shar du ha yig gri gug las byung tsa rtsi ka /gri gug rtse gsum
121a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa kha TwAM nyid pa bsnams/ /phyag na 'dzin pa'i dbang po dang bcas gang yin pa/ /ro dang pad+ma dmar gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /tsa rtsi kA sogs pad+ma bsnams/ /rim pas chu tshod rtsa rang bzhin/ /mdun nas g.yas skor rim pa bzhin/ /pad+ma
121a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams la rol pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed drag po mche ba gnyis gtsigs ma dang kha nas me 'bar ma dang rlung shugs rab gtum ma/ /gtum mig ma dang sna chen ma rnams klu yi pad 'dab rnams la tsa rtsi kA la phyogs nas gnas/ /brgyad
121a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs h+ri ya yi rhi yig rnams dang gri gug las byung bsgom/ /yu yliM yaM rnams dang ni gri gug las byung dpal gyi rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /ha(rgyud 'grel): yig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i phag mo dmar mo dang
121a5(rgyud 'grel): ni bde byed dkar po dang bcas nyi ma yi/ /pad+ma ma he'i steng gnas phyag na dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrog phub chung rnams dang ldan pa/ /gshin rje la ni bzhugs pa'i zhabs gnyis dag la nges par phyag 'tshal lo/ /keng rus dus mtshan ma dang
121a6(rgyud 'grel): khro gdong dus kyi lce dang brtsigs ma/ /nag mo'i 'jigs ma gzugs ngan klu yi 'dab ma la gnas lha rnams/ /dpal gyi lha mo dang mtshungs hir ri rri rA hI ru rli raM rnams dang/ /dbyug pa las byung dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal/ /ha
121a7(rgyud 'grel): yig rtse gsum dag las byung ba'i drag mo nyid kyi phyag na rtse gsum cang te kha TwAM ga dang lto 'gro dkar po/ /rim pa ji lta ba rnams gshin rje dang bcas byang du khyu mchog dang ni pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal/ /go ra dang
121b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gaM ga ma dang rtag ma shin tu mgyogs ma 'degs me mtshan nyid ldan ma dang/ ser skya ma dang nag mo rnams te de ltar brgyad rnams drag mo'i klu yi pad 'dab la gnas rnams/ /dpal gyi drag mo dang ni mtshungs mahu wa wi wri hUM nyid rnams dang wu wli waM rnams//
121b2(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dag las byung ba de rnams kun la rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas nges par phyag 'tshal/ /hA yig rdo rje las byung dbang mo gser gyi kha dog dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje mda' dang dril bu gzhu ni lag pa'i pad+mas 'dzin ma lha min dang bcas chu bdag phyogs su glang po
121b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang ni/ /pad+ma dmar po'i steng na gnas pa la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'od ma rdo rje lus ma gser mchog ldan ma rigs 'dzin ma dang sna tshogs ri mo ma/ /chu shing ma dang zug rngu sel ma shin tu sgrol ma rnams ni lag 'dzin pad 'dab la/ /
121b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs hli la lI lri hli lu l+li laM ma rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje dag las rab tu byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la 'dir ni nges par phyag 'tshal lo/ /k+Sha yig dung dag las byung tshangs ma zhal bzhi nyi ma'i spyan ldan
121b5(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ser po dung dang dbyug pa spyi blugs thod pa rnams dang ldan pa/ /sprin gyi kha dog dang ni mtshungs pa'i 'phrog byed dang ni bcas pa rlung mtshams dang pa pad dkar steng na gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal/ /nyi ma'i bu mo pad+ma'i mig mchu skyes ldan ma dag gi
121b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ma rnams dang/ glu ma dang ni glog ma dran ma rnams ni rig byed zhal gyi pad 'dab la ni gnas pa rnams rim pa bzhin du k+ShlI lA lI l+lrI k+Sh+rI lU l+li la rnams dang dung dag las byung ba'i/ /tshangs ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la rab tu dang
121b7(rgyud 'grel): bas yang dag 'tshal lo/ /k+Shu dang pad+ma las byung bkra shis ma ni zla ba dang mtshungs pad phreng ka ma la dang rin chen nor bu phyag ldan ma/ /ro'i gdong can dang bcas dpal ldan phyogs na seng dkar steng na gnas pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la
122a1(rgyud 'grel): ni nges par phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo can ri bong 'dzin zhal ngang pa'i mdog ma 'dzin byed ma/ /pad ma'i dbang phyug ma dang 'od zer can ma dri med zla 'dzin ma rnams dbang ldan mtshams nyid du/ /bkra shis
122a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yaM pad 'dab rnams la rim bzhin du k+Shu wA wI wrI k+ShU wU wlI wA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ni/ pad ma dag las yang dag byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la thams cad dus su phyag 'tshal lo/ /k+Sh+rI yig shak+ti las byung gzhon nu ma nyid nyi ma dang mtshungs//
122a3(rgyud 'grel): shak+ti lcags kyu rin chen zhags pa rnams ni phyag gi 'dzin ma/ /bden bral mtshams nas rma bya pad ma dkar po'i steng na gnas pa'i/ /tshogs kyi bdag po dang ni bcas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal/ pad+ma ma dang yan lag med ma gzhon nu ma dang
122a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge 'gros ma rin chen 'phreng ba ma/ /mig mdzes ma dang kun ma bzang mo rnams ni gtso mo chu skyes gtsug phud can gyi 'gros ma yi/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas rim pa bzhin du k+Sh+rI ra ri rrI k+Sh+rI rU rlI ra:rnams dang ni/ /shag ti dag las byung ba'i lha
122a5(rgyud 'grel): mo de rnams dang ni bcas pa rnams la rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo/ /k+ShI yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan khyab 'jug ma nyid/ /zhal bzhi dang bcas pa yi gnag pa'i sku mnga' 'khor lo dbyug pa/ /chu skyes dang ni dag pa'i dud
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dzin pa'i phyag ldan me mtshams/ /pad ma dkar po dang ni bya khyung la gnas de la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal mo sgyu 'phrul ma dang grags ma bkra shis ma dang shin tu rgyal ma dpal rgyal rnams dang/ /rab tu rgyal ma dpal ldan
122a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can ma dag ni khyab 'jug ma yi pad 'dab la/ gnas pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du k+ShI yA yi yrI k+ShI yuA ylI ya(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa rnams dang/ /'khor lo dag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang bcas rnams la dang po rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho sgo'i
122b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi 'dod yon rnams la ka kha ga g+ha nga rnams tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i/ /sa bon rnams dang so so'i phyag mtshan rnams las byung ba'i 'dod ma lha rnams phyag gnyis ri bong zhal/ /shar sgo la sogs kyi g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la sa
122b2(rgyud 'grel): bon rang bzhin tsa Ta pa ta yi/ /sde tshan rnams las de ltar rab tu byung pa de rnams lnga lnga so so'i phyogs la gnas pa dang/ /shar sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon la gnas sde las byung ha sde las/ /byung ba byang g.yon de las gzhan/ /k+Shi yig las byung rnams
122b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// ces pa rnams gsung gi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /tsa rtsi kA sogs dang mtshungs 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi rigs rnams/ rigs byed brgyad dang bcu drug pad+ma'i 'dab ma gsum rtsegs la gnas/ /a sog sa bon rnams dang
122b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las byung rdo rje dang bcas/ /khyab 'jug la sogs rnams dang chos kyi lha mo rnams dang bcas pa/ /nga ngi ngri ngu ngli ngaM/ g+ha g+hi g+h+ri g+hu g+hli g+haM/ ga gi gri gu gli gaM /kha khi khri khu khli khaM/ ka ki kri ku kli kaM rnams dang 'khor lo las byung/ /pad gnas rnams
122b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /dpal gyi dgun zla tha chang chos rnams dang ni nges par dpung mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can/ /'di rnams dang bcas shar sgo'i g.yon du bya khyung pad+ma dmar po'i steng gnas rkang yig dang/ /
122b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo las byung ba yi khyab 'jug ljang gu'i lus la dpal mo gnod sbyin dang ni mtshungs pas 'khyud/ /'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa dag dang chu skyes dung dag 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /nya nyi nyri nyu nyli nyaM/ dzha dzhi dzh+ri dzhu dzhI dzhaM/
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dza dzi dzri dzu dzli dzaM/ tsha tshi tsh+ri tshu tshli tshaM/ tsa tsi tsri tsu tsli tsaM/ rnams dang ral gri las byung ba de gnas rnams/ /mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas pa dpal gyi dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni gtum mo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid de/ /
123a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams dang bcas shar sgo'i g.yas su yi dags dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa/ /tsi dang ral gri dag las byung ba'i srin po dmar po dbang mo dang bcas ral gri gri gug dang/ /phub dang thod pa phyag
123a2(rgyud 'grel): gi 'dzin pa gang yin de la bdag nyid gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /Na Ni Nri Nu Nli NaM/ Dha Dhi Dh+ri Dhu Dhli DhaM/ Da Di Dri Du Dli DaM/ Tha Thi Th+ri Thu Thli ThaM/ Ta Ti Tri Tu Tli TaM/ rnams dang shag ti las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bas gnas/ /dpal gyi dbyar zlar pa'i chos rnams dang ni lag mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin gcig nyid de/ /'di rnams dang bcas gshin rje phyogs kyi sgo yi g.yas su lug dang pad+ma dmar po'i steng/ /gnas pa Twi dang shag ti las byung
123a4(rgyud 'grel): sreg za kha dog dmar po shag ti dbyug pa dang/ chu skyes spyi blugs dus kyi phyag na bsnams pa drag mos 'khyud pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma mi mri mu mli maM/ b+ha b+hi b+h+ri b+hu b+hli b+haM/ ba bi bri bu bli baM/ pha phi phri phu phlaM phaM/ pa pi praM pu pli paM rnams/ /
123a5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhags pa las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /dpal gyi dbyar zla tha tshungs tshes rnams dang ni dpyi mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid do/ /sgo'i g.yas su chu srin dang ni pad+ma dmar po'i steng gnas pa/ /yaM
123a6(rgyud 'grel): yig dang ni zhags pa dag las byung ba'i chu bdag zhags pa rin chen sbrul nyid dang/ /nor bu rnams ni rig byed phyag na 'dzin cing phag mo dang bcas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na ni nri nu nli naM/ d+ha d+hi d+h+ri d+hu d+hlAM d+hI/ da di dri du dli daM/ tha thi th+ri thu thli thaM/ ta
123a7(rgyud 'grel): ti tri tu tli taM/ rnams dang rdo rje las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /de ltar ston zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni pus g.yon rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g.yas su
123b1(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan dang chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa/ /taM yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dbang po ser po phyag na rdo rje dang/ /mda' dang dril bu gzhu rnams 'dzin pa tsa rtsi ka dang bcas pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /th+ka th+ki th+kri th+ku th+kli th+kAM/ sha shi sh+raM shu shli shaM /Sha Shi Sh+ri
123b2(rgyud 'grel): Shu Shli ShaM/ nypa nypaM nypI nypu nypli nypaM/ sa si sri su sli saM/ rnams dang rtse gsum las byung pad gnas ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /dgun zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni long bu'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can de 'di rnams dang bcas pas byang sgo'i
123b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du khyu mchog dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /saM yig dang ni rtse gsum mda' dang kha TwAM ga /gzhu rnams phyag gis 'dzin dang gshin rje dang mtshungs ri yi bu mo pad gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /sA sI srI sU slI swAM(rgyud 'grel): nypA nypI nyprI nypU nyplI
123b4(rgyud 'grel): nypAM(rgyud 'grel): ShA ShI Sh+rI ShU ShlI ShA(rgyud 'grel): shA shI sh+rI shU shlI shA(rgyud 'grel): th+kA th+kI th+krI th+kU th+klI th+kA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dbyug pa las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /de ltar dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni rkang g.yas long me'i tshigs kyi
123b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin te/ de rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g.yon du ming dang pad+ma nyi ma'i mdog ldan steng gnas pa/ /th+kA? yig dpal gyi dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i gnod sbyin nor bu dbyug pa sre mong dang/ /pad+ma rnams ni phyag na 'dzin pa'i khyab
123b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang mtshungs nor dbang pad gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /tA tI trI tU tlI tA(rgyud 'grel): thA thI th+rI thU thlI thA(rgyud 'grel): dA dI drI dU dlI dA(rgyud 'grel): d+hA d+hI d+h+rI d+hU d+hlI d+hA(rgyud 'grel): nA nI nrAM nU nlI nA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dung las byung ba pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /de ltar
123b7(rgyud 'grel): ston zla tha tshungs tshes rnams dang ni pus mo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid de/ /dang ba chu skyes dkar po la gnas na yig dang dung las byung ba'i tshangs pa nyid/ /ser po dung dang phreng ba chu skyes spyi blugs rig byed phyag gis 'dzin la khyab 'jug mas//
124a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud pa'i zhal bzhi ser dang dkar dang dmar ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pA pI prI pU plI pA(rgyud 'grel): phA phI phrI phU phlI phA(rgyud 'grel): bA bI brI bU blI bA(rgyud 'grel): b+hA b+hI b+h+rI b+hU b+hlI b+hA(rgyud 'grel): mA mI mrI mU mlI mA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang sta re las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang mtshungs rol bas gnas/ /ston zla ra pa'i tshes rnams dang ni g.yas kyi spyi mgo tshigs rnams rnam par dag pa yi/ /rang bzhin de rnams dang bcas dbang ldan mtshams su bya ba chu skyes dkar po'i steng gnas pa/ /mA yig ta re las byung
124a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag dkar po sta re rdo rje zhags ba nor bu rnams/ /phyag gi rim bzhin bsnams la gdong drug mas 'khyud de yi zhabs la rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo/ //TA TI TrI TU TlI TA(rgyud 'grel): ThA ThI Th+rI ThU ThlI ThA(rgyud 'grel): DA DI DrI DU DlI DA(rgyud 'grel): DhA DhI Dh+rI DhU DhlI DhA(rgyud 'grel): NA NI NrI NU NlI NA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dung las
124a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba pad gnas dang ni mda' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni lag mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin de rnams dang bcas pa/ /bden bral mtshams su rma bya chu skyes dkar po la gnas Na:
124a5(rgyud 'grel): yig dang ni dung dag las/ /byung ba'i ro yi gdong can dmar po shag ti dang ni mdung dang nor bu me long rnams/ /gang gi phyag na gnas pa dang ni dpa' mo dang bcas de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /tsA tsI tsrI tsU tslI tsA/ tshA tshI tsh+rI tshU tshlI tshA/ dzA dzI dzrI dzU dzlI dzA/
124a6(rgyud 'grel): dzhA dzhI dzh+rI dzhU dzhlI dzhA/ nyA nyI nyrI nyU nylI nyA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ljon shing las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /dpyid zla tha chud tshes rnams dang ni gru mo'i tshigs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin te/ /de rnams dang bcas
124a7(rgyud 'grel): me yi mtshams su ri dags chu skyes dkar po la gnas nyA(rgyud 'grel): yig dang/ /ljon shing ngag las byung ba'i rlung lha nag po phyag na ljon shing lha shing me tog dang/ /nor bu utpal sngon po bsnams 'dzin rgya mtsho'i zhal ma pad gnas
124b1(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kA kI krI kU klI kA(rgyud 'grel): khA khI khrI khU khlI khA(rgyud 'grel): gA gI grI gU glI gA(rgyud 'grel): g+hA g+hI g+h+rI g+hU g+hlI gA(rgyud 'grel): ngA ngI ngrI ngU nglI ngA(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dbyug pa las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas/ /de ltar dpyid zla ba ba'i tshes rnams dang
124b2(rgyud 'grel): ni dpung pa'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid de/ /de rnams dang bcas lho sgo'i g.yon gyi phyogs su ma he chus skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa/ /ngA(rgyud 'grel): yig dbyug pa las byung shin tu sngo ba dbyug ba ral gri lcags sgrog zhags pa bsnams/ /dus kyi phyag
124b3(rgyud 'grel): gis 'dzin la 'phrogs byed dang mtshungs gshin rje ma nyid pad gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /khro rgyal rnams ni g.yas pa brkyang/ /lha mo rnams ni g.yon brkyang gnas/ /zhal cig rgya mtsho phyag ldan zhing/ /spyan gsum rin chen cod pan can/ /haM yig dang ni
124b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dag las lha dbang lus ldan phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs gtsug tor can/ /de nyid pad gnas hA(rgyud 'grel): yig dang ni gri gug dag las byung ba'i shin tu sngon gyi dus kyi phyag rgya/ /gri gug rdo rje thod pa dril bu 'dzin pa dag ni steng du mkha' lding rlung gi shing rta
124b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /yang dag gnas pa'i khu ba 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin de dag zhabs la rab tu dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi yig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i khro bo dbyug sngon can de gshin rje'i dgra yi yum mtshungs dang/ /la(rgyud 'grel): yig dang ni 'khor lo las byung 'od
124b6(rgyud 'grel): zer can ma gser mtshungs 'khor lo dbyug ba dung dang ni/ /rin po che rnams phyag gis pad+mas 'dzin pa dang bcas shar sgo'i dbus su phag pa bdun gyis drangs/ /shing rta la gnas dri chu rnam par dag pa de dag zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /
124b7(rgyud 'grel): rmongs byed ma mtshungs raM yig mnga' dag las ni Tak+ki rA dza/ /wA(rgyud 'grel): yig tho ba las byung tsunda sku mdog dkar mo len pa'i/ /rang bzhin tho ba mdung dang pad+ma me long rnams 'dzin gshin rjer/ /rtas drangs shing rta la gnas de dag la ni rab tu
125a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /nga rgyal can mtshungs wAM yig gtun shing las byung mi g.yo ba ste/ rA(rgyud 'grel): yig mnga' dag las byung khro gnyer can la 'gro ba'i rang bzhin/ /mda' dang lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams ni phyag
125a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dmar mo/ /byang du seng ge'i shing rta la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal/ /rengs byed ma mtshungs laM yig dbyug tho dag las byung ba'i stobs chen/ /ya(rgyud 'grel): yig gtun shing las byung rdo rje lcags sgrog ma nyid nag mo/ /ral gri rdo rje dung dang dril bu
125a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dzin bshad pa'i rang bzhin/ /chu lhar glang chen shing rta la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal/ /kun tu bzang mo dang mtshungs hAM yig dang ni dpal gyi gri gug las byung gnod mdzes dang/ /hAM yig rdo rje las byung drag mig ma nyid ljang gu phyag
125a4(rgyud 'grel): gis sta ri rtse gsum dang/ /sbrul zhags snying gar 'dzin cing kha TwAM ga bcas kyis 'khyud 'og tu klu yi lag ldan pa'i/ /shing rta la gnas b+ha ga dri chu'i rang bzhin rnam dag la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs skyong dang mtshungs klu rnams kyis/ /
125a5(rgyud 'grel): dbu la gdeng ka lnga ru 'dod/ /'on kyang rgyal ba rnam rgyal gyis dbu la gdengs ka bdun du 'dod/ /hUM yig rdo rje las ni byung ba'i rgyal ba sku mdog ljang gu/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pa rdo rje chu skyes rin chen phyag rnams kun gyis/ /bzung ba rkang
125a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon mthe chung rnam par dag pa sngon mo dang bcas steng du nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal/ /sgo 'gram rnams su g.yo ba'i rtse mo can dang mchu dang sa rnams dkyil 'khor so so'i kha dog gis/ /shar la sogs
125a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i g.yon du dgod pa hya yig rgyal mtshan las byung karko Ta nyid nag po ni/ /ming med rnam par dag pa ci spyang gdong mas 'khyud dang h+raM yig bkra shis las byung chu bdag nyid/ /nyi ma dang mtshungs gung mo rnam par dag pa stag gdong
125b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang bcas la rim bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/ /hA yig chu skyes las byung dga' bo dkar po nyid/ /mdzub mo rnam par dag pa phag gdong ma 'khyud dang/ /hla yig 'khor lo las byung 'jog po ser po nyid/ /mthe bo rnam dag khyi gdong dang bcas la phyag
125b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /nub sogs g.yas su hlA yig 'khor las byung pad+ma chen po las byung pad+ma chen po ser po khwa gdong bcas/ /hA yig dag ni pad+ma dag las byung ba'i rigs ldan dkar po bya gdong bcas dang/ h+rA yig bkra shis las byung ltos 'gro dung skyed dmar po
125b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ug gdong ma dang bcas pa dang/ /hyA yig rgyal mtshan las byung pad+ma dkar min bya khyung gdong bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /k+ShuM yig rdo rje las byung rnam rgyal sngon po nyid/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa nyid kyi/ /rnam par dag pa rdo rje mig
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang bcas pa/ /'og tu ye shes la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon la ni des par gsal byed ka kha ga g+ha nga rnams thig le dang pa'i sa bon las byung mi 'dod ma rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste mnga' yi
125b5(rgyud 'grel): grangs rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la tsa Ta pa ta'i sde tshan rnams las rab tu byung/ /de ltar de rnams so so'i phyogs la lnga yi grangs kyi sa bon dang bcas so so'i phyag mtshan no/ /de ltar sa sde'i shar
125b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi ga-yon/ /'dod yon la ste ha ste byang/ /de las gzhan pa k+Sha yig las/ /'byung ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo la gnas lha nyid de rnams ma lus pa/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste spyan gsum dang ldan ma/ /phyag rgyas
125b7(rgyud 'grel): spras shing skra grol na bza' rnams dang bral/ /dpal gyi mgo ba'i phreng ba'i gri gug thod pa'i phyag /hA yig gri gug las byung rdo rje can ma nyid/ /ljang gu rgyan dang bcas pa g.yon pa'i mthe chung gi /rnam par dag pa'i sku mnga' steng gi
126a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nyid du/ /rkang brgyad ljang gu la ni gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi me dang rlung dkyil 'khor lo dag gi dbus kyi cha/ /ka sde brtsegs pa dang ni gri gug las byung khyi gdong ma/ /nag mo 'jog po dang ni
126a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa lha'i dbang po'i phyogs su/ /ral gri can dang 'khor lo dmar po la ni gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin k+Sha ya rA wa la dang/ gri gug las byung phag gdong dmar mo/ /dga' bo dang bcas lho yi phyogs su/ /dom dang 'khor lo
126a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin ha ya rA wa la dang/ /gri gug las byung stag gdong dkar mo/ /chu bdag dang bcas byang gi phyogs su/ /g.yas dang 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin th+ka sha Sha was dang/ /gri gug las byung ce spyang
126a4(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma/ /ser mo karko Ta bcas nub tu/ /seng ge 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /tu pu Tu tsu rnams dang gri gug las byung byang gi /dbang po 'ug pa bya rgod khwa rnams dang mtshungs pa'i bgegs can ser mo dkar mo dmar mo nag mo rnams
126a5(rgyud 'grel): ni pad+ma dung skyong dga' bo dang/ /pad+ma chen po dang bcas rlung dang 'phrog byed ster byed me mtshams rnams su shing rta'i tshogs bcom nas/ /longs spyod pa'i gzhon pa mig sngon bya long b+he ru Na Da dang 'khor lo dkar po gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /ha:
126a6(rgyud 'grel): yig gri gug las byung sngon mo kha dog sngo/ /rgyal ba dang bcas 'og tu rlung dang 'khor lo nyid/ /sngon po la gnas phyag 'tshal sngon ltar dgu po yang/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon sor mo rnam dag lha mo/ /a yig las byung zla ba dbang po'i phyogs gnas/ /a
126a7(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i snang byed bden bral la gnas/ /de dags yi dkyil 'khor gnas la phyag 'tshal/ /hUM yig dang ni aM yig oM yig ho(rgyud 'grel): yig rnams las byung ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dpal gyi bum pa bzang po mchog gi rnga dang/ /dpag bsam shing
126b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkar min dmar po dkar po ser po rnams ni/ /rim bzhin shar la sogs pa'i rta babs la gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyal ba mi bskyod pa la dpal ldan rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpas rgyas ni gdab par bya/ /de ni rgyal ba mi bskyod ste don grub rgyal ba nor bu'i phyag ldan de
126b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ /chu skyes phyag ldan de nyid 'khor lo can no yang ni de'i rgyal ba rnam par shes/ /spyi bo la gnas sgrib pa bral ba so so'i phyag rgya mdzad la dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang sreg byed chu dang sa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i khams rnams las byung bde
126b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa ji lta bu/ /de bzhin 'khor lo 'di las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ma lus pa nyid kyi/ /cod pan mchog las yang dag gnas pa de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa bya ba ni/ /de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'dod pa'i dri ma
126b4(rgyud 'grel): med par gsungs pa ltar/ /de las rgyal bam lus mchod pa'i don du spros pa'i 'od zer de rnams slar bkug ste rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje la zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sa bon gyi yi ge rnams la/ /de nas so so'i sa
126b5(rgyud 'grel): bon las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros pa ni/ oM ts+tsh+dzdzhh+nya badzra gand+he gand+hA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM ts+tsh+dzdzh+nyA badzra mA me ma lA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM TThDDh+Na badzra d+hU be d+hU pA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM TThDDh+Na badzra pra di pe pra dI pA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM p+phbb+hma badzrA mri te ne baidya pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM p+phbb+hmA
126b6(rgyud 'grel): badzrA k+Sha ta yak+Sha ta pha lA rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+na badzra la sye bastrA b+ha ra Na pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM Sh+ny+d+d+h+nA ha sye g+ha Na TA darsha pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+nga badzra wA dya wA te pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+ngA badzra nri tyi? nri tyi pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM snypShshth+ka gI ti gI ta pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM snypShshth+kA
126b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra ma me sarba bud+d+ha bod+hi satwA naM kro d+hA d+hI naM badzrA su ra ta pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ de ltar sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams la yid kyi mchod par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni sdig pa dpag med
127a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa rnams/ /so so nyid du bshags par bgyi/ /bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis dge ba dpag med gang byas pa/ /de rnams kun
127a2(rgyud 'grel): la rjes su yi rang ba dang sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su bzhugs par zhu/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnams la byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi de nas bdag nyid 'bul
127a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba ni/ /bdag gi ji srid len gyur lus 'bul sems can ma lus don phyin bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog /de ltar bdun rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ /de nas rtsa ba gsum dran par bya'o/ /pha
127a4(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /mi dge ba bcu yongs su spong ba bsgom par bya'o/ /sgrib pa lnga spong ba bsgom par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa bzhi spong ba
127a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /zag pa bzhi spong ba bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ de ltar bsgom la khams gsum g.yo ba dang brtan par byas pa rnams rnam par dpyad par bya ste/ /dngos med dngos por med pa ste/ de ltar dngos po'ang dngos por med/ /des na dngos
127a6(rgyud 'grel): po dngos med 'gyur/ /de phyir dngos po dmigs su med ces pa'o/ /de nas 'khor ba'i phung po yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar dang por 'dir brtul zhugs dang ldan pa lus? kyi dbus su chu yis me rnams bshig par
127a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /de nas me'i dngos po med pa las sa'i sra ba spangs nas tshwa bzhin du zhu ste/ chu'i dbus su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang chu rnams rlung gi skams te nam mkha' la thim par 'gyur ba ste/ /de ltar khams kyi tshogs rnams myur bar rnam par 'jig
127b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems dang me nyid mun pa'i mdza' zhes pa ni nam mkha' i khams kyi dbus kyi gnas so/ /yul dang bral ba zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun gzhi rnam par shes par gzung bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ /de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/
127b2(rgyud 'grel): oM tsu? n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra so b+ha bAt+ma ko haM oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM a nA bi saM skA ra dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa brjod la khams gsum po rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'i stong
127b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i don du mngal du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ni/ /nam mkha' i khams dpag pa las 'das pa bltas la/ sngon du
127b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi la sogs pa bsam mo/ /h+k+Sh+mlwryaM de nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus su gzhal yas khang bsam pa ni/ b+h+ruM yig gaM oM big yongs su gyur pa las thugs dang gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag
127b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid gru bzhi pa'i rten bsam par bya'o/ /de yang thugs kyi 'khor lo lar ba nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po gsum gyis bskor ba sgo bzhi pa kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rta babs bzhis brgyan pa/ /phyi rol tu 'dod yon dang rin chen pha gu
127b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa dang/ ba ku li dang kra ma shir Shas spras pa zla ba dang rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ me long dang/ rnga yab la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa/ de'i nang gi phyed ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste/ rdo rje'i phreng ba ka ba bcu
127b7(rgyud 'grel): drug gis spras pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyed ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas te rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i nyis 'gyur gsung gi 'khor lor ba lnga pa yis bskor ba'o/ /de ltar nyis
128a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gyi sgo bzhi la sogs pa rnga yab kyi bar gyis mdzes par byas pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo la de nyid nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis te/ ra ba lnga dang sgo bzhi la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'o/ /
128a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi shar dang me mtshams kyi sa bzhi nag po'o/ /lho dang bden bral gyi sa gzhi dmar po'o/ /nub dang rlung mtshams kyis gzhi ser po'o/ /byang dang dbang ldan gyi sa gzhi dkar po'o/ /phyi rol dus dang chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil
128a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ro/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba dang rdo rje'i me ri dang/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dur khrod chen po'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms la/ /phyag btsal pa'i tshigs su bcad par bshad pa'i
128a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs gnas rnams su gdan rnams ji lta ba bzhin du lha rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de rnams las thugs kyi 'khor lo la baM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang
128a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /pad+ma re re la rtsa ba dang rab dang 'dab ma dang/ ze 'bru dang lte ba rnams kyi sa bon rnams gzhung ches kyi dogs nas ma bris te de yang gzhan cung zad tsam brjod pa ni/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang ra ba dag las ya
128a6(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung ba'o/ /'dab ma dang ge sar dag u yig las byung ba'o/ /de'i dbus su lte ba la a yig zla ba'i gdan no/ /ra yig la nyi ma'i gdan no/ /de nas gtso bo'i pad+ma nyi shu rtsa lnga pa oM yig yongs su gyur pa las te/ zla ba dang/
128a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang/ sgra gcan dang/ dus me'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa bsgom par byas nas/ rdo rje shugs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ye shes lnga rdzogs pa dang/ phyag btsal
128b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo/ /de nyid du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud par bdag nyid bsams la/ /nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang/ rin po che la sogs
128b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchan ma blta bar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'o/ /de nas sbyor ba'i sgra mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bdag nyid kyi lus la gzhug par byas nas/ nam mkha' la sogs pa'i tshogs skyes bu dang rig ma dang/
128b3(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs pa dang/ yul rnams kyi rang bzhin lha rnams kyi rang bzhin du bskyed do/ /yang de rnams rang gi lus la phyung ste/ sna tshogs yum la ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas yang de ltar spros la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi lus la bcug la/ rang gi rdo rje las spros te rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma'i dbus su'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las lha nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang brten pa ste/ lhag pa'i gtso bor mi bskyod pa bsams nas/ /
