128b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gzhug bar bya zhes pa'o/ /de nas sngar gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid la gnas par byas nas de nas oM su bi shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma konyahaM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas
128b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la snying rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de yang de nyid las 'di ltar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo la ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' i cod pan can shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
128b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ de nas 'gro ba rigs dug gi gnas nas sems can thams cad bkug ste/ de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs par rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
129a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khams rnams dang bcas pa rnams rang gi snying gar zhu ste/ byang chub sems su zhu ba'i rang bzhin du gyur ba/ rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nas spros pa'i byang chub sems des/ sems can la dbang bskur bar bsam par
129a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer de rnams reg pas/ zhal gsum pa dang zhal sna tshogs pa dang/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha'i rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas gang bar bsgom par bya'o//
129a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas de rnams rang rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du skad cig gis blta bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyi sa bon rnams gsal byed sna tshogs 'dus pa dang dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams te/ 'dir gsal byed thams cad 'dus pa
129a4(rgyud 'grel): ra yig go /de nyid kyi gzhan yang shes par byed pas/ gang dang gang gi ming gi yi ge dang po de gsal byed de/ de ltar thams cad go bar bya'o/ /de yang 'di lta ste/ k+Sha/ k+Shi/ k+Sh+ri/ k+Shu/ k+Shli/ zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de bzhin
129a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lnga'o/ /de ltar k+Sha k+She k+Shar k+Sho k+Shal k+SheM zhes pa ni rna ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug go /de ltar k+ShA k+Shai k+ShAr k+Shau k+ShA la k+ShA(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni yul drug go /de ltar k+Shha k+Sh+ya k+Sh+ra k+Shpa k+Shla zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga ste/ de ltar khro mo rnams so//
129a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar k+Sh+nyA k+Sh+yA k+Sh+rA k+ShpA k+ShlA zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga'i yul lo/ /de ltar sems can thams cad mchan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par skad cig gis rdzogs par bya ba ni/
129a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la snying rjes dbang bskur ba byin la rang rang gi zhing la gshegs par bya zhes so/ /sku rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag go/ //de nas zhu ba gnas pa bsgom
129b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ lte ba dang gtsug tor la ho yig go /'di gnyis ka dbus su dgod pa dpral bar sku rdo rje oM yig go /mgrin par gsung rdo rje A(rgyud 'grel): yig go /snying gar thugs rdo rje hUM yig go /de ltar yi ge gsum
129b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ces pa'o/ /de ltar gzhan yang gsungs ba lte ba'i ho yig gi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bzhu ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bde mnyam pad+mar shes rab kyi chags pa zhu ba'i ri bong can bzhin du khyab
129b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa zhu bar gnas pa las/ sgrol ma la sogs pas bskul bas te/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms rnams kyi rang bzhin/
129b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ spyan ma ste/ lha mo rnams kyis bskul zhes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang de ltar gsungs pa/ spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i yum/ /rgyu mthun rnal 'byor la gnas pa/ bdag
129b5(rgyud 'grel): gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor las/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/ /mA ma kI bdag sring mo ste/ rnam smin rnal 'byor la gnas pa/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin las/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/ /
129b6(rgyud 'grel): gas dkar mo bdag bu mo ste/ /skyes bu'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin las/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/ /sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste/ bral ba'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa/ /bdag
129b7(rgyud 'grel): ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin pas/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/ /stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs dgongs kyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /'gro ba'i mgon pos spro
130a1(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod ces pas so/ /de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das stong par bzhugs pa glu yis rab tu bsad nas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams sgyu ma bzhin du bltas te/ yang bskyed par
130a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ces pas so/ /de nas de ltar rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur ba las/ rdzogs pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bsam ste/ glang po'i pags pa dang rgyas gdab dang klu rnams dgod pa'i sngags rnams
130a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs? nas/ sngar gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis rgyas 'dab pa dgod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas nang gi rgyas gdab pa dgod par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ 'dir gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor thig le las a yig las
130a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa'o/ /de ltar snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor las i yig las don yod grub pa'o/ /dpral par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor u yig las 'od dpag med do zhes pa ste/ mi mnyam pa'i rigs rnams mi mnyam pa'i 'khor lor ro/ /de
130a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar lte bar me la li yig las rnam par snang mdzad do/ /mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ri yig las rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /gsang bar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la a yig las rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o/ /de ltar lha rnams kyis
130a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab pa ni lus kyi rgyas gdab par nges pa'o/ /yang dag gi rgyas gdab pa ni lte bar lI yig go /snying gar u yig go /mgrin par rI yig go /dpral bar a'i yig go /gtsug tor ru A yig ste sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsam mo/ /
130a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sems kyis thig les rgyas gdab pa ni/ dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la oM yig go /mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la A(rgyud 'grel): yig go /snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la hUM yig go /lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor la ho
130b1(rgyud 'grel): yig go /de ltar ye shes kyis rgyas gdab pa ni/ chos thams cad byed pa dang bral ba'i sgo can/ /thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i bdag nyid/ /rdo rje nor bur a yig grub pa'o/ /de nas oM su b+hi shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa brjod la dkyil 'khor
130b2(rgyud 'grel): las dbyung ba'o/ /yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi don du sangs rgyas lnga'i
130b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rang gi lus la bcug la shes rab kyi pad+mar so so'i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bltas la/ de nas pad+ma nas snga ma ltar zhal dang/ phyag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid can/ ye shes dang/ thugs dang/ gsung
130b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sku'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya zhes pa ste/ de ltar dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba la ri bong can dang nyi ma dag rtse mo can rnams las hUM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ nag po 'od zer rnam pa snga 'phro bzhin pa
130b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ rdo rje de nyid kyi lte ba'i dbus su dza(rgyud 'grel): yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje lcags kyu bsams par bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid las sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rdo rje shugs yan lag brgyad pa'i shing rta la gnas pa
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rdo rje lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi rdo rje shugs yang dag par spro bar byas pas/ sngon du yang dag par grub pa'i khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs nas/ de nas rdo rje shugs rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o//
130b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas rmugs byed dang/ rengs byed dang/ nga rgyal can dang shin tu stobs can te khro bo bzhi rnams kyis 'gugs pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /yang de nyid las gsungs pa de ltar rnam par shes pa lnga yis te/ dza(rgyud 'grel): yig gis dgug pa dang/ hUM yig gi 
131a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa dang/ baM yig gis bcing ba dang/ ho(rgyud 'grel): yig gis dgyes par bya ba dang/ haM(rgyud 'grel): yig gis ro mnyam par byas nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje dril bu dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa rnams
131a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis shes pa'o/ /de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod nas/ sngon ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsgom par bya ba ni nges pa'o/ /phan tshun rgyas gdab pa ni/ phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad par gsungs pa'i rim pa
131a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni lha nyid kyi sku rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa bya ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ dpral bar a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du oM yig yongs su gyur pa las
131a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las sku rdo rje kha dog dkar po zhal gsum pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yon dmar po g.yas zhag po phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri dang dril
131a5(rgyud 'grel): bu dang nor bu rnams 'dzin pa shes rab dang bcas pa dpral ba nas/ spros te/ de yis nam mkha' i khams ma lus pa yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgoms nas/ sku rdo rje yis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos bstan par mdzad pa dang/ slar log ste bdag
131a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi sngon du bzhugs pa la rang dbang du blang bar bya ba ni/ sku rdo rje 'dzin pa ngag dbang bskur zhes pas so/ /de nas sku'i rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur ba dang/ de nas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ni/ dpral bar zla ba'i
131a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sku rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang/ /bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par/ /myur bar sku yi rdo rje mdzod/ /phyogs bcud phyogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
131b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par/ /myur bar sku yi rdo rje mdzod/ /ces pa ni sku byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de ltar mgrin par ri yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du a yig
131b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las gsung rdo rje dmar po dang bcas pa zhal dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po rnams so/ /g.yas kyi pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje dang 'khor lo rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi rin
131b3(rgyud 'grel): po che dang dril bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa/ spros pa nam mkha' i khams ma lus pa gang bar rnam par bsgoms nas/ gsung rdo rje yis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa dang/ slar log sta bdag nyid sngon du bzhugs
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la dbang blang par bya ba ni/ /gsung rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur zhes pas so/ /de nas gsung gi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsgom/ /gsung byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni/ mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
131b5(rgyud 'grel): la gsung rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal ldan gsung gi rdo rje 'chang/ /bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsung thob par/ /myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
131b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par/ /myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod/ /ces pa ni gsung byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de ltar snying gar thig le yongs su gyur pa las sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i
131b7(rgyud 'grel): steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa las thugs rdo rje sngon po shes rab dang bcas pa ste/ zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po rnams so/ /g.yas kyi rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma rnams
132a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ g.yon rnams kyi dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa/ de spros te nam mkha' i khams ma lus pa yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas/ /thugs rdo rjes 'dul bas sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa dang/
132a2(rgyud 'grel): spar log ste bdag nyid kyi sngon du zhugs pa la dbang blang bar bya ba ni/ /thugs rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur zhes pa'o/ /de nas thugs kyi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyi bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsams nas/ thugs byin gyis brlabs par bya ba
132a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ thugs kar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje bcug nas/ /'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang/ /bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob pas/ /myur bar thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod/ /
132a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par/ /myur bar thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod/ /ces pas de ltar thugs byin gyis brlab par byas nas 'dir ro gcig tu bya ba ni/ /
132a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas de ltar bya'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi lte bar ho(rgyud 'grel): yig gis so/ /gsang bar ha(rgyud 'grel): yig gis so/ /spyi gtsug du haM yig te/ thabs kyi glu? ba'i chos dang rigs
132a6(rgyud 'grel): drug go zhes so/ /de nas 'dir gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ba ste/ de yang dri ma med pa las gsungs pa/ 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa thams cad du lus rdzogs pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go /ngag rdzogs pa ni las rgyal mchog
132a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ las kyi dbang po'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le rdzogs pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ste/ byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i phyir ro/ /bde ba la dmigs pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ste/ /de yang mi rnams kyi
132b1(rgyud 'grel): lo bcu drug gi mdza' ru'o/ /de'i phyir de'i longs spyod pa'i don du bag ma len pa'i dus su log pa gtod par byed pa dang/ slob pa la slob dpon gyis shes rab gtong par byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya de'i sgrub byed du/ /byis pa'i skye bo rnams la
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni bar ma rnams la'o/ /phyag rgya chen mo ni mchog gi rnal 'byor ba rnams la'o zhes pa'o/ /de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bcu drug lo ste rigs can ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ma/ /dang por
132b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bslab byas nas/ /dbang bskur bsgrub pa nas brtsams nas/ /sku gsung thugs su chags pa dang/ /dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod/ /ha ha gsang ba gtsug tor du/ /de nas pad+ma rnams sbyangs bya/ /a las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /hUM las rdo rje dang
132b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /de ltar rdo rje dang bcas pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi rgyud nyid do/ /hUM las bdag gi rdo rje nyid/ /rtse mo lnga par bsam par bya/ /de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /a yig las ni rab tu brtags/ /de ltar pad bcas rdo rje nyid/ /pad+ma la ni gzhag par bya/ /hUM
132b5(rgyud 'grel): phaT brjod cing rnal 'byor pas/ /mngal tu rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyu/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab gnas pas/ /byang chub sems ni spro mi bya/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
132b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga bsregs te/ /mig dang spyan ma la sogs pa/ /bsregs te ri bong can haM 'dzag /zhu ba'i chos can bdud rtsi nyid/ /thig le gzugs kyis 'dzag pas na/ /thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dzin/ /cha med cha las
132b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ni/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'dzin/ /pha mo'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad/ /rgyu mthun la sogs steng du 'gro/ /dung can ma ni phyag rgya che/ /de ni gtum mor rab tu bstan/ /lte ba'i steng du g.yung mo ste/ /a ba d+hU tI mi sna ldan/ /'od zer
133a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi rang bzhin srog /dkyil 'khor lnga ni rgyu phyed pa/ /sna rtser yungs dkar tsam du bstan/ /de yang srog sdud pa ru brjod/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /srid pa gsum po yongs su shes/ /srog nyid 'gag pa
133a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyang/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo yungs dkar tsam/ /so sor sdud pas phyag rgya che/ /nam mkha' stong pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /sna ldan de ni rab brtan pa/ /gang gi yid gnyis brtags pa yis/ /de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ /mtshan mo'i mdza' du
133a3(rgyud 'grel): ri mo gang/ /de'i gzugs ni g.yo mi ga-yo/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan la sogs pa/ /de rnams ma lus bsgom par bya/ /zhes pas so/ /de yang 'dir drang ba'i don du g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa spro zhing
133a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par shes par bya'o/ /de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ /khams gsum po lan gcig gis 'gugs par byed ces pa ni/ /skad gcig gis dus gsum mkhyen pa/ /lha'i rnal 'byor te/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha'i rnam par spro
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'khor ba pa rnams kyis kyang byang chub kyi sems las bu dang bu mo spro ba ste/ de ltar lo bcu drug gi mthar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi lus dang/ ngag dang yid dang sems rnams rdzogs pa'o/ /lha rnams ni rnam par thar pa bzhi'i
133a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis te/ 'dir kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag las yang drang pa'i don du shes rab kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi sna'i rtse mo las yungs kar la sogs pa'i nges pa dang/ 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa mngal du rgyu ba ste/
133a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su oM dz+nyA na bU dzA nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ /lo bcu drug gi mtshams nas ye shes kyi mchod pa la rjes su chags pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dus
133b1(rgyud 'grel): su yang de'i rang bzhin bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs par zhes pa'o/ /nges pa'i don du sngags bzlas pa ni srog mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ dgang ba dang dbyung ba dang/ bum pa can gyi sbyor ba la dus thams cad bsnyen par byas pas/ de nyid
133b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ srog ma bsdams pa dang/ ngag gi brjod pa dang bcas pas nges pa'i don la ma yin te/ des na sgrub pa'i thabs kyis bye brag sbyor ba'i yan lag drug mdor bstan pa tsam las ma bris pa ni gzhung ches kyis dogs pa'o//
133b3(rgyud 'grel): drang don ltar na thun mong sgrub pa'i don du phreng ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas pa ste/ de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa la phyogs pas mu tig gam shel gyi phreng ba dang bcas pas bsngags bzlas pa ni/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag drug gi sngags 'di
133b4(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ oM h+rAM h+rIM h+rIM h+rUM h+rlIM h+rAM swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di'i mthar na mo bcug pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lha rnams gshegs par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ 'dir dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ thig le'i rnal 'byor dang/ phra mo'i
133b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rnams bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ste/ bstod pa bya ba ni/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dug/ /ces pa la sogs pas bstod nas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /gtsug tor du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms pa
133b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de'i lte ba la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse dgu pa bsgoms pa dang/ de'i lte ba la du nga la sogs pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar dpral bar
133b7(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo bcu bdun pa bsgoms pa dang/ de'i lte ba la phung po dang khams kyi lha rnams gshegs par bya'o/ /de ltar mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgoms pa dang/ de'i lte ba la skye
134a1(rgyud 'grel): mched bcu gnyis kyi khro bo rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa bsgoms pa dang/ de'i lte ba la tsa muN+Da la sogs pa dang/ 'jigs byed ma la sogs pa'i
134a2(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar gsang bar rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgoms pa dang/ de'i lte ba la 'od zer can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar las kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so
134a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa rnams bsgoms pa dang/ /phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad par gsungs pa ltar khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lha bcu gnyis 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /de rnams kyi lte ba rnams la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de ltar las kyi 'khor
134a4(rgyud 'grel): lo rnams la rdo rje rtse mo bdun pa rnams bsgoms pa dang/ klu rnams dang khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams lte ba rnams la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
134a5(rgyud 'grel): lo bsgom par mi nus pa'i gang zag dbang po mdza' ma 'ga' zhig gis/ sngon du gsungs pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i lha mo
134a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang/ bum pa brgyad dang/ chos kyi dung la sogs pa bzhi rnams spangs pa ni/ dpal ldan snying po'i 'khor lo ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid 'gyur ro mi'i bdag po kye zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor
134a7(rgyud 'grel): lo'i bzhugs pa ste/ de'i tshe dpal 'dus pa bzhin 'gyur ro zhe na/ 'dir nges pa med de rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das rang sems nus ma dang ldan 'dir yang shes par byas la rnal 'byor rnams kyis ni sgrub pa po
134b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /dbang gi don du rigs kyi dbang las phyi'i dkyil 'khor bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /yang 'dir sngon du gsungs pa ltar lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa la sogs pa rnams gshegs
134b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar bsgom par bya ste/ der gshegs su gsol bar byas nas/ de nas oM hUM phaT zhes pa'i nga rgyal byas pa dang/ gtor ma sbyin no/ /de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas mtshams gsum du gtor ma sbyin par
134b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas dam tshig gis rdzas rnam par dag par byas la/ lha'i chogs rnams mnyes par bya ba'i don du gtor ma 'bul ba ni/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho/ rim par gnas pas dang po 'dir ni rtag tu ngag bya sel bar bya ba dang/
134b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu spang bya nyid dang ri bong can zhu ma lus rim pas chang la bsgom par byas la/ /snod de las ni nges par ri bong can gyi lag pa'i ming med rtse mo la thig le nyid/ nyi phyed dang ni mtshungs pa'i dbus su zlum po yin te de'i phyi ru gru gsum byas pa
134b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i dbus su ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum pa la gnas pa yang sngags pa rnams kyis 'dir bsgoms nas/ mthe bong dang ni srin lag gi /nyi ma so so'i dus su tshim pa la sogs bya ba ni/ 'dir ni sngon du yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la ra ba
134b6(rgyud 'grel): po dbus mdza' i ming gi gtor ma dbul/ 'phrog ma la yang tshangs pa gnyis/ gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i ched du sngags pas gtor ma'o/ /pho nya rnams la zad kyi rtse mo sa stengs rnams su bzhag ste/ khyab bdag rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin/ /zos pa'i
134b7(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma 'byung po rnams la sbyin te gzhan yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshig gcad brjod/ /nyal ba'i dus su 'khrigs pa'i mchod pa byas nas yan lag kha dang gnyis kyi rigs rnams nyid dang ni/ /rang gi mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang
135a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo'i 'khor lo rnams la rdo rje'i yan lag dgod ces pa ste/ de nas a yig las byung ba'i bum pa gsum mo/ /de rnams kyi steng du oM yig las byung ba'i thod pa'o/ /nang na gnas pa ni phung po dang khams kyi sa bon
135a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga rnams so/ /de rnams kyi 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbar ba'i me bzhu bar bya'o/ /de nyid hUM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje dkrug par bya'o/ /de dang bcas pa'i ro gcig tu gyur pas zla ba zhu
135a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs su blta'o/ /de nas rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags/ /oM oM badzra tsan+d+ra sarba d+harmmA su bi shud+d+ha:swa b+ha ba sarba d+ha rmAM bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ oM a:badzra sUrya sarba d+harmmA pra b+ho d+ha ka sarba d+harmAM pra b+ho d+ha ya swAhA/ oM hUM badzrA na la sarba
135a4(rgyud 'grel): d+harmma pra dI pa ka sarba d+harmmA pra di pa ya swAhA/ oM ho sarba d+harma badzrA mri ta ka ra sarba d+harmAM badzra mri taM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa rnams kyi lag pa g.yon pas rnam par dgab par bya ba dang/ lag pa g.yas pas spel bar bya ba dang/ thal mos kha bcad de
135a5(rgyud 'grel): reg pas rab tu spar bar bya ba dang/ rdo rje bya khyung gi rgyas rdo rje bdud rtsir bya'o/ /gzhan yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas yul gyis bdag po spyan drang bar bya ba dang/ khyi'i phyag rgyas grong gi bdag po rnams la'o/ /rtse lnga pa'i phyag
135a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas khro bo'i rgyal po rnams la'o/ /gri gug gi phyag rgyas zad par rnams la'o/ /ral gri'i phyag rgyas lha mo rnams la'o/ /rin po che'i phyag rgyas gza' rnams la'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas klu rnams la'o/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'byung po rnams
135a7(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /de yang oM A:hUM a mu kA gats+tshA gats+tsha shI g+h+raM i daM ba liM grih+na grih+na b+hug twA pI twA tri pa tidkri twa sarba satwA nI shAn+tI tsit+taM kritwA pa ras+thA naM gats+tsha gats+tsha swAhA/ zhes pa gtor ma'i sngags 'dis yul gyi bdag po dang/ grong gi bdag po 'am de ltar
135b1(rgyud 'grel): yul lam/ grong gi ming gi yi ge gang yang rung ba gsum dang lnga dang bdun yin na/ de yang ming gi yi ge dang po dang/ dbus dang mdza' ma rnams bcug ste/ gtor ma sbyin no/ /gal te de gnyis dang bzhi dang/ drug la sogs pa mnyam pa'i ming gi
135b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge yin na/ dang po mdza' ma bcug la sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas sngon du spros pa'i khro bo la sogs pa rnams la bltas la/ ji lta ba bzhin sngags kyi rkang pa rnams brjod la/ oM A:hUM ho uSh+NI Sha sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha big+h+nAn+ta ka nI la daN+Da pradz+nyAn+ta ka/
135b3(rgyud 'grel): Tak+ki rA dzA pad+man+ta ka/ a tsa la/ ya man+ta ka /ma hA ba le b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba ling+ga nd+haM puShpaM d+hU paM dI paM ak+Sha taM/ da dA ma he/ te tsA gatya sa pa ri wA re(rgyud 'grel): shI g+h+raM i daM ba liM grih+nan tu/ khA dan tu/ pi wan+tu dza:huM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): saM tri pa tA(rgyud 'grel): sarba
135b4(rgyud 'grel): satwA naM shAn+ti duSh+Ti rak+ShA ba ra Na gupti kurban+tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /de ltar oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho A kA sha ba yu te dzo dpri thi bI sA d+hi de b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba liM gand+haM puShpaM/ d+hU paM/
135b5(rgyud 'grel): dI pa mak+Sha taM da dA ma he/ te tsA gatya sa pa ri wA rA sh+rI g+h+raM i daM ba liM grih+nan+tu/ kha dan+tu bi wan+tu dza(rgyud 'grel): huM baM ho/ saM tri pa tA/ sarba satwA naM shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA wa ra Na guptiM kurban+tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa la sogs pa zad par rnams kyi gtor
135b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags so/ /de ltar oM A hUM ho brahma bi k+Shu nai ri tya bA yu ya mAgni sa mu dre shwa ren+d+ra yak+She b+hya/ sa pa ri wA ra b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba liM gand+haM puShpaM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM da dE ma he/ te tsA gatya sa pa ri wA ra/ sh+rI g+h+raM i daM ba liM grih+nan tu khA dan+tu pi wAn+tu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM
135b7(rgyud 'grel): baM ho(rgyud 'grel): saM tri pa tA(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwA naM shAn+ti puSh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra Na gupta kurban+tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa ni phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /de ltar oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho rA hu kA lAgni tsan+d+ra sUrya bu d+ha mi ga la shukra bri ha spa ti ke tu sha ne
136a1(rgyud 'grel): b+hya:sa pA ri wA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba liM gand+haM/ puShbaM/ d+hU paM dI paM/ ak+Sha taM/ dA da mahe/ te tsA gatya sa pa ri wA rA:shI g+h+raM/ i daM ba liM grih+nan+tu khA daN tu/ pi wAn+tu/ dza:hUM baM ho:saM tri ba tA:sarbA satwA nAM shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA ba rA Na guMptiM
136a2(rgyud 'grel): kurban+tu hUM hUM phaT/ badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni gza' rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /de ltar oM A:hUM ho dza ya bi dza ya pad+ma garko Ta ka bA su ka shaM kha pA la ku li kA nan+ta tak+Sha ka mahA padme b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA re b+hya/ i daM ba liM gand+haM puShpaM/ d+hU
136a3(rgyud 'grel): paM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM da dA mahe/ te tsa a gatya sa pa ri wA rA:shI g+h+raM i daM/ ba liM grih+nan tu khA dan+tu pi wAn+tu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): saM tri pa tA(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwA nAM/ shAn+tiM puSh+TiM/ rak+ShA ra Na gub ti kur ban tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+hA ra Adz+nya pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa ni klu rnams
136a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /de ltar oM a:hUM ho be tA Da bi kri ta mu kha shwa kA kA sU ka ra gri d+h+ra bya g+h+ro lU ka dza bu ka ga ru Da mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba li gan d+haM/ puShpaM/ d+hu paM/ dI paM/ bAk+Sha taM/ dA da ma he/ de tsA gatya sa pa ri wA re(rgyud 'grel): shI g+h+raM/ i daM/
136a5(rgyud 'grel): ba li grih+nan+tu kha dan+tu pi wan+tu dza:hUM baM ho/ saM tri pa tA/ sarba satwA naM shan+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra Na gupti kurpan+tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+ha ra dz+nyA pa yi ta swAhA/ zhes pa ni 'byung po rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/
136a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su/ gsang ba'i 'khor lor haM yig las khro bo'i 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o/ /gtsug tor du aM yig las zad par stong pa la sogs pa'o/ /dpral bar i yig las phyogs skyong gi 'khor lo'o/ /mgrin par
136a7(rgyud 'grel): ri yig las gza'i 'khor lo'o/ /snying gar u yig las klu'i 'khor lo'o/ /lte bar li yig las 'byung po'i 'khor lo rab tu gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni/ gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o// //mgon po byis pa blo dman rnams
136b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dran phyir/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po nyid kyi bsgrub thabs/ /las ni phyung bas de'i phyir na yab dang/ mtshungs pa gang zhig mi gtsigs pa la bzod pa ltar du/ /bdag la rab tu brtse bas thugs rjes brlan pa bzod par mdzod cig /de ltar
136b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/ /sprul pa pad+ma dkar pos yang dag par mdzad pa'i dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyung ba/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so//
136b3(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi 'khor lo ba chen po paN+Di ta sA d+hu pu tra yis paN+Di ta chen po d+harmA ka shAn+ti'i don du mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po wA gi shwar gupta pa dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos rab bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o//
136b4(rgyud 'grel): (dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs so//) // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kA la tsakra maN+Da lo pa yi kA bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo//
136b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rnam par mkhyen pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu 'joms par mdzad pa yi/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin khyab bdag dpal ldan dus 'khor nges par gzhan gyi don mdzad la/ /phyag byas sems can don phyir rgyud gsungs
136b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga nyid/ /rang gi don dang 'on kyang gzhan don du yang 'gyur bas yid la 'dod pa sgrub byed bshad/ /'dir thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i mun pa'i tshogs kyis blo'i mig bsgribs pas mi bden pa'i lam nas
136b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i sems can gyi tshogs sdug bsngal spyod pa bsal bar nus par yang dag par mthong bas/ /snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa thob pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge tshul lam khyim na gnas pa rnams sam/ snying rje dang ldan
137a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa mngon por shes pa med pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang por bsnyen gnas kyi bslab pa la gnas pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i lam
137a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis de rnams kyi spobs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bzung ba ni/ /de yang slob ma dam pa rnams kyis gsol ba gdab pa dang/ dge ba'i nyi ma la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi
137a3(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi yongs su brtag par bya ste/ de yang grong khyer la sogs pa'i dbang ldan dang/ byang phyogs su zhi ba dang rgyas pa'o/ /shar dang me'i mtshams su dbye ba dang bskrad pa'o/ /bden bral dang lho phyogs su dbang dang dgug pa'o/ /nub dang
137a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung du rengs pa dang rmongs pa'o/ /grong khyer la sogs pa'i dbus su las thams cad pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ste/ de yang dbus cung zad mtho ba la shar dang byang cung zad gzhol ba'i sa gzhi ru bzung bar bya ba ni de yang dbye ba la bzhi ste/ bram ze dang
137a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs rnams kyis dbye bas kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams kyis shes par bya'o/ /zhi ba dang rgyas pa la dkar po'o/ /dbang dang dgug pa la dmar po'o/ /rengs pa dang rmongs pa la ser po'o/ /bsad
137a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bskrad pa la nag po'o/ /ro thams cad dang/ dri thams cad dang nam mkha' i khams rnam par dag pa las thams cad pa la ljang gu'o/ /der ni dong brus de nyid kyis/ myur bar dong nyid rab tu dgang/ /gal te dgang bar gyur pa na/ /
137a7(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi de nyid dge bar shes/ /slar yang dong de mtho gang tsam/ /bru bar byas te chus bkang la/ /gom pa brgya ru 'gro bar bya/ /'ongs nas blta bar byas pa dang/ /gang bar gyur nas sa gzhi dge /dma' na dge bar mi 'dod spang/ /tshu
137b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid sgra dang bcas tsam gyis/ /klu yi 'jigs sogs go bar bya/ /zhes pa ni sa gzhi brtag pa'o/ /de ltar slob dpon gyis sa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya la/ /dpyid zla 'dra'i bo dang dpyid zla ba chung ngam/ /zla ba gzhan rnams kyi tshes lnga
137b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am bcu la gdug pa'i gza' la 'jug pod la sogs pa dang bral ba'i dus kyi snga dro la/ /khru bzhi tsam ba lang gi lci bas byugs te/ /dkyil 'khor du brtags pa'i sa gzhi'i cha'i dbus su shar du kha phyogs te bsdad la lha'i rnal
137b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la gnas te/ de na gnas pa'i zhing skyong rnams la me tog la sogs pas mchod nas/ /'di na gnas pa'i lha klu dang/ gnod sbyin srin po 'am ni gzhan de nyid rnams la sa gzhi slong/ /dkyil 'khor don du de gsol cig /ces
137b4(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du brjod nas gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas dag pa la sogs pa byas la/ /grong gi ming ngam rang rang gi ming dang sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin no/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM a mu ka sya sa pa ri wA rA ya/ i daM ba liM gand+haM puShbaM d+hU paM dI
137b5(rgyud 'grel): baM ak+Sha taM bA ma he sa pa ri wA ra(rgyud 'grel): shI g+h+raM a gats+tsha tu dza:hUM baM ho:ai daM ba liM grih+Na tu khA daM tu pi waM tu sa pa ri wA rA ka sarba satwA naM shAn+tiM puShtiM rak+ShA wA ra Na gu pa ti ka ro twi daM swA ni tyak+tA bA hya maN+Da la b+hu myi tiSh+Tha tu huM hUM phaT badzra d+ha rA dzrA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa
137b6(rgyud 'grel): ni zhing skyong gshegs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i cho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms te bgegs bsreg pa dang bskrad pa dang gdab pa rnams byas pa dang/ khro bo'i cho gas spros la phyogs bcu bsrungs nas sa'i lha
137b7(rgyud 'grel): mo spyan drang bar bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni rang gi snying gar zla ba dang sa gzhi la yang pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la lAM yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo ser po'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las sa'i lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma g.yas na 'khor lo dang
138a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dang/ rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon na mdung dang lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams 'dzin pa na bza' ser mo dang rin po ches brgyan par bsams la/ /thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sngon du gsungs pa'i
138a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ltar/ dza:hUM baM ho zhes pa'i sngags kyis spyan drangs te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' gcig tu byas nas yon chab snod chu dang dri la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i yon chab dbul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
138a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ lha'i bdag po dang bcas bdud sde rgyal bas bcom dus lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur pa'i tshe/ khyed la lha yi mchog gi mchod dang phyag rgyas bzhes pa'i phyir ni deng yi yon chab 'di yang bzhes/ /zhes pas bstod la/ /byang chub rgyu
138a4(rgyud 'grel): la stobs mchog ldan pa'i bdud kyi sde rnams rgyal bas bcom pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /de bzhin bdag kyang slob ma rnams kyi dbang gi don du bdud kyi stobs rnams 'jig par byed pa'o/ /zhes pas gsol ba btab la sngags 'dis
138a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod do/ /oM laM A:hUM ba surd+ha ra sarba bud+d+ha dza na ni sarba sa two pa kA ri Ni badzra satwA dz+nyA pa ya ti shI g+haM mA gats+tshA gats+tshe daM go d+haM puShpaM d+hU paM dI paM nai pe tyaM pha lA k+Sha te da dA mi tA wa twa me wa grih+Na grih+Na maN+DaM lArthaM ma mas+thA naM da dA sarba satwa naM shan+tiM puSh+TiM kri to su b+ha
138a6(rgyud 'grel): tsit+te ne daM s+thA nAM tyak+tA pa ra spA naM gats+tsha gats+tsha swAhA/ zhes pa ni sa'i lha mo gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyogs bcu na nam mkha' i khams khyab par bltas la yon chab la sogs pa
138a7(rgyud 'grel): byin nas me tog la sogs pas mchod la/ de rnams la rab tu gsol ba gdab pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang sdig pa bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyogs rnams la bzhugs gang dag btsun mor bcas/ /snying rje mchog ldan
138b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnams kyis bdag la dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur don du skyabs su gsol zhes bas so/ /de nas bgegs dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya'o/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje phur

143a2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i gzugs su bsams la zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i don du 'bras sam rde rgyus sam tsandan dkar pos byugs/ lha rnams kyi mtshan ma bri/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chu dang rin po che lnga dang/ sman lnga dang 'bru lnga rnams
143a3(rgyud 'grel): nang du'o/ /mdzes pa'i shing dang ldan pa/ mgrin par ras zung gis dkris pa bla re'i 'og chu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon gyis dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pa ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dri zhim po'i maN+Dal ji ltar
143a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa'i gdan so sor byas pa'i steng du mdun du bzhag go /de yang ras kyi skud pa dkar/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du dkri/ /zhes pa 'di'i 'dod pa ltar na hUM lan bdun brjod pa'i skud pas oM badzra she kha re du Dma Ta dI shAM b+hand+ha band+ha hUM/
143a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyi dkri bar bya'o/ /da ni nang gi 'bru bcud rnams bstan pa/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ zla ba chu shel dang/ karke Ta dang ke ke ru rnams dang/ gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rnon po dang khab len te lcags rnams
143a6(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin mu tig dang byu ru dang/ mu men dang shU la ma ni dang/ thig le drug pa rnams ni 'bring po'o/ /shel dang mchod dang gzi dang mching bu dang/ nor bu sngo ba sangs rnams ni tha ma'o/ /de rnams med na dri zhim po'i me tog kha
143a7(rgyud 'grel): dog lnga yis so/ /yang brahma daN+Di cha gnyis dang biSh+Nu krAn+ta cha gcig dang/ ru tra dza TA cha gsum dang/ a'i shA ri cha bzhi dang/ de wA DA li cha lnga la sogs pa rnams so/ /yang til dang nas dang sran ma ma Sha dang so ba dang/ go la sogs
143b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so/ /yang sgyur shing dang na ga ge sar dang/ mya ngan med dang byang chub shing dang/ u dumpA ra la sogs pa'i shing rnams so/ /yang ras ni sngon po dang/ nag po dang dmar po dang/ dkar po dang ser po dang rnams so/ /rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la sna

147b7(rgyud 'grel): spangs par lha'i snam bu'i thig go /snam bu de las pad+ma cha bzhi pa ste 'on kyang phyogs la gnas pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi rtsegs gnyis pa'i ma nga a ba ra Na dang ka ba gnyis kyi cha phyed byed pa bsal la cha bzhi'i gnas
148a1(rgyud 'grel): la dgod par bya'o/ /lha mo rnams med na snga ma ltar ro/ /de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu las cha gcig spangs la rtsa ba'i thig go /de yang thig gsum zur thig gi bar du'o/ /rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs thig
148a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gi g.yas g.yon gyi cha drug drug bsubs pas sgo rnams so/ /de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi par rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
148a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i phyogs kun tu cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas la gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa la sogs pa kra ma shir Sha'i bar phyi mnan te gnas so/ /de'i phyi rol du cha bcu spangs te thig go/
148a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig cha bcu gnyis la'o/ /lha'i snam bu la pad+ma bcu gnyis te so so la cha bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de ltar de rnams cha bdun dang ldan par byas la dbus kyi cha la lte ba'o/ /dang po rnams 'dab ma bzhi pa'o//
148a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa rnams 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /gsum pa rnams 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o/ /de ltar gsum pa la 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /lha rnams kyis snam bu'i thig las cha gnyis pa spangs pa rtsa ba'i thig ste thig gsum zur gyi
148a6(rgyud 'grel): bar ro/ /rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs pa'i thig gi g.yas dang g.yon rnams su cha bcu gnyis bcu gnyis snga na ltar bsubs pa'i sgo'i tshad do/ /de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi mthar thug pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
148a7(rgyud 'grel): sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur gyi tshad do/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang rnams su cha bcu gnyis la shing rta gnas so/ /de nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ /de
148b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sa'i dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas me ri'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ /de ltar pad+ma'i dkyil
148b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bdun rnams rim pa bzhin bskor ba ni me ri'i phyi'i bar du lte ba'i phur bu la btags te de ltar brgyad do/ /gal te de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bri ba ma grub na dbang gi don du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor tsam
148b3(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang dbang gi don nam dkyil 'khor gyi don du rigs kyi dbang las phyi'i 'khor lo rab tu bral bar 'gyur zhes so/ /yang de bzhin du sgo la hi(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung khro bo'i lta ba yis shes pa'i bka' stsal gyi
148b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi cha byad gzung ste/ thar pa'i sgo sgrib pa'i rnam par bcings pa bsal ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas g.yon dang g.yas kyi mig dag tu hi(rgyud 'grel): yig las zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la khro bo'i lta bas thams cad du blta zhing hi(rgyud 'grel): hi:
148b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing rtsa ba'i thig la sogs pa rang rang gi shes rab kyis brtags la dbyi bar bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa sngon du song ba dang/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol ba ni nam mkha' la gnas
148b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kar ro/ /kha dog lnga'i skud pa gnas gang yang rung par gzhag par bya'o/ /'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// //de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ a
148b7(rgyud 'grel): i ri u li'i sa bon rnams las rdzogs pa'i tshon gyi bye breg kha dog lnga rnams rim pa bzhin du/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho haM k+Sha(rgyud 'grel): rnams las rdzogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la nam mkha' la
149a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas oM yig la sogs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs rnams skud pa sbyangs pa'i dus ltar bkug ste gzhug go /de nas bcas pa ro
149a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu gyur pa ye shes kyi tshon de rnams la oM yig la sogs pa'i sngags brjod nas yang oM badzra tsitra sa ma ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de ltar 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyi so so la hi(rgyud 'grel): yig bkod de yang dag par sbyar ro//
149a3(rgyud 'grel): yang oM raM dzo bahu la ye nas twe nas twe bud+d+ha shtsa b+ha ga wAn+ta(rgyud 'grel): satwa rA gA nu rak+ta ste na sa tye na sa ra dzo dzwa la tu/ zhes pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis spang bar bya'o/ /de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyi dka' thub kyi 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
149a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phur bu hUM zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing gdon par bya zhing rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la blos thim par bsam mo/ /khung bu tshon sna lnga yis dgang bar byas pa dang/ dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje'i glu glangs te mtshan ma ngan
149a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bcos nas/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ sems can khams rnams rab tu sgrol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po khyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par grol/ /'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag
149a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag par bsgoms nas/ dang por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad la lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje 'chang bas byas la/ /oM badzra raM ga sa ma ya hUM zhes pa 'am/ yi ge drug pa brjod cing
149a7(rgyud 'grel): byang shar mtshams nas brtsams te shar du kha phyogs bas rab gsum bri bar bya'o/ /de yang/ sbom bos nang byed pa dang re kha ngan dang phra bas rdzas rnams bri bar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos
149b1(rgyud 'grel): maM yi bdag po skye bor bcas pa bskrod de de bzhin du/ /mtshan ma dang ni nyi ma zla ba chad na 'jig 'joms sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min/ /rdul mtshon rnam par 'dres pas rigs dag 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni
149b2(rgyud 'grel): rig par bya/ /zhes pa'i don ni bdag nyid kyis te gzhan gyis kyang de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /'dir gtso bo'i zhal gyi dbye bas phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba la tshon gyi kha dog bye brag ste/ de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo'i nang gi rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa'i bar
149b3(rgyud 'grel): nag po'o/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku rnams kyi sa gzhi nag po'o/ /lho rnams dmar po'o/ /byang rnams dkar po'o/ /nub rnams ser po'o/ /'dod g.yon rnams dkar po'o/ /rin chen pha gu rnams dmar po'o/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang bku li dang
149b4(rgyud 'grel): kra ma shir Sha rnams dkar po ste bzhi nag po'o/ /rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ser po'o/ /las thams cad pa la gtso bo'i pad+ma ljang gu'o/ /zhi ba la sogs pa la dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba nag po'o/ /ka ba rnams ni shar du
149b5(rgyud 'grel): ral bri nag po rnams so/ /lhor rin po che dmar po rnams so/ /byang du pad+ma dkar po rnams so/ /nub tu 'khor lo ser po rnams so/ /pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa brgyad po dkar po pad+ma'i 'dab ma la kha phyogs pa'o/ /pad+ma thams cad kyi lte ba sum
149b6(rgyud 'grel): cha pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa ljang gu'o/ /lha'i snam bu rnams dkar po'o/ /rab gsum ni dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po rnams so/ /ra ba de rnams kyi sa'i cha dgu las cha re re dor te cha gnyis gnyis la ra ba'o/ /sgo khyud rnams su rin po
149b7(rgyud 'grel): che rdo rjes spras pa'o/ /rta babs rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi snam bu dkar po'o/ /de nyid la pad+ma brgyad pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang bral ba'i phyogs rnams dmar po'o/ /mtshams rnams dkar po'o/ /
150a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ba lnga ni nang nas rim gyis ljang gu dang/ nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ser po rnams so/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor ni gsung dang mtshungs pa las rta babs kyi ka ba'i 'og rtsig pa'i rtsar gdengs ka rnams
150a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gdan te so so la cha bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de yang shar phyogs su rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po zlum po ste rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa dag go /lho phyogs su gru gsum g.yu drung ris kyis mtshan pa dag go /nub phyogs su gru bzhi rdo rjes
150a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa dag go /byang phyogs su zla phyed rnam pa pad+mas mtshan pa dag go /shar phyogs kyi g.yas kyi zlum po'i g.yas su bdud rtsi'i bum pa glu'i rgyal po rgyal ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi g.yon gyis gru bzhi'i g.yon du bdud rtsi bum pa
150a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /shar phyogs kyi rta babs kyi rtsegs dang po'i gnas dbu ma la chos kyi 'khor lo dag dang g.yas dang g.yon du ri dags pho dang mo rnams nag po'o/ /lho phyogs su bum pa bzang po dang g.yas dang g.yon du
150a5(rgyud 'grel): dung dang pad+ma rnams dmar po'o/ /nub tu byang chub kyi shing dang g.yas dang g.yon du mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci mo rnams ser po'o/ /byang du du du bi dang g.yas dang g.yon du dbyug pa dang tho ba dkar po'o/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha dog lnga ste
150a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dgod do/ /sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po'o/ /de'i dbang ldan mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba cha bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bden bral mtshams su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub bzhin pa'o/ /chu'i dkyil
150a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dkar po'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po'o/ /de dag gi dbus su cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i dur khrod bri bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyi phyogs rnams dmar po mtshams
150b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkar po'o/ /shar dang nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du stong pa'i dkyil 'khor dag go /de yang de dag ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsungs pa ltar ro/ /'khor lo bcu la mtshan ma gri gug bri bar bya'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma
150b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dgod par bya'o/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog sngon po'o/ /de nyid kyis phyogs gnyis su cha gsum gsum tsam bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi cha drug la rdo rje'i ra ba'o/ /me ri'i phreng ba kha dog lnga'o/ /thugs kyi dkyil
150b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi shar gyi rdul mtshon nag po'i dpangs la nas kyi rkang pa gcig go /lho phyogs kyi dmar po la rkang pa gnyis so/ /nub phyogs kyi ser po la bzhi'o/ /byang phyogs kyi dkar po la gsum mo/ /rtsig pa'i tshon rnams ni ser po'i
150b4(rgyud 'grel): sum 'gyur du bya ba ste rdo rje'i ra ba la yang ngo/ /re kha gzhan rnams ni mtshon ser po nyis 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rnams ni snam bu rnams kyi nyis 'gyur/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnams ni pad+ma rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gsungs pa rnams kyi
150b5(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'gyur gsung gi dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de nyid kyis nyis 'gyur sku'i dkyil 'khor la ste/ kra ma shir Sha'i phyi rol mchod pa'i sa gzhi la gnas gcig go /sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams rdo rje'i ra ba dang me ri rnams kyi
150b6(rgyud 'grel): dbangs sku'i rtsig pa'i tshad kyis so/ /sa gzhi gzhan rnams la tshon sum 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gtso bo'i pad+ma'i lte bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i steng du dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po dang/ dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan dang dus
150b7(rgyud 'grel): me rnams la rdo rje sngon po rtse mo gsum pa bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la spos snod nag po'o/ /lho phyogs su mar me dmar po'o/ /nub phyogs su dung ser po'o/ /byang phyogs su lta bshos dkar po'o/ /
151a1(rgyud 'grel): me mtshams la sogs par rnga yab nag po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po rnams so/ /de'i phyi rol gyi dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po'o/ /me ru yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o/ /bden bral du chos kyi gaN+DI
151a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o/ /'phar ma gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi pad+ma dkar po dang nyi ma dmar po'i steng du ral gri nag po'o/ /me'i mtshams su pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng du utpa la sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs su
151a3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che ha dgu pa dmar po'o/ /bden bral du pad+ma dmar po'o/ /nub phyogs su 'khor lo ser po'o/ /rlung du 'khor lo ser po'o/ /byang du pad+ma dkar po'o/ /dbang ldan du utpa la dkar po'o/ /'phar ma gsum pa'i sgo so so'i logs rnams
151a4(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma brgyad de/ /de rnams la drug la nyi ma'o/ /nub dang byang gi g.yon phyogs la zla ba'o/ /zur rnams kyis pad+ma la zla ba bzhi'o/ /de rnams kyi dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long dang rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang gos dang rdo rje dang rin po che
151a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bdud rtsi'i snod dang ches 'byung dang/ /'khor lo dang dril bu dang pi wang dang pad+ma rnams dkar po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang/ ser po dang ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rnams so/ /shar gyi sgo
151a6(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du ral gri nag po'o/ /lho phyogs su dbyug pa dmar po'o/ /nub phyogs su pad+ma ser po'o/ /byang phyogs su tho ba dkar po'o/ /'di rnams las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po rnams dang/ /zla ba'i
151a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnams kyi pad+ma dmar po rnams so/ /shar phyogs kyi 'dod yon gyi rta babs ka ba'i 'og gi g.yon du dud nag po'o/ /g.yas su me tog gi phreng ba sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs su spos snod dang mar me dmar po'o/ /nub
151b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su cod pan dang mu tig gi phreng ba ser po'o/ /byang phyogs su 'bras bu dang bdud rtsis gang pa'i snod dkar po'o/ /de ltar 'dod yon snam bu kun la glu ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i
151b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi dbus su gos so/ /lho phyogs su pad+ma'o/ /nub phyogs su pa Ta ha'o/ /byang phyogs su rdo rje'o/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la gri gug nag po rnams so/ /me mtshams su 'khor lo nag po
151b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /lho phyogs su dbyug pa dmar po rnams so/ /bden bral du mdung thung dmar po rnams so/ /nub phyogs su rdo rje ser po'o/ /rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyug pa ser po rnams so/ /byang phyogs su rtse gsum pa dkar po rnams so/ /dbang ldan du
151b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po rnams so/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i lte ba dang/ 'dab ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams la/ shar sgo'i g.yas su ral gri rnams so/ /me mtshams su dpag bsam gyi shing rnams so/ /lho'i sgo'i g.yon du rdo rjes mtshan
151b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyug pa rnams so/ /g.yas su mdung thung rnams so/ /bden bral du mdung rnams so/ /nub sgo'i g.yon du rin po che 'am dbyug pa rnams so/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnams so/ /rlung du khab rnams so/ /byang gi sgo'i g.yon du rtse gsum
151b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /g.yas su zhags pa rnams so/ /dbang ldan du dgra sta rnams so/ /shar sgo'i g.yon du 'khor lo rnams so/ /shar kyi sgo ru dbyug pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /lho'i sgo ru mda' dmar po'o/ /nub kyi sgo ru dbyug to'o/ /
151b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyi rol du rtse gsum sngon po'o/ /byang gi sgo ru gtun shing dkar po'o/ /de ltar dbyug pa la sogs pa rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams dmar po'o/ /mtshams kyi
152a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rnams dkar po'o/ /'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i 'dod yon gyi snam bu'i g.yas su utpa la dang gos dang gri gug dang/ 'khor lo dang kha TwAM ga rnams dag po'o/ /g.yon du gri gug dang ral gri
152a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gri gug dang yang gri gug rnams nag po'o/ /lho'i sgo'i g.yas su pad+ma dang bdud rtsi'i snod dang/ dbyug pa dang mdung thung dang pad+ma rnams dmar po'o/ /g.yon du mda' dang dgra sta dang/ gri gug dang yang gri gug rnams dmar po'o/ /nub  
152a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo'i g.yas su 'khor lo dri'i dung dang rdo rje dang khab dang 'khor lo rnams ser po'o/ /g.yon du phub dang chos 'byung dang 'khor lo dang gri gug rnams ser po'o/ /byang sgo'i g.yas su utpa la me long dang rtse gsum dang pad+ma dang utpa la rnams
152a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o/ /g.yon du bi ni sngon po dang tho ba dang gri gug dang yang gri gug rnams dkar po'o/ /de ltar mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'dod yon la yang go bar bya'o/ /de nas hUM yig dang yi ge drug pa bzlas shing bdud rtsi lnga
152a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol byugs nas de nyid bzlas shing chus dkyil 'khor la bsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas tshon rnams kyi lhag ma'i ye shes pa oM A:hUM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de gshegs su gsol ba dang/
152a6(rgyud 'grel): 'du 'dzi med pa'i sa ru gzhag par bya'o/ /'di ni tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// //de nas sngon du lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su bzhi bzhag go /
152a7(rgyud 'grel): yang nub tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lnga'o/ /shar du rgyal ba'i bum pa drug pa'o/ /de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i bum pa'i dung de zhes pa ni bum pa drug gi phyogs so/ /bum pa bcu'i phyogs ltar na phyogs mtshams brgyad du
152b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang nub kyi bum pa'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi ma reg par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o/ /shar gyi bum pa'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi ma reg par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o/ /de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i dung bcu gcig pa'o/ /de yang zhi
152b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang rgyas pa dang las thams cad pa la du ba'o/ /gdug pa'i las thams cad la thod pa'o/ /dbang dang dgug pa la zangs dang gser ro/ /rengs pa dang rmongs pa la/ baM phor ro/ /de nas las dang mtshungs pa'i gos dang skud pas mgrin par
152b3(rgyud 'grel): bkri bar bya ste/ gzhag pa 'di ni bum pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas mtshams bzhi ru pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa bzhi ba klag par bya'o/ /ga bur dang tu ru ka dang a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos sna tshogs phyogs mtshams brgyad du bzhag go /
152b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa la gtso bo'i sngags dang/ oM badzra spha ra Na khaM zhes pa'i sngags brjod de/ rim pa bzhin gnas su dgram mo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgo rnams su rta babs la sna tshogs pa'i
152b5(rgyud 'grel): gos dang dril bu dang rnga yab rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lo ma dang bcas pa'i chu shing gi ka ba dang gang ba'i bum pa kha brgyan dang bcas pa yang bzhag go /de nas slob dpon shar phyogs su bsdad la sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i sdig pa bshad
152b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa dang srung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ las rgyal mchog dang/ thig le'i rnal 'byor dang/ phra ma'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi cho ga byas la/ bcu drug lo nyid lon pa yi/ /btsun mo shin tu rab tu
152b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /dri dang me tog dang ldan ma/ /de nyid legs par bslabs pa dang/ /de'i dbus su 'dod pa bya/ /yon tan rgya mtsho sna tshogs yum/ /sangs rgyas tshogs rnams spros pa dang/ /nam mkha' i khams su legs par brgyan/ /zhes pa
153a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gsungs pas phyi'i phyag rgya la snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ de ltar ma yin na ye shes kyi phyag rgya la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ sbyor ba'i sgras spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i
153a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba rnams byas la zhabs bsil dang yon chab la sogs pa sngon du song bas bdag nyid la gzhug par byas pa dang/ chags pa chen pos zhu nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung
153a3(rgyud 'grel): ste lha mo'i pad+mar ye shes kyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o/ /rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te gnas rnams kyi rim pas de rnams spro bar bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros la phyi dang
153a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang pa'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /mchod pa de'i rim pa ni/ /oM A:hUM ho/ tre d+hU tu ke shwa ra kA la tsakra arg+haM pra tits+tsha sa pa ri wA rA twI b+ha ga wAM me wa ra do b+ha wa shi Sh+ya ny+tsa zhes gsol ba btab pa la yon
153a5(rgyud 'grel): chab kyi maN+Dal rdul tshon gyi phyi rol dang/ maN+Dal gzhan rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i sngon du byas la sngags rnams kyi dang por oM dang tha mar na ma(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i sngags brjod cing me tog la sogs pas mchod pa ni/ bud+d+ha ya/ d+harmA ya/
153a6(rgyud 'grel): saM g+ha ya/ badzra satwA ya/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta yai/ swa b+hA bi ka kA yA ya d+harmmA ka yA ya/ saM b+ho ga kA yA ya/ nirmA Na kA yA ya/ dz+nyA na badzrA ya/ tsit+ta badzrA ya/ pA ga badzrA ya/ kA la badzrA ya/ tsa tu rbi mo k+She b+hyo/ tsa turprahma bI hya re b+hyo/ sapta triM shadyo
153a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hi pak+Shi ka d+harmmA b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): tsaturmI ti sA ha sra d+harmmA skand+he b+hyo/ sarba d+harmmA de sha ka b+hyo/ /rradna tra yA ya/ shAkya mu nA ye/ kA la tsakra ya/ dA na pA ra mi tA yai/ shI la pA ra mi tA yai/ k+ShATti bA ra mi tA yai/ bE rye pA ra mi tA yai/ d+hyaM pA ra mi tA yai/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA
153b1(rgyud 'grel): yai/ a'u pa yA pA ra mi tA yai/ pra Ni d+ha na pA ra mi tA yai/ ba la pA ra mi tA yai/ dz+nyAna bA ra mi tA yai/ dza ya g+ha Ta b+hyo/ bi dza ya g+ha Te b+hyo/ sarba tsih+no b+hyo/ sarba mu drA b+hyo/ tsin+ta ma NA ye/ d+harmmA g+haN+ai/ d+harmmA shi kha ya/ kalpa brik+ShA ya/ ak+Sho b+hya ya/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hA ye/
153b2(rgyud 'grel): ratna sa b+ha pA ya/ a mi tA b+hA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ye/ lo tsa n+yai/ mA ma kyai/ paN+Da rA yai/ tA rA yai/ badzra d+ha twI shwa ryai/ badzra pA Na yai/ kha garb+hA ya/ k+Shi ti garb+ha ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ sarba ni pa ra Na b+hi skam+b+hi ni/ sa man+ta b+ha drA ya/ gand+ha badzrA yai/ rU pa badzrA
153b3(rgyud 'grel): yai/ ra sa badzrA yai/ spar sha badzra yai/ shapta badzra yai/ d+harmmA d+hA tu badzra yai/ uSh+NI ShA ya/ big+hAn+tA kA ya/ pradz+nyA na ta kA ya/ padmAn+ta kA ya/ ya mAn+ta ka ya/ staM bi N+yai/ ma nI n+yai/ sto b+hi n+yai/ a b+hi bIryA yai/ a ti nI lA ye sarba b+ha ri NI b+hyo/ kha TwAM gA ya/ zhes
153b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /badzra tsa rtsi kA yai/ badzra ma he shwaryai/ badzrai ndyai/ badzra prahma N+yai/ badzra mahA la kyai/ badzra ko mAryo/ badzra beSh+Na byai/ aSh+TASh+Ta ke na tsa tu:ShaSh+Thi badzra yo gi ni b+hyo:ShaDa ti sha dits+tsha b+hyo/ zhes bya ba 'di ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la
153b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /badzra biSh+Na be/ badzra nai ri tyA ya/ badzrA gnA yai/ badzrod+d+ha ye/ badzren+d+ra ya/ badzre shwa rA ya/ badzra prahma Ne/ badzra bi nA ye kA ya/ badzra kArti ke yA ya/ badzrA pA ya ya/ badzra yA mA ya/ badzra yak+She b+hyo/ ba ru N+yai/ bA ya byai/ yA mi n+yai/ yak+ShI n+yai/ mahA pA
153b6(rgyud 'grel): lA ya/ a tsa lA ya/ Tak+ki rA dzA ya/ nI la daN+DA ya/ sum+b+ha rA dzA yai/ rodDak+Shi yai/ badzra shwI kha lA yai/ tsundA ye/ b+h+ri ku Tyai/ ma ri tsye/ pra tye ka mA sa b+he de na ShaSh+Ta d+ha ra tri sha ta badzra ti thaM de bI b+hyo/ Sha TTiM shatpra tIts+tsha b+hyo/ badzra dza yA ya/ badzra karko Ta kA ya/ badzra bA su ka ye/
153b7(rgyud 'grel): badzrA nan+tA ya/ badzra tak+Sha kA ya/ badzra mahA padmA ya/ badzra ku li kA ya/ badzra sha kha pA lA ya/ badzra pad+ma ya/ badzra bi dza yA ya/ zhes bya ba ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'o/ /shwA nA syA yai/ su kA ra syA yai/ pyA g+h+rA syA yai/ dzaM bu ka syA ye/ ga ru DA syA yai/

154a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba bU ti b+hyo/ hA rI tyai sarba sid+d+hi b+hyo/ d+harmmA tsakra ya/ b+ha drak+tra ya/ badzra dundu b+hi/ po d+hi bikrA ya/ gu ru bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+hyo na mo na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /de ltar mchod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing bstod par bya'o/ shes rab kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems pad+ma'i
154a4(rgyud 'grel): snod du blug la bdud rtsi ru byas pa myang bar bya ste/ 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byas la gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /'khor rnams kyi sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas so/ /gsung bar 'gyur pa'i

156a1(rgyud 'grel): tsa tu rbi mok+Sha mu kha bi shud+d+hi swa b+ha wa kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na mu kha dan+tA di ma li bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya sAhA/ zhes pas te de yang gru bzhi pa khru bzhi dang ldan pas/ ba lang gi lci ba la sogs ba byugs pa'i maN+Dal
156a2(rgyud 'grel): la oM A hUM zhes pa lan bdun brjod nas so la blud de bskyur ro/ /so shing maN+Dal la lhung ba de gang du phyogs kyi dbye bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub rtag par bya'o/ /maN+Dal gyi phyogs su song na dngos grub med do/ /de nas dri zhim po'i
