182b3(rgyud 'grel): oM e hye he mahA b+hu ta de ba ri Shi dri dza sa ta ma gre hi twa yu d+hi mahA rasmIn smIn san+ni hi to b+ha ba badzra d+hA ra dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ zhes brjod de rang gi snying ga dang phyi'i thab khung du las kyi bye brag gis zla ba 'am/ nyi ma la raM las byung ba'i me lha'i
182b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgoms te/ dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug go/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gzhug go /zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcing ngo/ /dril bu'i phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o/ /de nas yang las thams cad pa la sku mdog ljang gu g.yas pa'i phyag dag gis
182b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang phreng ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis dril bu dang pad+ma'o/ /na bza' dang/ spyan dang/ dbu skra rnams dmar la ser ba'i mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab pa'o/ /zhi ba la dmar po g.yas pa dag gis pad+ma dang/ shel gyi phreng ba'o/ /
182b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag gis spyi lugs dang dung ngo/ /rgyas pa la g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang mu tig gi phreng ba'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma dang spyi blugs so/ /'od dpag med gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /bsad pa la nag po g.yas pa dag
182b7(rgyud 'grel): gis gri gug dang rtse gsum pa'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha TwAM ga'o/ /don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /bskrag pa dang dbye ba la g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang rtse gsum pa'o/ /g.yon pa dag gi thod pa dang kha TwAM
183a1(rgyud 'grel): ga'o/ /dbang du bya ba la gur gum gyi kha dog go /g.yas pa dag gis mda' dang rin po che'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis gzhu dang me long ngo/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /dgug pa la g.yas
183a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag gis rdo rje lcags kyu dang rin po che'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis rdo rje zhags pa dang me long ngo/ /rmongs pa dag la g.yas pa dag gis sbrul dang dbyug pa'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang tho ba'o/ /rengs pa dang/ phur bus
183a3(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa dag la ser po g.yas pa dag gis lcags sgrog dang tho pa'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang tho ba'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o/ /zhi ba la sogs pa rang rang gi kha dog dang mtshungs pa'i na bza' o/ /de
183a4(rgyud 'grel): nas oM pra wa ra sa ta ka ra mahA ra smin pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes pas yon cha ma sbyin no/ /de nas oM badzra dang por/ puShpaM la sogs pas bar du'o/ /swAhA zhes pa tha mar sbyar ba'i puShpaM dang/ d+hu paM dang/ g+hand+haM dang/ dI paM dang/ ak+Sha taM dang/ /
183a5(rgyud 'grel): n+yai bi dyaM dang/ lA syaM dang/ pA dyaM dang/ nri tyaM dang/ gI taM dang/ kA ma rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas me lha'i zhal gdangs par/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA gni badzra satwa sya sarba pA paM da ha da ha swAhA zhes pas las thams cad pa la
183a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs par dang por bsreg lugs len par spyan drang ba'o/ /bsad pa la sogs par/ oM badzrA na la sarba b+hu taM dzwA la ya sarbAM b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TaM swAhA/ zhes pas so/ /de nas oM A:hUM ho haM k+Sha:swAhA/ zhes pas yaM shing brgya
183a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya'o/ /oM hliM h+rIM hDAM h+rI h+raM h+ra:swAhA/ zhes pas brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /de nas oM a A i a'i ri rI u a'u li lI aM a:swAhA/ zhes pa yang de ltar ro/ /de nas oM a A e i ar Ar o aau al
183b1(rgyud 'grel): Al aM a:swAhA/ zhes pa yang de ltar ro/ /de nas oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA haM ha swAhA/ zhes pa yang de ltar ro/ /de ltar bzhi bcus lhag pa'i lnga brgya la lnga brgya zhes brjod do/ /zhi ba la sogs pa chu shel dang/ pu Shu ra
183b2(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ band+hu ka dang/ gser zhun ma'i kha dog rnams so/ /mA la hi dang/ ga bur dang/ a ka ru dang/ tsam pa ka'i dri rnams so/ /pi wang rgyud mangs dang/ gling pu dang/ mri daM ga dang/ shin tu drag po'i sgra rnams so/ /dpal be'u dang/
183b3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ pad+ma dang/ bum pa la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams so/ /gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi la sogs pa bzang ngo/ /shin tu g.yo ba dang/ thig le nag po can dang/ me stag 'phro ba dang/ /
183b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyogs su phyogs pa dang/ g.yo zhing 'bar ba dang/ kha dog sna tshogs pa dang/ shin tu gnag pa dang/ chog sgra dang/ thog sgra rnams ni bsad pa la bzang ngo/ /de nas 'bru la sogs pa rnams sngon du song ba'i sngags
183b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho gas te dgang gzar yang ngo/ /de nyid na/ lag pa g.yon pa gan rgyal du byas te/ lag pa g.yas pa mchod sbyin byas pa'i mthe bos bskyod cing/ sngon gyi rdzas rnams bsnun par bya'o/ /zhi ba la na ma:I mdza' 
183b6(rgyud 'grel): can no/ /rgyas pa la bo Sha Ta'o/ /bsad pa dang/ bskrad pa dang/ dbye ba rnams la hUM ngo/ /dbang la waSha Ta zhes pa'o/ /phur bus gdab pa dang/ rengs pa dang rmongs pa rnams la phaT kyi mdza' rten dang bcas pa brjod cing bsnun par bya'o/ /de nas h+k+Sh+mlwryaM
183b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis mar gyis dgang gzar bkang la mnyam par bzhag pa'i slob dpon dang las kyi rdo rjes me lha la dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i sngags kyis phyogs bcur sbyin pa ni/
184a1(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hu b+hu ba(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ na mo de be b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swa ti pra dza(rgyud 'grel): b+hya swA hA sha rA dzA b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sA d+hA pri te b+hya/ a laM b+hu te b+hya/ wa Sha Da ne dru ya zhes pas so/ de ltar me tog phul la/ oM A hUM kA ya wA k+tsit+ta swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha swAhA/
184a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas zhal bsil dbul lo/ /de nas oM dza(rgyud 'grel): gats+tsha mahA rasmI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ swa s+thA nan+ti pta ho(rgyud 'grel): pu na dA ga myi Sha Tas ya ri wA ha na yA mi swAhA/ zhes pas snying ga'i pad+ma la ye shes kyi me lha gshegs su gsol zhing thabs kyi me
184a3(rgyud 'grel): lha yang gshegs su gsol lo/ /'di ni sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi snga ma ltar mchod pa byas la rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ste/ rdo rje'i 'dug stangs la gnas nas/ rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma la/ ye
184a4(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du/ gtsug tor dang/ dpral ba dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba dang/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnams spu/ a i ri u li haM yi ge rnams stong pa la sogs
184a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zad par rnams dang/ phyogs skyong rnams dang/ gza' rnams dang/ glu rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ khro bo'i tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bum pa'i gos zung rnams srung ba'i gzhon nu ma rnams la sbyin du gzhug go
184a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma 'am rang gi lag pa 'am rdo rje tshangs pa'i thig gi lam nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i bar gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi spyi gtsug tu rdul tshon cung zad bzhag ste/ pad+ma la sogs pa
184a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas rdul tshon phyags te bum par blugs nas ji ltar 'byor pa ltar glang po la sogs pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang/ bcos par khyer la rgya mtsho la 'gro ba'i chu bo la
184b1(rgyud 'grel): ngor bar bya'o/ /bum pa de nyid du bkang la/ dkyil 'khor gyi khong par 'ongs te/ gtor nas ba lang gi ci ba la sogs pas kyang byugs te/ der gnas nas 'o ma la sogs pa'i dkar ba dang/ mngar ba dang/ ras zung rnams kyis
184b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu ma mnyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol ba dang/ mtshan mo'i dus su sngon gyi cho gas dpa' bo'i ston mo sbyin par bya'o/ /'dis ni gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// //sems can don phyir rab tu spro
184b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bdag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i sgrub thabs byas pa'i dge bar gyur pa dkar ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /de yis 'gro ba ma lus pa yi nyon mongs tshogs rnams rab tu bcom pa'i
184b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas gyur pa/ /spros pa thams cad dang ni bral ba'i bde ba chen po mnyam pa med pa thob par shog /dpal ldan pad+ma'i phyag dang ldan pas shin tu dri ma bral bar rab rib ma lus bcom yang 'on te ma dag mig ldan rnams kyis/ /
184b5(rgyud 'grel): gal te dngos po'i tshogs rnams mthong gyur nas snga phyi 'gal ba/ /mchis nam mkhas pa rnams la bdag ni bzod par gsol lo/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po sA d+hu pu
184b6(rgyud 'grel): tra sa d+harmA ka ra shan+ti'i don du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po wA gI shwa ra gupta dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//dpal dus kyi 'khor
184b7(rgyud 'grel): lo'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhugs so//) //*// /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kA la tsakra maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor cho ga /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi
185a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /snying ga'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i/ /spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga dbye bar bya// //yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa
185a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas su/ /sdom ni/ dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /lhag gnas dang ni mchod pa'o/ /lhag gnas pa yang rnam gnyis te/ /rang don dang ni gzhan don no/ /mchod pa la yang rnam gnyis te/ /bdag sgrub dang ni gzhan sgrub po/
185a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro dngos dang rjes dang ni/ /yan lag la sogs thun mong ngo/ /dang por slob dpon brtag pa ni/ /slob dpon yang ni dam tshig can/ /rdo rje'i theg pa dang por zhon/ /de nyid khyab can chags pa med/ /dri ma dang ni rnam par bral//
185a4(rgyud 'grel): bzod dang tshul khrims don 'jug pa/ /slob ma rnams la bde ster zhing/ /dmyal ba yi ni 'jigs sel ba/ /de kho na yi tshangs spyod can/ /bdud rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyug /de yang sa'i steng du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags//
185a5(rgyud 'grel): khro dang nga rgyal dang ldan zhing/ /dam tshig dang ni rnam bral ba/ /rdzas la brkam zhing ma thos pa/ /slob ma rnams ni bslu don du/ /mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang du/ /sems ni nyams dang dbang ma bskur/ /longs spyod chags shing

185a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa la dga' zhing/ /gtong ba'i sems dang yon tan che/ /thar pa 'dod cing rgyud la dad/ /sems ni g.yo ba med pa dang/ /de nyid rnyed pa dang gsang zhing/ /gdug pa rnams kyi tshogs bral ba/ /shin tu mkhas
185b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bla ma yis/ /slob ma de ni gzung bar bya/ /de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /skye ba mang po'i sdig pa ni/ /bsags pa rnam par 'jig byed pa/ /sdom pa so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /dpa' bo dus kyi 'khor lo mdzod/ /de nas sa bslang
185b2(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa dang/ spyang dang gzung dang spel ba dang/ /dpyid 'bring dkar tshes nya mthar thug /gzhan la phan pa'i bla ma yis/ /sa brtag la sogs rim par bya/ /nags sam grong brdal khang stong sogs/ /byang dang dbang ldan phyogs su ni//
185b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhi ba rgyas pa dang/ /sa la dri zhim dang ldan pa/ /sa dang chus ni brtags nas ni/ /bslang ba snang dang mi snang dang/ /sbyang ba pus mo lte ba dang/ /rked pa 'phang du brko bar bya/ /yang na rdo 'am chur thug par/ /zug rngu sol ba bcas
185b4(rgyud 'grel): par ro/ /sa yi kheng na yod pa ni/ /gci ba yi ni 'jigs pa med/ /gnas de ru ni sbyang ba ni/ /yon tan gyi ni dbang gis 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na spyang bar bya/ /nor bu ching bu dung yod ni/ /rnam par rgyal zhing bde ba byed/ /dkyil 'khor

185b6(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byang du gzhol/ /dbus ni me long bzhin du mtho/ /brdung zhing legs par brdungs nas su/ /mnyam zhing zung ngu med par bya/ /der ni chu dang lci ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni legs par byug /de nas phyogs
185b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /gzung zhing bla re la sogs bri/ /spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa yis/ /nye snying bzlas pas sa la reg /rdo rje yi ni rang bzhin bsam/ /lhag gnas yan lag cho ga'o// //de nas dgongs
186a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su ni/ /chu dang mchod yon dri chab spos/ /me tog dang ni 'bras bu dang/ /bsang gtor dang ni mar me dang/ /lha bshos gos dang bcur 'gyur te/ /dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa yi/ /'jig rten pa la gtor
186a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ /sa yi lha mo'i mchod gtor dang/ /tshogs 'khor ji ltar 'byor pa dang/ /na bza' nyi shu rtsa lnga dang/ /bla re ba da na maN+Dal dang/ /slob dpon rdzas brgyad ldan pa yis/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs bzhin/ /rim pa

186b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /dbus su 'dab ma nyi ma'i khru/ /lte ba dang ldan gdan la ni/ /dus dang chags pa'i khru ru 'gyur/ /de'i steng du bdag nyid ni/ /dri ma dang ni bral ba nyid/ /'khor lo'i dus su khro dbang po/ /phyag ni rgyal dbang gnyis

187a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu la ni/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams bkod la/ /sman dang 'bru rnams gzhug pa ni/ /dri yi sman gyi re mig tu/ /rim pa bzhin du sman gyi grangs/ /mig dang zla ba la sogs pa/ /tshangs ma la sogs lnga lnga pa/ /tshangs pa khyab

187b1(rgyud 'grel): tsa na dkar/ /til nag lnga pa dang po yin/ /ko tra 'bras sngon sran ma dang/ /til dkar gro ni gnyis pa yin/ /mu tra yu tri pu yungs smug /nas sran ma sha gsum pa yin/ /sran chung yungs kar dkar po dang/ /ka kun tri bi ka ra dang/ /ba ra tsi

187b3(rgyud 'grel): margad/ /dang po'i lnga tshan bstan pa yin/ /lcags dang gser dngul zangs khro chu/ /khab len lnga mtshan gnyis pa yin/ /mu tig byu ru thing shing dang/ /shu ka ma ni shad a ru/ /lnga tshan gsum par bkod pa yin/ /yu dza ra dzi pa dza ti/ /
187b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo ba rig 'ba' ha ri ta/ /lnga tshan bzhi par bkod pa yin/ /lnga la 'khor los sgyur ba yin/ /kla klo'i nor bu kha dog lnga'o/ /'byor pa med na kha dog lnga/ /me tog lnga ni gzhug par bya/ /ljang gu rnam rgyal bum par bzhag /sngon po
187b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang rnam rgyal la/ /nag po shar me'i bum par ro/ /dmar po lho dang bden bral lo/ /dkar po byang dang dbang ldan du'o/ /ser po nub dang rlung du'o/ /thams cad cha dbyes bcug nas ni/ /rigs mthun gos kyis mgrin pa bcing/ /g.yas su pad+ma'i
187b6(rgyud 'grel): steng bzhag nas/ /shU n+ya tA yis stong par bsam/ /de nas haM las gzhal yas khang pa bsam/ /baM las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskyed/ /h+ri las pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /hUM las lha rnams bskyed par bya/ /cho ga gong ma 'dra ba las/ /nag por
187b7(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi lha tshogs bskyed/ /gzhan yang de bzhin shes par bya/ /de nas bgegs bskrad ye shes dgug /dbang bskur yig gsum byin brlabs la/ /mchod bstod gong ma bzhin du bya/ /tshon skud bum pa'i stong bzhag nas// 
188a1(rgyud 'grel): thun gcig par du bzlas par bya/ /de nas bum pa bsdus nas su/ /gos kyis bkab nas zhal bzhis bsrung/ /de ltar bum pa lhag gnas nas/ /sbyin sreg lhag par gnas par bya/ /grong khyer gyi ni dbus nyid dam/ /
188a2(rgyud 'grel): byang dang dbang ldan mtshams su'o/ /thab khung khru gang zlum po la/ /zabs su khru phyed brko bar bya/ /mchu ni thab khung bcu gnyis cha/ /de yi nyis 'gyur kha khyer ro/ /kha khyer spangs la mchu yi phyed/ /nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /tshon rtsi dkar pos
188a3(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /ku sha yis ni dgram par bya/ /de yi mdza' yi nub tu ni/ /nges pa kho nar bya ba ni/ /ra ba gsum la sgo gcig pa/ /slob dpon gyi ni bdag nyid ni/ /mnyam pa kho nar byas pa yin/ /sngar gsungs
188a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bcu pa ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsham par bya/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang 'o ma dang/ /bsreg pa'i shing ni mda' yi brgya/ /til dang yungs kar la sogs dang/ /dur ba 'o ma la sogs dang/ /nas gro ma sha zhi ba'i rdzas/ /bil ba star ka dzA
188a5(rgyud 'grel): ti dang/ /'bras bu u dum ba ra'i shing/ /nags kyi lcug ma la sogs dang/ /shel phreng gser dang gos dang ni/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang chang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rdzas rnams bsags/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /dag pa rnam gsum
188a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin/ /yan lag bzhi pa gzhung bzhin bsgom/ /snying gar sngags rnams kun bkod nas/ /bzlas brjod mes ni sdig pa sbyang/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor bar snang du/ /gzhag nas khams gsum stong par bsam/ /b+he ram la
188a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs ri rab la/ /thug ri char pa bzhin du bskyed/ /de dbus bruM las me thab kyi/ /'khor lo rim pa bzhin bsams nas/ /de dbus raM las me dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum pa ni bsam par bya/ /de dbus paM las chu dkyil 'khor
188b1(rgyud 'grel): zlum po dbus su me dkyil 'khor/ /dbus su rang gi mtshan ma bsam/ /zur gsum la ni yig gsum bsam/ /phogs su h+ri yi yi ge bsam/ /de rnams gyur las me lha ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog dkar ba/ /g.yon
188b2(rgyud 'grel): pa thab khung pad+ma'o/ /g.yas na bgrang phreng dbyug pa'o/ /bzang po ser skya ral pa can/ /spyan ni ser skya na bzar bcas/ /zla ba'i steng du bsgom par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig bskyed nas ni/ /khro bo lha mos bsrungs nas ni/ /dri
188b3(rgyud 'grel): yis chus kyang bsam par bya/ /de rjes me lha spyan drangs te/ /me yi spyan dang phyag rgya dang/ /oM e hye hi ma hA b+hU taM de ba ri Shi dza ma nu ri Shi hi twot+ta mahA ra smi hi to b+ha be badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ /chu dang bcas pa'i me tog gi /mchod yon
188b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni me lha la/ /de yi sbyor dang ldan pas sbyin/ /bstod pa yang ni byas nas su/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dang/ /hUM dang rdo rje yis ni gzhug /baM dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcing/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bus dgyes par bya/ /de nas
188b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa dbang bskur la/ /snang ba mdza' yas dbus la bsam/ /de nas mchod yon dbul ba ni/ /oM pra ba ra satkA raM mahA rasmi pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ a tsa ma na pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra d+hU pa pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra puShpa pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra dI pa pra
188b6(rgyud 'grel): tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra nai be tye pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra lA sye pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra hA sye pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra bA de pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra gI ta pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ badzra kA me pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ /de yang gsungs pa/ /me ni rnam pa gsum yin te/ /kun sreg khyim
188b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag yon gyi me/ /khyim bdag zla ba'i lce la ni/ /oM a na la sarba b+hU ta dzA la ya sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba dza na duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ me ni gso phyir dgang lugs bzhin/ /de nas bgegs ni brtag par bya/ /tseg tseg sgra dang ro yi dri/ /ba
189a1(rgyud 'grel): lang mgo sogs mi dge ba'i/ /mtshan ma yin par shes par bya/ /gdugs dang dpal be'u chu gsher dang/ /rim bzhin mtshan ma sogs shis bya/ /mi shes pa na phyir bzlog bya/ /mchod sbyin gyi ni lag pa yis/ /mthe bong
189a2(rgyud 'grel): gis ni me yi khar/ /rdo rje yan lag phung sogs kyang/ /bsreg pa yi ni rab tu bya/ /oM A:huM ho haM k+Sha swAhA/ huM hAM h+ri h+ri h+rI swAhA/ a A i a'i ri rI u a'u li lI aM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /a A e e ar Ar o aau al Al aM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ ha hA ya yA ra rA wa
189a3(rgyud 'grel): wA la lU haM ha(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de rnams 'od la dbul bar bya/ oM agna ye swAhA/ mar ni zhal du dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba saM ba te swAhA/ 'bras chan zhal du dbul bar bya/ /oM adzra ti ha ta dza ya swAhA/ oM badzra yu She swAhA/ ku sha dur ba spyi gtsug
189a4(rgyud 'grel): tu'o/ /oM mahA be ge swAhA/ oM badzra g+husma re swAhA/ oM badzra bi dza ye swAhA/ oM mahA be ga ye swAhA/ oM badzra mu te ye swAhA/ nas dang gro dang so ba dang/ /ma sha 'bras ni zhal du'o/ /oM mahA she pa ye swAhA/ bil pa dang ni star ka'o/ /dri ni thugs
189a5(rgyud 'grel): ka me tog dbu/ /spos ni 'od la mar me mdun/ /mchod yon 'thor 'thung phyag tu'o/ /bdud rtsi zhal dang rin chen dbu/ /phreng ba phyag dang sku la gos/ /de ltar me lha mchod nas ni/ /me ni bsangs la 'od du zhu/ /de yi dbus su ye shes kyi//
189a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo cho ga bzhin du bskyed/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstod dgug gzhug go bskon nas/ /dbang bskur nas ni sngon bzhin du/ sbyin sreg brgyas par dbul bar bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgyas pa yang/ /ye

189b4(rgyud 'grel): gats+tsha gatsshi? swAhA/ /rasmi sarba sa ma h+ri ba ho ho bu na ra ga mi sha si di pa sya ya d+ha trA na ya mi swAhA/ dam tshig gdan rnams rim bzhin thim/ /de ltar lhag gnas byas nas ni/ /tshogs gtor ma lhag gnas bya/ /de ltar gtor ma lhag byas nas/ /

189b6(rgyud 'grel): lam bdag par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /bla ma yang ni spyi bo ru/ /gzung bar bgyi'o rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gyis ni sbyin pa sbyin/ /rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /bskyed par bgyi'o 'khor lo yi/ /ral gri yis ni mchod pa bya/ /

191a7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /me dang dus dang dus kyi phyed/ /dus drug dang ni ri rnams kyi/ /nges par cha yi rim pa yis/ /lte ba 'am ni snying po nas/ /chu skyes pad+ma ya de ni/ /ka ba rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /pad+ma rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa'i/ /cha

191b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i steng du'o/ /pad+ma dkar po'i lte ba la/ /lha mo rnams ni gnas par 'gyur/ /pad+ma dkar po'i lte ba la/ /nyin mo byed pa bkod pa yi/ /lha rnams phyogs su gnas pa na/ /phyi ru rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /gtso bo'i pad+ma'i dbang gis
191b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /kha khyer dag ni mdog dkar po/ /ba ku li dang ka ba ni/ /gser dang 'dra ba ser por 'gyur/ /rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so/ /sbom pos nad ni skyed par byed/ /phra mos nyes pa kho nar ni/ /nor rnams mtshan ma ri mo spang/ /chad pas
192a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi zhing yon po yis/ /mi rnams skye bo'i bdag pos skrod/ /de bzhin mtshan ma nyi ma'i bdag /srid pa yi ni 'jigs 'joms la/ /sngags pa rnams ni dngos grub med/ /rdul tshon 'dres na rigs ni 'chad/ /rgyal rigs
192a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la rig bya/ /rgyal ba nges pa kho nar ster/ /rgyud kyi nang du gang ma gsungs/ /mtshan ma mdzes pa'i ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de mi dgod/ /rgyal bas rigs ni shes med pas/ /de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o/ /de phyir rgyud gsungs
192a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ni/ /rigs kyi dbang gis bya bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sgo yi bar du ni/ /dra ba dra phyed bar du bya/ /sa dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma bum pa sogs kyis brgyan/ /nag po la sogs rdul tshon rnams/ /bzhi cha 'phel bar 'gyur
192a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ /nas gcig bar du mtho ba'o/ /ra ba rnams ni mtho 'gyur te/ /nyin mo byed dang ri bong can/ /re khA gzhan ni nyis 'gyur te/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni mtho ba ru/ /mi yi bdag po 'gyur ba yin/ /dra ba dra phyed mthar thug dang/ /sa dang chu
192a5(rgyud 'grel): dang byin za dang/ /phyi rol rdo rje phreng gnas gcig /oM gyi ye shes las skyes par/ /rgyal ba dam pa'i pad+ma yi/ /nyi ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas/ /srid pa gsum ni skyed pa yi/ /yum ni gzhag par bya
192a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /stong pa a dang chog drag dang/ /gzhan ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /yang dag 'byung phyir sngags skye gnas/ /mchog tu bde ba byed pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje bzhi pa'o/ /hUM ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal
192a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma yi/ /zla ba nyi ma me steng du/ /dbang ldan bden bral gyi ni mtshams/ /rtse mo can dang rlung du ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs chags pa/ /haM sogs bum pa brgyad kyi'o/ /shar gyi pad+mar a yi ge /me yi pad+ma ru song ba//
192b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge i ni ring po nyid/ /gshin rje bden bral ri yig gnyis/ /shar dang nor sbyin phyogs su song/ /thung dang ring pa'i u yig go /chu dang rlung gi mtshams su ni/ /gzhan yang pad+ma ru song ba/ /thung dang ring ba'i li yig go / /nag po dmar po dkar
192b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /gser ni bco ma lta bu ni/ /zhal gyi dbye ba yod pa yis/ /shar gyi sgo yi g.yas dang ni/ /rtse mo can ni pad song ba/ /ring dang thung ba de bzhin nyid/ /gshin rje dang ni bden bral du/ /de bzhin du ni ar ni zung/ /nub dang rlung du al
192b3(rgyud 'grel): ni chung/ /gnod sbyin 'phrog mar o aau'o/ /lha dang chu lha gshin rje yi/ /sgo yi g.yon dang gnod sbyin bcas/ /aM dang a yi rim pa yis/ /gzhan yang ya ra wa la dang/ /sgo yi pad+mar rlung la sogs/ /shar gyi sgo dang g.yas min par//
192b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dag gi gdan du ni/ /ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/ /g.yas dang nub tu nyi ma yang/ /pad+ma dag gi steng du ni/ /gdan gnyis gang du rab tu 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye bas/ /pad+ma'i steng du zla ba dang/ /nyi ma yang ni gdan du
192b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /g.yas dang rgyab tu nyi mar 'gyur/ /lha yi bdag por gnod sbyin du/ /zla ba yi ni gdan du 'gyur/ /thung dang ring po'i sde tshan drug /rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis na/ /kha khyer ka ba'i logs su'o/ /dri sogs rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ /
192b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba/ /shar gyi cha nas rang phyogs su'o/ /de ltar bris pa zin pa dang/ /de nas rdzas rnams bsag par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa/ /slob dpon gyi ni rdzas rnams dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la
192b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rdzas rnams dang/ /de rjes mchod pa'i yan lag rdzas/ /re re nyi shu rtsa lnga dang/ /khyad par tshogs kyi mchod pa'i rdzas/ /chang dang bdud rtsi la sogs pa/ /ci 'byor pa ni bsag par bya/ /bsrung ba
193a1(rgyud 'grel): mda' dang phur bu dang/ /yungs kar phur bu tshon skud do/ /sgrub pa bum pa rnams dang yang/ /sbyin sreg rdzas dang gtor ma'o/ /bsod nams sogs pa'i rdzas dag ni/ /rin chen bdun dang rdzas brgyad dang/ /bum pa
193a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod 'jo nor bu dang/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga'o/ /rdzas ni ji tsam 'byor pa'o/ /de nas rgongs kyi dus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor sngags kyis bslang byas la/ /rang gi 'khor la sbrul dang bsre/ /lha rnams ma lus tshang par bsgom/ /
193a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas shar du las kyi ni/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyi dbye/ /cham dam sngags kyis bstod pa dang/ /sa man ta zhes sngags kyis ni/ /bgegs bskrad lU dang ma tshang bskang/ /lha la me tog phreng ba dor/ /sngags kyi mtshan ma khang pa'i
193a4(rgyud 'grel): nang/ /shel gyi bum pa dkar po la/ /skud pa sna lngas dkris pa ni/ /zur du yang dag gzhag par bya/ /slob dpon 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ /gnas nas sdig pa bshags sogs dang/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang ni/ /las kyi
193a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i cho ga la/ /rigs btso pad+ma las skyes pa'i/ /'byung ba khro ba'i rgyal po yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo bklug nas ni/ /mchod yon dang ni mchod pa bcu/ /lha rnams kun la rgyas byas la/ /dza:hUM baM ho:lcags kyu sogs/ /rim
193a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin yongs su bskyed pa yi/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dgyes byas nas/ /rdul tshon dang ni ro mnyam pa/ /dbang gi ched du bya ba yin/ /de nas bum pa thams cad la/ /bzlas pa lha re brgya byas la/ /mchod dang lha rnams bzhu bar
193a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /zhu ba'i chu yis dkyil 'khor la/ /dbang bskur rim pa bzhin byas la/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni/ /lha rnams sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /hUM yig ye shes sa bon ni/ /snying po yang ni chen po ste/ /brtsegs pa'i yi ge
193b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal du bya/ haM la sogs pa go cha drug /he ba yi ni snying po 'di/ /sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan/ /las kyi dbye ba du ma yis/ /rnam pa mang po ru ni 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'khor gyi sngags kyis kyang/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni
193b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba yin/ /de nas gong gsungs bsreg lugs ni/ /lha rnams kun la sbyin sreg sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad ni/ /dbyangs dang bstod sgra ldan pas ni/ /rin chen gser dang chu me tog /rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ras/ /dri
193b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sbom dang mar me dang/ /dril bu me long bla re dang/ /'bras bu sna tshogs pa la sogs/ /gar dang rol mo sna tshogs pa'i/ /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas ni/ /gong gi gtor ma rgya chen sbyin/ /de ltar mchod pa'i las zin nas// //
193b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma gzhug pa ni/ /khrus dang dri yis rjes byugs shing/ /lus la gos ni ser byin te/ /mig ni dar gyis bkab nas su/ /yol ba'i rgyab tu gzhag nas ni/ /bsang chu dang ni dris lan bya/ /rgyal rnams la ni ding bdag nyid/ /
193b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba mi bzad 'jigs pas na/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dag pa/ /srid pa yi ni 'jigs sel ba/ /khyed kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma ru/ /skyabs su lhag par 'gro bar bgyi/ /gser dang bcas pa'i me tog gis/ /maN+Dal dag ni byas pa
193b6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas ni/ /yol ba'i nang du bsdu bar bya/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag bzhi dang/ /bdun po rnam dag rdzogs par bya/ /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /bla ma yang ni spyi bo ru/ /gzung
193b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi'o rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gyi ni sbyin pa sbyin/ /rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /sbyang bar bgyi'o 'khor lo yi/ /ral gri yi ni mchod par bya/ /chu las skyes kyi rigs kyi ni/ /sdom pa yang ni bskyang bar bgyi/ /sems can rnams
194a1(rgyud 'grel): ni grol ba'i rgyur/ /rgyal ba skyed byed rigs kyi ni/ /byang chub dag ni bskyed par bgyi/ /de nas dam tshig sdom pa sbyin/ /snying ga yi ni zla ba la/ /hUM las rdo rje bkod nas ni/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /
194a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha dang slob dpon ni/ /dam tshig rab tu bsgrag par bya/ /lce la rgyal ba mchog gi ni/ /dam tshig gi ni bdud rtsi bzhin/ /spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o/ /hUM gi sngags ni gcig pu dang/ /ar ra la dang lhan cig tu/ /khro bo yi
194a3(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyal po bskul/ /de yi mtshan nyid rgyud na gsal/ /dbab pa pad+ma'i rting la ni/ /spyi bo snying ga spyi gtsug dang/ /lte ba mgrin pa gsang ba ru/ /rgyal ba rigs kyi sar son pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya/ /de nas rigs kyi dag
194a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /oM sarba zhes bya ba yin/ /dpal gyi sngags kyis mngon bsngags te/ /lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar byas la/ /me tog gcig ni rab tu sbyin/ /dang po bskor ba gsum byas te/ /lag pa'i pad+ma sbyor byas pa'i/ /me tog dkyil
194a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du ni ngor/ /gnas gang du ni lhung ba ni/ /de yi rigs so mi bdag kye/ /dbye ba'i sngags kyis mig ni dbye/ /de nas rigs kyi lha dang ni/ /gtso bo la sogs pa ni bstan/ /'jug pa bdun no mi'i bdag po/ /de nas dbang bskur bya
194a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /slob ma shar gyi sa ru ni/ /cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed nas/ /rigs ni dag par byas nas ni/ /de nas byang gi sgo ru ni/ /rgyal po klu dang bzhi yis ni/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dang/ /lha mo rnams kyis bkrus pa ni/ /sgrol
194a7(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa ru 'gyur/ /cod pan sangs rgyas rab dbye bas/ /bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya/ /de ltar sku ni dag byas la/ /lho ru gsung ni dag par byas la/ /dar dpyangs nas ba rnams yin no/ /rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dang/ /de
194b1(rgyud 'grel): nas shar du brtul zhugs ni/ /dbang po rnams la sbyar ba'o/ /ming ni khro bo byams sogs dag /der ni nub kyi sgo chu ni/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos ngas par ni/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i gnang ba bzhin/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyin te/ /rab mchog gi
194b2(rgyud 'grel): ni snying rje yis/ /dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya// //rigs gtso rigs kyi nges par ni/ /srog gcad pa ni bya ba yin/ /ral gri mi bden par smra ba'i/ /rin po che yis gzhan nor dbrog /pad+mas gzhan gyi bud med dbrog /
194b3(rgyud 'grel): chang dang mar me sangs rgyas dang/ /yul gyi du ma ma lus dang/ /'khor lo yis ni bsten par bya/ /gri gug g.yung sogs bud med kyi/ /mkha' yis pad+ma smod mi bya/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /nor bcas lus ni sbyin par bya'o//
194b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis zhen par mi bya'o/ /bskal pa dpag med rgyal bas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas nyid de gzhan du min/ /min par 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu/ /chu ni sgrol ma sogs lha mo/ /cod pan 'dir ni rgyal ba rnams/ /dar dpyangs nus ma rnams
194b5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /rdo rje nor bu nyi ma zla/ /brtul zhugs yul ni dag par 'dod/ /ming ni byams pa sogs la sbyor/ /gnang ba yis ni byang chub thob/ /srid pa yin ni 'jigs pa sel/ /dus kyi 'khor lo rjes shes pa'o/ /'di dag dbang ni bdun yin no//
194b6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs dri ma sel bar byed/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab sbyin bya/ /dbang bdun bskur bas sa bdun gyi/ /dbang phyug tu ni grol bar 'gyur/ /bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas/ /yang ni phyir mi ldog pa sogs/ /nges pa kho nar 'jug
194b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /shes rab ye shes kyis srid pa'i/ /'jigs sel 'jam dpal dbyangs su 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bas dmyal bar sreg /ltung ba dag pas dbang bdun las/ /gnas pa yon tan gyis sbyang bya/ /bum gsang gnas pa
195a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya la ni/ /brtul zhugs pa yi dbang gis te/ /rtsa ltung byas nas slar yang ni/ /dag phyir dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/ /gnad thob tshogs nang 'jug pa na/ /slar yang rgan nas gzhon spang ngo/ /de nas
195a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin/ /dbang bdun gyi ni cho ga'o/ /bum pa yi ni dbang bskur ba/ /bdag ni bde gshegs kun gyi lam/ /dpal ldan bla ma khyed kyis ni/ /bka' drin gyis ni bdag 'tshal lo/ bla ma
195a3(rgyud 'grel): khyed dang sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ slob dpon gzhan ni mnyes mi bgyi/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi ru maN+Dal bya/ /re khA lnga yis spras pa yi/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab
195a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bya/ /de ru slob ma bzhag nas ni/ /brgyad dang de bzhin bzhi yis ni/ /bum pa nor bu gser gyi 'am/ /sa las byung ba rin chen bcas/ /sman dang dri dang ldan pa yi/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa yis shing stegs dbus su
195a5(rgyud 'grel): bkru bar bya/ /klu yis dpal gyi cod pan bcings nor gyi dpal gyi 'dab ma la/ /bzhi yis bkru dang dar gyis bcing/ /phyag rgya dpal bum gcig gis gter/ /'dir ni bar ma dang bral zhing/ /ri mo 'ang ni rnam par spang/ /dang po chu la
195a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yis dge bsnyen du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bum pa yis ni dge tshul 'gyur/ /gsang dbang dge slong du 'gyur te/ /gnas brtan 'gyur ba gong ma'i rgyu/ /de nas gtor gsum phyag rgya sbyin/ /khyab 'jug thugs su bya ba'i phyir/
195a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug lnga cod pan sbyin/ /tshangs pa'i sku phyir mchod phyir thogs/ /dbang phyug gsung du bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rgyal po'i rigs dbang gis/ /der ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /de ltar sku gsung thugs dbang du/ /lung bstan pa ni
195b1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung dang/ /mig thur nyon mongs spangs pa dang/ /me long ye shes dbang dang ni/ /chos dang phrin las gnang ba dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang/ /dam tshig rnams ni bsgrag par bya/ /de ltar dbang bskur zin nas ni// //
195b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa brtsam par bya/ /steng du bla re bres nas ni/ /sa yi steng gi gnas su ni/ /kun nas ni yig gsum bri'o/ /de nas tsam du gzhag par bya'o/ /nor bu gser gyi bum pa rnams/ /gser gyi snod dang dngul la sogs/ /yang na
195b3(rgyud 'grel): dngul las byung ba la/ /dri yi chu ni gzhag par bya/ /nang du gser las byung ba'i stegs/ /nges pa kho nar gzhag par bya/ /me tog la sogs dri bdugs la/ /nyi ma me la bsros pa yis/ /lha rnams la ni byug par bya/ phye ma rnams kyis
195b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi khro dung mar rnams dang/ /'o ma'i chu yis bkru bar bya/ /grub pa'i don du mar me dang/ /'bras bu sna tshogs mchog gis bya/ /'di ru byas pa zin nas ni/ /gnas de nas ni bskyod par bya/ /de ni gnas nas bskyong byas
195b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sku la na bza' dmar pos ni/ /yang dag par ni bgab par bya/ /dpal gyi dkyil 'khor mdza' ru ni/ /sa mnyam gnas su rgyal ba yi/ ri mo lnga ni bris nas su/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /rang gi rigs kyi phyogs song
195b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa yi/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /lha dang lha mo sku thugs ni/ zhal gyi pad+ma logs su bya/ /mchod rten la sogs glegs bam dang/ /de bzhin du ni bri sku la/ /de la sngags pa kha phyogs bya/ /rgyal
195b7(rgyud 'grel): ba mchog dang lhan cig tu/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin du shes bya/ /phyi nas sngon gsungs rnal 'byor pa/ zla ba nyi ma me skyes la/ /dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rig ma lha mo sogs sangs rgyas
196a1(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li rigs skyes shing/ /rang rang sa bon las skyes rnams/ /snying ga mgrin pa lte ba dang/ /spyi bo spyi gtsug 'khor lo ru/ /rigs kyi dbang gi bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin du ni bsgom bya ba/ /slar
196a2(rgyud 'grel): la yang ni lha rnams ni/ /ma lus pa yi rang lus la/ /ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas ni/ /gnyi ga mnyam par bya ba'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rang lus la/ /gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang/ /ro mnyam bya phyir lha rnams
196a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de nas slob dpon nyid kyis ni/ /lha rnams zhal bsal phyag ni bya/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /sa bon a sogs ka sogs dang/ /rang rig yon tan gyi sa song ba/ /snying ga'i dbus su sa bon te/ /zla ba nyi ma sbyang ba yi
196a4(rgyud 'grel): sku dang gsung dang thugs su kun/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan nyid/ /lus ni ma lus par son pa'i/ /mkha' brgyad de nyid dbyings kyis phye ba ni/ /glegs bam rnams kyi yi ge dang/ /'dab ma rnams ni rnam par dgod/
196a5(rgyud 'grel): mchir ?len nang du dpal 'khor lo/ /me dang nor bu dpal ma mo/ /dbus su ral gri hUM las gyur pa'i grang phreng ni/ /ri lu yongs su bgrang ba ni/ /gsal byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid do/ /dril bu'i lus la dbyangs rnams te//
196a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu yi sum 'gyur byas pa yis/ /ka sogs sde mtshan rdo rje ma/ /mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa dang/ /nor lha bcu yis bgrangs pa yis/ /gsal byed rnams ni sgrol byed la/ /ka sogs sde tshan gug
196a7(rgyud 'grel): skyed bcas/ /nam mkhar ro dang yon tan rnams/ /rnal 'byor rang la bsgom par bya/ /ha hA dpal gyi rna cha la/ /rba ba zung gcig mgul to dang/ /ske rags dag la dgod ba'o/ /de bzhin yi ge ya ni zung/ /gdu bu dag
196b1(rgyud 'grel): la dgod par bya/ /er ka rnams la ha hA gnyis/ /rnam pa lnga yi stong pa ni/ /lus ni ma lus par khyab pa'i/ /thal ba yang ni bsgom par bya/ /rang lus ye shes rnam pa'o/ /rigs gsum gtso bo lhan cig pa'o/ /phung po khams
196b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs ? pa ni/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ni/ /sa bon so so'i rim pa yis/ /lha rnams dgang par bya ba ni/ /mchod rten lder so la sogs la/ /sa bon bkod pas rab gnas 'gyur/ /rang gi lus la sa bon dbab/ /lag pa la ni
196b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi gtso/ /sdud pa yi ni dus su min/ /ri mo bris pa'i bris sku rnams/ /'di ru me long la ni khrus/ /byas nas dri dang spos dang ni/ /dri zhim me tog gis mchod bya/ /glu dang gar dad rol mo dang/ /gos ni mchog gi sna tshogs
196b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rnga yab gdugs rnams kyis ni mchod/ /de ltar rab gnas byas nas ni/ /dri yi mchog ni sna tshogs pas/ /dge 'dun la ni ston mo bya/ /khron pa rdzing dang mtshe'u dang/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams ni bzhi po ru/ /klu yi rgyal po
196b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni dgod/ /mtshon bdun rang gi sa bon ni/ /sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa yi/ /ba yi lnga ni gzhug par bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing sogs su/ /chu lha dgar po phyag na ni/ /zhags pa bsnam pa la bsgom par bya/ /skyed mos tshal
196b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dpag bsam shing/ /yang na kun du bskyed pa'i shing/ /shing gcig pa la gtor bar bya/ /de nas rab gnas zin pa dang/ /dam pa yi ni man ngag gis/ /rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams rim bzhin sbyin/ /ci 'byor pa yi tshogs 'khor
196b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dpa' bo yi ni ston mo bya/ /srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba'i/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sems can yang/ /ye shes lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /snying rjes dkyil 'khor du dbang skur/ /sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i rdo rje yis/ /lus
197a1(rgyud 'grel): ni zla ba lta bur 'gyur/ /rdo rje can gyi lam rnyed nas/ /rang gi gnas su btang bar bya/ /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba las/ /byang chub spyod pa rjes su gzhol/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mdun du ni/ /slob mas
197a2(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi mchog rnams dbul/ /lus kyi nang gi drug cha ni/ /lag pa rkang pa dag dang lus/ /yan lag mchog ni sbyin pa dag /slob dpon la ni rab phul na/ /bde ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zab mo rab tu dbye//
197a3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi dbang po rnams las tshig /yon dang bcas pa dbul bar bya/ /khams kyi nang nas cha drug pa/ /rkang pa gnyis dang phyugs kyi tshogs/ /de kho na yi cha mnan ni/ /cod pan dar dang do shal dang/ /gdu bu yang ni de bzhin te/ /
197a4(rgyud 'grel): rna cha ska bo che la sogs/ /slob dpon la ni rab phul zhing/ /rang gi nus pas yon rnams ni/ dbul po mi yi bdag po kye/ //ma lus tshogs kyi rigs la yang/ /bsod nams rgyu ru dbul ba ni/ /gzhan gyi don du
197a5(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gdab/ /bsod nams 'di yis sems can rnams/ /bcom ldan rnam pa gsum gyi ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog// /de nas bzod par gsol ba ni/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ru/ /ye shes sems dpa' 
197a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma'i bar gyi rdul mtshon rnams/ /chu bo gtsang mar bskyur bar bya/ /dam pa dang po'i rgyud rgyal mthong nas bdag gis ni/ /rim bzhin rjes su sbyar gyi rang bzor byas pa min/ /slob ma dam
197a7(rgyud 'grel): pas gsol btab ngor byas kyi/ /nga rgyal la sogs grags pa'i dbang gis min/ /bdag gis cho ga 'di byas pas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtogs pa dang/ /byed pa dge ba spel ba dang/ /bstan bcos rnyed dang ldan par shog/ //
197b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dus kyi zhabs chen po dam pa'i snang ba dang ldan pas mdzad pa/ rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po b+ha ni sh+rI dang/ lotsA ba
197b2(rgyud 'grel): la mchi mas yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//) ///*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kA la tsakra sa ha dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi
197b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa bsgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'jigs skyob pa/ /bud med sbyor la tshangs par spyod/ /thugs rje shes rab dbyer med la/ /phyag 'tshal de bsgrub
197b4(rgyud 'grel): mdo tsam bri/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i sa yi char/ /sngags pa rab tu yid dge bas/ /maN+Dal la sogs pa byas la/ /gtor ma sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/ /bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas b+h+ruM las rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsams
197b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ dbus su skyes dang/ nyi ma la/ hUM rab tu dkar ba las 'od 'phros te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bkug nas/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ /stong pa rlung dang me dang chu/ /sa dang rgya mtsho ro pad+ma/ zla ba nyi ma me
197b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil du/ /rin chen khang brtsegs 'od 'phro bsgom/ /zla ba nyi ma me steng du/ /drag po 'dod lha'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje dang ni dril 'dzin 'khyud/ /gangs ri ltar dkar btsun mor bcas/ /pha rol phyin drug dag pa'i rgyan/ /yon
197b7(rgyud 'grel): tan thams cad tshad med pas/ /tshad med dag pa'i chos ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /lte bar sangs rgyas yum bcas bsregs/ /spyi bor zla ba bzang rgyun 'dzag /chos 'byung gnyis 'dus rdo rje can/ /srid gsum
198a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs dag bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor las/ /shes rab pad+mar sems thig le/ /lhan cig skyes pa bde dbang gis/ /mi shigs 'od gsal bsgom par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs/
198a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi gtso bo bzhi dag ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma las skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsung/ /pad+mar mnyam sod bsgrub par 'gyur/
198a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sbyor la mi 'dzag gang/ /bsgrub pa chen po nyid 'gyur te/ /phra mo yi ni sbyor bas so/ /de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba khyab bdag las/ /rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pas ni/ thun mong thun mong ma
198a4(rgyud 'grel): yin rtags/ /smig rgyu nam mkha' la sogs mthong/ /oM kA la tsakra A:hUM ho swAhA/ oM h+raM h+roM h+rraM h+rriM h+riM h+rli ha:swAhA/ oM badzra d+hA twI shwo re A:huM ho swAhA/ /ting nge 'dzin las skyo na/ mdo li la sogs pa'i rnam pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /
198a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ dus dang/ ro dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ me dang/ nam mkha' i de kho na nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /gtor ma ni mtshan phyed na sbyin par bya ste/ dus dang/ ro yi yi ges byin gyis brlabs la/ rgya mtsho dang/
198a6(rgyud 'grel): mig gi phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyin par bya'o/ /oM brahma biShU ni ri ta/ bA yu ya ma/ agne sa ma tre mI shwaren+d+ra yak+She b+hya(rgyud 'grel): /sa pa ri wA re b+hya:ai daM ba liM/ gand+haM/ pu paM d+hU paM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM da dA ma hi/ te tsA ka tya/ sa pa
198a7(rgyud 'grel): ri wA re/ shI g+h+raM i daM ba liM gri h+nan+tu saM tripta/ huM hUM phaT badzra d+ha rAdz+nya pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /nor mchog gtong pa sbyin pa ste/ /yum sbyor mi 'dzag tshul khrims so/ /sgra sogs mi 'jug bzod pa ste/
198b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis spong le lo med brtson 'grus/ /kun nas mi g.yeng bsam gtan mchog /bde sbyor 'od gsal shes rab yin/ /de 'bras bsam mi khyab rmad byung/ /he ru ka dpal brjod pa'o/ /de ltar cung zad dus 'byung rgyud/ /snying po sbas
198b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di phyung bas/ /sgrub po yang dag sbyor rnams la/ /ye shes me chen 'bar bar 'gyur/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dus kyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
198b3(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+hA sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ka la tsakra ri Ti ti sa ha dza sA d+ha naM nA ma ni/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo skad cig gis
198b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bde ba chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa dang bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma nges rab tu 'khyud/ skye 'jig rnam par spangs pa'i mi 'gyur
198b5(rgyud 'grel): bde la bgod pa la sogs rnams dang bral ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed par mdzad pa'i sku gsum dang bcas dus gsum yang dag mkhyen pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas gnyis med de la
198b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po skad cig gcig gis stong pa la gnas phyi nas de bzhin skad cig gis skyed pa/ /sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas dbang phyug dang/ /'dod lha ngag gi
198b7(rgyud 'grel): snying gar g.yas brgyang shin tu sngo ba rdo rje dril bu dang ldan phyag gnyis kyi/ /sna tshogs yum gyi sku la yang dag 'khyud pa'i dpal ldan mnga' bdag dus 'khor lo/ /sprin nag lta bu'i ral pa'i tshogs la ha ma la mtshungs
199a1(rgyud 'grel): mi skyod pa la sogs pas spras/ /phyag rgya drug gis kyang ni rab spras thod ba dkar ba'i phreng bas bcings pa gang/ /mi mgo'i do shal spyan gsum gser mtshungs sku mnga' gri gug par snod dang ldan phyag
199a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma/ /dpal ldan sna tshogs yum dang gnyis med bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sogs bsgom par bya/ /de nas khams gsum rang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de rnams ma lus lha mo'i sku la gzhug /de yang rang la rang lus
199a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang bcas pa nyi ma la ste nyi ma hUM la'o/ /u ni haM la de yang mgo bo la ste de nyid zla ba phyed pa nyid la'o/ /zla phyed thig le de nyid nA da de bzhin nam mkha' kha rlangs me long la phog mtshungs/ /de ltar 'od gsal zhugs nas slar
199a4(rgyud 'grel): yang snga ma dang mtshungs gzugs su dran par byas pa dang/ /sprul pa sna tshogs khams gsum rnams su nam mkha' khyab par skad cig gis ni spro bar bya/ /de ltar yang ni de bzhin bsdu zhing yang ni de ltar bskyed cing spro ba de bzhin du//
199a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa'i zung 'jug lam 'di yis ni sangs rgyas zhabs la yang dag 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpal ldan dus 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /gang byas pa yis bsod nams 'dis/ /'jig rten pa rnams lhan skyes
199a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /gnyis med rang bzhin zhabs thob shog/ //dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta bA gI shwa ra
199a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lo tsA ba chos rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// (//sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya bas bcu'i dbang phyug phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Sha DAM g.yo ga nA ma/ bod skad du/
199b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la 'dir thabs ni yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor te/ /'dir bar ma rim pa las bzlog pas bstan cing nang gi yan lag re re dor ba
199b2(rgyud 'grel): snga ma ma bstan pa'i yan lag nyid yan lag phyi ma bstan pa'i shugs nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste/ dper na 'di ni nyin spyod ces brjod pas gzhan mtshan spyod bya ba ma brjod kyang shugs nyid kyis nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /
199b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du yang gang zhig phan mtshun ltos pa'i chos ni ma bstan pa yang bstan pa'i chos kyis nye bar rtogs so/ /de'i phyir rgyud 'dir yan lag re re'i khongs su gtogs pa'i yan lag gsum bstan to/ /bar du bshad
199b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag dang por bya ba ni 'dir bla ma'i man ngag ste/ /gzhan du na gang gi tshe rgyud las gsungs pa'i rim pas gzung na ni de'i tshe bla ma'i man ngag ci zhig dgos/ /de'i phyir dgongs pas bshad pa la sogs pa thams cad
199b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya ba 'am/ yang na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las shes par bya ba yin gyi mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa rnams kyis byas pa las ni ma yin no/ des na bsam gtan zhes
199b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pas yan lag gzhan gsum shes par bya'o/ /rgyud gzhan du yan lag drug gsungs pa 'dir mdor byas pa'i don gyis yan lag gsum du rtogs par bya ba ste/ 'dir gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las/ /so sor sdud dang bsam
199b7(rgyud 'grel): gtan dang/ /srog dang rtsol dang 'dzin pa dang/ /rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te/ /rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod ces gsungs te/ /des na bsam gtan gyi sngon du 'gro ba ni so sor sdud pa'o/ /sngags bzlas pa'i sngon
200a1(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro ba ni srog dang rtsol ba ste/ 'dir sngags bzlas pa'i sgras ni ma ning gi bzlas pa 'am rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste/ srog gi rlung 'dzin par brjod do/ /bde ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rjes su dran pa ste/ de la bde
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgras ting nge 'dzin bstan to/ /de ltar na yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor pa nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tha mal pa'i phyi'i 'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor grub pa ni las dang po'i byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sngags
200a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dang bsam gtan gyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo brtags pa'i bsgom pa'i sems dang bde ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang/ 'bab pa'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba
200a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i bde bas ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de ltar rim pa gnyis kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
200a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa nyid mchog gi yan lag drug gi sbyor bas 'grub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bstan par bya ste/ 'dir so sor sdud pa ni phyi'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'jug
200a6(rgyud 'grel): cing/ nang gi yul rnams la lha'i mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi rnam par shes pa 'jug pa ste/ nang gi ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi dmigs pa rnam par ma brtags par mthong ba ni dngos po thams cad
200a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba stong pa nyid kyis te/ ji ltar bu mos gzugs brnyan mthong ba ltar khams gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mthong ba ni so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba yan lag dang po'o/ /de nas bsam gtan ni dngos po
200b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa thams cad kyi stong pa shes rab tu 'dus pa la sems kyi 'jug pa'o/ /rtog pa zhes bya ba ni sems kyi dngos po'i don 'dzin pa'o/ /dpyod pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i khyad par 'dzin pa'o/ /dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad la sems gnas pa'o/ /bde ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi
200b2(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan gyi yan lag lnga bstan to/ /de nas srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni la lan dang/ ra sa nA ste g.yas pa dang g.yon pa 'gags shing a ba d+hU tI ra thim ste dbus kyi lam du srog gi
200b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung rtag tu 'jug pa ste/ rngub pa dang/ gnas pa dang/ 'byung ba'i sbyor bas a ba d+hU tir oM gyis 'jug pa dang/ hUM gis 'gog pa dang/ A:sa 'byung ba dang/ zla ba dang/ sgra gcan dang/ nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis goms par byed pa
200b4(rgyud 'grel): ni srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung lte ba dang/ snying ga dang/ lkog ma dang/ dpral ba'i dbang chen dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'jug pas thig le la srog gnas shing
200b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi 'byung ba ni 'dzin pa'i yan lag tu bstan to/ /de nas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni rang dad pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan mthong ba rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o/ /de las 'od zer du ma 'phro ba'i gzugs can rab tu snang ba'i
200b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi tshul can khams gsum du spro ba de rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go /ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rang dad pa'i lha la rjes su chags shing mi 'jig pa'i bde ba/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med par sems rtse gcig
200b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yin na/ /zhes ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /'dir yan lag drug ni rnal 'byor mdor gsungs ba ste rgyas par ni 'bum sde 'am/ dpal mchog dang po 'am/ bla ma'i man ngag las phyag rgya chen po'i
201a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas khong du chud par bya'o/ /'dir yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor dang po'i lam du bsgom pa'i man ngag bstan pa rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las
201a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa dang/ nye bar sgrub ba dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sgrub pa chen po rnams te/ ji skad du/ bsnyen dus gtsug tor chen po yi/ /gzugs su 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /nye sgrub dus su de bzhin du/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i gzugs bsgom bya/ /sgrub
201a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la ni lha yi gzugs/ /rnal 'byor brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas mda' bdag gzugs nyid ni/ /sgrub pa che la rnam par brtag ces gsungs te/ 'dir dgongs pa'i tshig gzhan gyis gtsug tor chen po'i gzugs ni
201a4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku nam mkha' i chos 'byung bar thugs rje rab tu gzhag cing bsnyen pa'i dus dang por so sor sdud pas sgom zhing bsam gtan gyi yan lag gis kyang brtan par bya'o/ /de la bcom ldan 'das
201a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis dam bca' ba ni rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /nyin zhag gcig la rnam par brtag /gal te rtags ni ma byung na/ /de tshe nga yi tshig brdzun yin/ /de la rtags ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gzhan du sngags la
201a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs ma yin no/ /zhag gcig la sgrub pa gang gis sngags pa la rtags 'byung ste/ de'i phyir sngags pas yod pa dang med pa'i blo spangs nas ltos pa med par byas la/ zab cing mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid las du ba
201a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'byung ba de dag bsgom zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/ /byed dang bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya/ zhes bya ba las gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
201b1(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs pa'i byed pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nyid kyi man ngag ni zhal las khong du chud par bya'o/ /de la bla ma'i man ngag gis rnal 'byor pas dang por nam mkha' la du ba lta bu mthong ste smig rgyu ni ma yin zhes
201b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gis nyams su myong bar shes par bya'o/ /de nas smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /du ba la sogs pa de nyid rtog pa med par gzugs brnyan bzhin du'o/ /dang po du ba lta bu dang/ /gnyis pa smig rgyu lta bu dang// //
201b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa mkha' snang lta bu dang/ /bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang/ /lnga pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i rtags gsang ba 'dus pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba las gsungs so/ /gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma'i
201b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dra ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa dang/ skad cig rmi lam lta bu'i rjes/ /de ni kun mkhyen rgyu yin te/ /dngos grub nye bar ster byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ des na bcom ldan 'das kyis
201b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' las dang po du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni bsgoms pa'i rtags su 'gyur ro/ kha cig ni grub pa'i dus su zhes smra ste/ de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam bca' ma nyams par byed pa ste/ rtog pa thams
201b6(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs spangs te/ nyin zhag gcig la brtag par bya/ /zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' sun 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa'i dus su 'jig rten pa'i du ba la sogs pa dang/ sgyu ma la sogs pa gang yin
201b7(rgyud 'grel): pa de rtags su mi 'gyur te/ dngos su du ba dang/ 'bar ba dang/ sreg pa'i bya ba nus ba'i phyir ro/ /dper na/ gur gum dang/ me tog dang/ rin po che dang/ gser la sogs pa'i char gyis kyang ngo/ /de'i phyir yan lag drug gi
202a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi rtags du ba la sogs par 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o/ /de ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje dra ba'i rgyud las kyang/ yan lag drug bsgom de nas ni/ /slar yang bdag byin brlabs par
202a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas go rims ji lta ba'i/ /cho gas mtshan ma rtogs par bya/ zhes gsungs te/ de la bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni kun rdzob kyi stong pa nyid mthong ba'o/ /so sor sdud pa'i mtshan ma ni sprin dang du ba la sogs pa lta bur snang ba
202a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de yang mar me'i mdza' / /de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i bar du'o/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su dang po 'bar ba nas thig le'i mdza' i bar du ste/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u las kyang/ bcom
202a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba//
202a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sgyu 'phrul dra bar rtags gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa'i tshig gis gsungs so//
202a6(rgyud 'grel): sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las byung ba gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba ltar snang ba'o/ /'od chen rnam par snang
202a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad ces bya ba ni zla ba ltar snang ba ste de nyid kho nar ye shes snang ba lam me ba'o/ /'gro ma'i mar me zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i snang ba'o/ /ye shes sgron zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan ltar snang ba'o/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba ni/
202b1(rgyud 'grel): glog ltar snang ba'o/ /sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal zhes bya ba ni thig le ltar snang ba ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po'i rnam pa'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen mdzad ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi khams gsum
202b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dngos po'i snang ba sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mtshungs pa so sor sdud pa'i sbyor bas mthong ba'o/ /mig gi dbang po'i byed pa dang de nas srog dang rtsol ba'i bcing pa ste/ byed pa 'di rnams dang bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis sa gsum po ni bsgrub
202b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can no/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bzhin du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba las kyang/ 'gro dang mi 'gro khams gsum ni/ /ji srid
202b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams rnams dang/ /rdo rje'i lus ldan ji srid pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /ces yan lag drug gis so zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o/ /de bzhin du gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang/ /dngos po med cing
202b5(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa med/ /bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ 'dir dngos po med pa ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha' o/ /sgom pa ni so sor sdud pa'o/ /de nyid ni dngos po
202b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa bsgom pa min zhes bya ba'o/ /'dir so sor sdud pa'i sgom pa'i yul ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha' yin pas sgom pa yang yod pa ma yin te/ rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar dngos po ni so sor
202b7(rgyud 'grel): sdud pas mthong ba de yang dngos po ma yin te ma brtags par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dngos po rnams dngos po med par mthong ba'o/ /de nas so sor sdud pa sgom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa sgom pa mi
203a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /bsgom pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang 'di lta ste/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa
203a2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka nam mkha' la sbyor bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
203a3(rgyud 'grel): la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po sgom pa ni gzugs bsnyan dang sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa dang/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to/ /de ltar so sor sdud pa dang/ bsam gtan  
203a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brnyen pa'i yan lag bstan to/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs dgongs pas rlung du bshad do/ /de 'ang rnam pa gnyis te gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rin chen lnga'i rang bzhin
203a5(rgyud 'grel): dbugs/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsgom/ zhes gsungs pa la/ 'dir rin chen lnga'i sgras ni ra sa nA la dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can sa la sogs pa'i khams
203a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o/ /de'i bdag nyid kyi dbugs ni rin chen lnga'i rang bzhin sna bug g.yas pa la'o/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas lnga ni la la nA la dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po lnga ste de rnams kyis byin gyis
203a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa sna khung g.yon pa la'o/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung ba ni 'dir gong bu'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi srog gi rlung dbus ma a ba d+hU tIr gcig tu 'gyur ba'o/ /srog gi rlung de yang gong bu'i
203b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis phyung nas sna'i rtse mor bsgom pa ste/ de la sna'i rtse mo'i sgras lte ba dang/ snying ga dang/ lkog ma dang/ dpral ba dang/ gtsug tor gyi pad+ma'i lte ba bstan te de'i rtse mor bsgom par bya'o/ /sna'i rtse mor bsgom pa ni g.yas pa dang
203b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i lte bar ro/ /de ltar thig le'i gnas su gong bu'i tshul can srog 'dzin pas na de nyid 'dzin par bstan to/ /de bzhin du yan lag gnyis kyis nye bar sgrub pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs te/ nye bar sgrub pa de nyid
203b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzlas par bstan te yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i rtsal mi rgyu ba'o/ /gtsug tor gyi gzugs mthong nas phyi nas sngags pas srog dang rtsol ba la bya ba ste/ bla ma'i man ngag dang dgongs pa'i tshig las
203b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni srog dang rtsol ba dang 'dzin pa de'ang nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /de nas bsgrub pa la ni lha yi gzugs/ /zhes gsungs pa la/ 'dir 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis lte bar gnas pa'i tsaN+Da lI 'bar bar rnal 'byor bas mthong
203b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba yis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyi sprin mdza' yas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'phro ba'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes pa can te rjes su dran pas ni sgrub pa
203b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /'dzin pa'i mthar tsaN+Da lI'i sbyor ba sgom pa 'di ni nges pa'o/ /de nas de'i ye shes kyis 'od kyis phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched rnams bsregs nas ro gcig par bya zhing g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i rtsa la gnas pa'i
203b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang/ sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rang bzhin dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang/ de nas tsaN+Da lI'i ye shes kyi me'i 'od kyis zla ba zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rnam
204a1(rgyud 'grel): pas 'og tu bab pa ste/ lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba'i pad+mar dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ de nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' 
204a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid dam/ yang na rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/ rnam par 'joms pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis te/ de ltar bcu drug gi cha yongs su rdzogs shing bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nor bu'i
204a3(rgyud 'grel): nang du chud pa'i bde ba gang gi tshe 'byung ba de'i tshe tshig gi bde ba lta bu dpe tsam ste/ ngo bo nyid ni dbang po gnyis las byung ba 'jig pa'i bde ba des ni mchog tu mi 'jig pa'i bde ba'i bye ba phrag stong gi char yang mi phod do/ /'dir
204a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jig pa'i bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi gnas skabs ni tshig gi yul ma yin ba byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rnam par mi shes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes
204a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ 'jig rten la grags pa'i med pa nyid kyi don du ltung bar byed pa ni ma yin no/ zhes dgongs pa'o/ /de ltar na yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor/ sngags bzlas pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ bde bas rnal 'byor pa nyid
204a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid do/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed pa'i mchog rnal 'byor pas tshe 'di la 'grub ces bsgrub par bya ba dang/ sgrub pa'i des pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to/ /sbyor ba yan lag drug ces bya ba gsang ba
204a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag po sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba'i zhal snga nas lo tsA ba tsog ro dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang
204b1(rgyud 'grel): pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo snying po rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//) /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kA la tsakra garb+hA lang kA ra sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal
204b2(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi 'khor lo snying po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus 'khor bden pa gnyis kyi bdag /
204b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi zab mo longs spyod rdzogs/ /'gro ba dang mos sprul sku dang/ /mnyam pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kA ni mi 'gyur zhi ba ste/ /la ni 'di la stobs dang ldan/ /tsa ni sems kyi g.yo ba nyid/ /kra ni sems kyi 'ching ba ste/ /ye shes
204b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad rmi lam thugs chud cing/ /mi mkhyen mi mnga' sa le mkhyen/ /thugs kyi chos dbyings nyid las 'byung/ /ye shes thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi sku yi gsung dang thugs/ /longs
204b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /sprul pa'i sku yi sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes gcig tu sbyor la 'dud/ /dpal ldan dus 'khor sbyor ba 'di/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi sems can gyis/ /ye shes 'dod lugs mi shes pas/ /nga mkhas zer
204b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing byis pa 'drid/ /nga rgyal can ni glegs bam mthong bas khengs/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i bla ma la brnyas shing/ /shi ma thag tu rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro /de phyir dus 'khor rgyan 'di bdag gis bri/ /de la dang po kho nar bdag nyid la gnas pa
204b7(rgyud 'grel): ste rnal 'byor pa'i lus la khams drug ste/ 'khor lo drug la la la nA dang/ ra sa nA dang/ dbus ma a ba d+hU tI rtsa gsum dang bcas pa gnas te/ gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la rtsa 'dab ma lnga'i dbus ni a ku ha'i sde tshan dang
205a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang nam mkha' i khams dang rna ba'i dbang po dang chos dang b+ha ga dang khu ba dang 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam rang bzhin bskyed pa'o/ /dpral bar bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab
205a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug la de'i dbus na u pu wa nypa'i sde tshan dang 'du shes kyi phung po dang chu'i khams dang lce'i dbang po dang yul gzugs dang rkang pa'i dbang po dang len pa dang 'di rnams skyed par byed pa'o/ /mgrin pa longs
205a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis na ri Tu ra Sha'i sde tshan dang/ tshor ba'i phung po dang me'i khams dang mig gi dbang po dang ro dang lag pa dang 'gro ba dang 'di rnams bskyed pa'o/ /snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo
205a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa 'dab ma brgyad na i tsu ya sha'i sde mtshan dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang rlung gi khams dang sna'i dbang po dang yul reg bya dang ngag gi dbang po dang dri chen 'dzag pa dang 'di rnams bskyed par byed pa'o/ /lte ba sprul pa'i
205a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi na li du la sa'i sde tshan dang gzugs kyi phung po dang sa'i khams dang lus kyi dbang po dang dri dang bshang ba'i dbang po dang brjod pa dang 'di rnams skyed par byed pa ste stong pa chen po
205a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge lnga zhes bya'o/ /drug pa ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis ni ye shes kyi phung po dang/ ye shes kyi khams dang yid kyi dbang po dang sgra dang dbang po dam pa dang dri chu 'dzag pa 'di rnams
205a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ste/ ro mnyam zhing bskyed pa gcig tu 'dres pa ni thig le stong pa yi ge drug pa'i ngo bo shes rab kyi rnam pa e'i cha byad can lnga po ni thabs kyi rnam pa baM gi rang bzhin te/ 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom
205b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ e dang pad+ma nam mkha' i dbyings/ /b+ha ga chos 'byung chu skyes kyi/ /ser gdan rdo rje can bzhugs pa/ /bdag gi rgyud kyi nang du gsungs/ /rdo rje can baM rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang/ /grA
205b2(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dus 'khor lo/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas sogs ming dang/ /sna tshogs yum gyi ming rnams kyis/ /gnas dang rten gyi mtshan nyid dang/ /brten pa dag gis gsungs pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /ston pa kun mkhyen rdo rje 'chang/ /sangs rgyas
205b3(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /dus kyi 'khor lo ston pa bo/ /zla ba bzang po khyod kyis zhus zhes gsungs so/ /gcig pa yi ni rnam par shes pa'i sems gcig rang bzhin no/ /de la la la ni rnam par shes pa brgyad du 'dod do//
205b4(rgyud 'grel): la la ni drug tu 'dod do/ /la la ni rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa dang dgu ru 'dod do/ /nges pa'i don du rnam par shes pa gcig nyid yin gyi du ma ni ma yin no/ /de yang lung dang rigs pas mngon te/ lung mdo sde lang kar gshegs pa
205b5(rgyud 'grel): las/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgya mtsho chen po las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa yul gyi rlabs dang 'dra ba 'byung zhes pa dang/ sde snod gsum las kyang/ /ring du rgyu
205b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing gcig par gnas/ /lus med dbang po'i phug song ba/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems 'dul byed/ /'di ni bram zer ngas bshad de/ /bdud kyis bcings pa las grol 'gyur/ zhes pa dang/ rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid las kyang/ /
205b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba po dang byed pa po ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid yin gyi ji ltar sbubs kyi srin bu bzhin no zhes so/ /dpal sangs rgyas thong pa las kyang/ /sems gcig dri med me long bzhin/ /gang bsams de ni gzugs brnyan te/ /
206a1(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam ltar bur shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang rnam par rtog pas bzung/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyud las kyang/ /rnam par shes pa gcig nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /rigs pas kyang rnam
206a2(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa brgyad ni mi 'thad de kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ye shes bzhi la la ni chos can la dmigs la la ni chos dang chos can gnyis ka la dmigs zer te/ gang
206a3(rgyud 'grel): chos can la dmigs pa'i ye shes de nyid sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ma yin te/ chos can la dmigs pa'i phyir dper na sems can bzhin no/ /kha cig na re kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyun brtan pa yin la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes
206a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mi brtan pa yin zer ro/ /de la skad cig ma skye 'gag byed mi byed brtags te/ de la du ma ni kun gzhi skad cig mkhas len te/ skad cig ma mi rtag pa de dang rgyun gyi rtag pa de gnyis skad cig ma mi rtag par khyad par med de
206a5(rgyud 'grel): mi rtag pa'i phyir na'o/ /dper na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzhin no/ /de'i phyir rnam par shes pa du ma ma yin te gcig kho na the tshom yin no/ /'di la kha cig 'di skad du sems par
206a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ 'du shes kyi phung po dang tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po la sogs pa rang rig pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa nyams su myong bas na rnam par shes pa yin no/ /gzugs kyi phung po ji ltar rnam pa yin zhe na/ smras
206a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ mngon pa'i mdo las kyang/ rdul phra rab kyis ni sa ma byas/ sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi snang/ /ji ltar 'o ma gyur pa las/ /yon tan zho dang 'dra ba 'byung/ /de bzhin rnam shes gyur pas ni/ /rnam par gyur nas
206b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su snang/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde lang kar gshegs pa las kyang/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa yi/ /phyi rol dngos po yod min par/ /bag chags kyis ni sbags pa'i sems/ /don gyi dngos
206b2(rgyud 'grel): por rab tu skyes zhes so/ /mdo sde sa bcu pa las kyang/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa 'di dag sems tsam zhes gsungs so/ /de'i phyir na khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa las gud na skra'i rtse mo brgyar
206b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa tsam yang grub pa med do/ /des na khams gsum pa'i rang gi sems nyid sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang ye shes la sogs par rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo/ /de yang shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid du gcig go /
206b4(rgyud 'grel): de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las gsal bar gsungs te/ de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyang/ rnam pa kun ni rang gi sems nyid de/ yul dang bral ba rang gi sems nyid min zhes pa dang/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
206b5(rgyud 'grel): lus sems lta bu bskyed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de nas thog ma med pa nas spros pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag gis yul sems tha dad par snang gi ngo
206b6(rgyud 'grel): bo tha dad pa ni ma yin no/ /de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po sam bu Ta las/ chu bo'i rgyun dang rgya mtsho bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /chu bo stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang rgya mtsho las byung nas rgya mtshor 'jug pa
206b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa las byung nas slar rnam par shes pa la 'jug go /smras pa rnam par shes pa nyid thog ma med pa nas spros pa'i bag chags la zhen pa'i dbang gis
207a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin du snang ba dang bems po ru snang ba de'i phyir te/ rnam par shes pa nyid tha dad du snang bas so/ /dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba lta bu'o/ /shel dag pa tshon gyis bsgyur ba lta bu'o/ /de yang
207a2(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi bye brag gis shes pa de nyid 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa tha dad par snang gi ngo bo la ni ma yin no/ /shes pa dag ni gar mkhan dang sgyu ma mkhan dang 'dra'o/ /de nyid rang byung
207a3(rgyud 'grel): gi ye shes dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyis stong pa spros pa'i mdza' dang bral ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po ste/ de nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes chen po ste gang nas kyang ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste/ gzung
207a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis stong pa'i phyir dang stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i phyir dang bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang/ dngos po kun dang rnam bral zhing/ /phung po
207a5(rgyud 'grel): khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang/ sangs
207a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na rnam par shes pa 'am ye shes ni gcig kho na'o/ /thun mong
207a7(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i bca' gzhi ste dang po'o// //da ni lha'i ngo bo gsal bar bya ste/ /de yang gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang/ /mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags/ /rdo rje skye mched
207b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dag kyang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog /sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/ /me rlung gos dkar sgrol mar grags/ zhes gsungs ste/ /des na phung po dang khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mor gsal lo/ /rigs drug pa ni dpal
207b2(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgya cher 'grel ba las kyang/ phung po drug dang khams drug dang dbang po drug dang yul drug dang las kyi dbang po drug ces gsungs so/ /de gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor
207b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni snang ba mdza' yas so/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni don yod grub pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /ye shes kyi phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /sa ni sangs rgyas
207b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan no/ /chu ni mA ma kI'o/ /me ni gos dkar mo'o/ /rlung ni sgrol ma'o/ /nam mkha' ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /ye shes kyi khams ni sna tshogs kyi yum mo/ /mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna la ser sna rdo rje'o//
207b5(rgyud 'grel): lce la 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje'o/ /yid la dbang phyug rdo rje'o/ /gzugs la gzugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /sgra la sgra'i rdo rje'o/ /dri la dri'i rdo rje'o/ /ro la ro'i rdo rje'o/ /reg la reg gi rdo rje'o/ /chos la chos kyi rdo rje'o/
207b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gi brjod pa dang dbang po la gshin rje mthar byed yab yum mo/ /lag pa dang len pa la shes rab mthar byed yab yum mo/ /rkang pa dang 'gro ba la bgegs mthar byed yab yum mo/ /bshang lam dang dri chen la pad+ma mthar byed
207b7(rgyud 'grel): yab yum mo/ /b+ha ga dang dri la gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba yab yum mo/ /dam pa'i dbang po khu ba la gnod mdzes yab yum mo/ /des ni lus rnam par dben pa gsal par bstan to/ /lha sum cu rtsa drug po de ni 'khor lo drug la 
208a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma bzhi'i dbus na mi bskyod pa'i rigs rnams gnas so/ /dpral ba bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus na 'od dpag med pa'i sde gnas so/ /
208a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus na rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs rnams so/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus na don yod grub pa'i sde gnas so/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor
208a3(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dbus na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs rnams gnas so gsang ba'i 'khor lo rtse 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus na rdo rje sems dpa' i rags rnams gnas so/ /de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams lha
208a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar bstan pas tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal nas de nyid du gsal lo/ /de yang 'khor lo re re la drug drug tu bstan to/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na shar na don yod grub pa gnas/ lho na
208a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan gnas/ /nub na rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ byang na snang ba mdza' yas gnas/ dbus steng na mi bskyod pa/ 'og na rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /de yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las/ stong pa chen po'i yi ge lnga/ /
208a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le stong pa yi ge drug /ces gsungs so/ /lus rnam par dben pa'i rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// //da ni gsung rnam par dag pa'i srog rtsol brjod de/ de yang 'khor lo drug tu gtsug tor du a/ dpral bar
208a7(rgyud 'grel): u/ mgrin par ri/ snying gar i/ lte bar li/ gsang bar aM gnas so/ /de ni gtsug tor na a stong pa'o/ /dpral ba na o dang u dang hA'o/ /mgrin par aro/ /snying gar ya i dang ya'o/ /lte ba na ta dang al lo/ /gsang ba na
208b1(rgyud 'grel): i'o/ /de ltar sna rtse drug la rlung dang byang sems dbyer med par gnas/ de ltar sna rtse re re na yang drug drug gnas te/ 'khor lo drug gi shar nas rlung rgyu/ lho nas me rgyu/ nub nas sa rgyu/ byang nas chu rgyu/ dbus steng nam mkha' / dbus 'og nas
208b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyu ste/ de bzhin du 'khor lo lnga las kyang de bzhin du rgyu'o/ /de rnams kyang la la nA dang/ ra sa nA dang/ a ba d+hU tI nas rim pa bzhin rgyu ste/ 'byung ba lnga'i dbugs phung po lnga bskyed pa'i bdag nyid yan lag lnga'i rlung lnga rgyu ste/ rdo rje
208b3(rgyud 'grel): sgong rgyud las/ srog dang thur du sel ba dang/ me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang/ gyen du rgyu dang khyab byed dang/ rgyu dang rnam par rgyu ba dang/ /yang rgyu rnam par rgyu ba dang/ /rab tu rgyu dang nges par rgyu zhes gsungs so/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo
208b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyang/ srog ces bya ba'i rlung gcig pu/ /rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba ste/ steng dang 'og dang shar du'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid rnam par dgrol te steng du ni nam mkha' i rang bzhin gyen du rgyu ba ljang gu'o/ /'og tu ye shes kyi rang bzhin
208b5(rgyud 'grel): thur du sal ba sngon po'i rlung ngo/ /shar du 'od zer nag po mnyam pa'i rlung ngo/ /nub tu srog gi rlung ser po'o/ /lhor khyab byed kyi rlung dmar po'o/ /byang du lhas byin gyi rlung dkar po'o/ /de bzhin du rus sbal dang/ klu dang/ rtsangs pa dang/
208b6(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyas te rlung bcu'o/ /de yang rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i rlung 'khor lo drug nas khyab par rgyu ste/ de yang la la nA nas khri bzhi brgya drug cu rtsa phyed dang gsum rgyu/ ra sa nA nas khri bzhi brgya drug cu rtsa phye dang gsum rgyu/
208b7(rgyud 'grel): a ba d+hU tI nas drug brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga'i dbugs rab tu rgyu'o/ /de ltar lte ba'i 'khor lo la rA shi bcu gnyis kyi 'dab ma la rim pa bzhin du rgyu ste/ lug la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i 'dab ma la brgya phrag bco brgyad kyi dbugs
209a1(rgyud 'grel): las a ba d+hU tIr bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu rtsa drug rgyu'o/ /de dbugs drug las chu srang du 'gyur ro/ /chu srang drug cu la chu tshod du 'gyur ro/ /chu tshod lngas dus sbyor du 'gyur ro/ /dus sbyor phyed dang gnyis
209a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis thun re thun brgyad do/ /dus sbyor gnyis gnyis kyis dus drug go /dus sbyor gsum gsum gyis dus bzhi'o/ /dus sbyor bzhi bzhis dus gsum du 'gyur ro/ /dus sbyor drug drug gis bgrod pa gnyis de thams cad
209a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rnam par shes pa gcig pu'i bzhon pa'o/ /'khor lo drug dang rtsa gsum nas byung nas dbang po'i yul nas yul rnams la nges par rgyu'o/ /de yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsal bar gsungs te/ rin chen kha
209a4(rgyud 'grel): dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom zhes gsungs so/ /sna'i rtse mo na 'khor lo lnga pa'o/ /'khor lo re re la yang lnga ste/ drug pa ni 'khor lo'i gsang
209a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'khor lo re re ni 'og nas so/ /'byung ba drug ni lhag pa'i a i ri u li i/ de ltar na rlung gi rang bzhin dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched thams cad rang nyid las gzhan ma yin no/ /rlung gi rang bzhin bstan nas
209a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags ston to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang bde ba la oM A:hUM ho:O/ /de bzhin du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
