232a6(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa dang sog las gshags kyang mi mthong la gtsub shing la sogs pa'i sbyor bas mthong ba ltar de bzhin du rnam rtog yang dang yang du goms pas sems kyi snang tshul mi mthong gi 'on kyang ro ma dang rkyang ma dbu ma gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas
232a7(rgyud 'grel): rang sems de nyid du snang bar 'gyur/ /don dam bsnyen pa las de bshad pa/ shing las me byung chu shel pas/ zhos las mar dang rdo las gser sogs ltar/ /bud med bsten pas ma nyams bde ba ni/ /de thabs sbyor bas skal ldan
232b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis gzungs bya/ /khyod kyi sems la cung zad bsags pa min/ /bzhag bya med la 'phel zhing 'grib pa med/ /rang gi sems la sems nyid snang ba tsam/ /dper na khams gsum chu la nyi ma bzhin/ /zhes so/ /sems gcig pu nyid shes rab
232b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzugs brnyan la du mar 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o/ /de nyid bshad de/ du ba la sogs pa'o/ /du ba nyid thog mar gang gi yin pa de ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'o/ /rtags ni yid ches pa'o/ /srog rtsol ni bum pa can de gong dang 'og tu rtsa gsum
232b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'i bdag nyid can no/ /dbu mar rgyu ba ni sems kyi rtsa la srog rlung zhugs nas rgyu ba'o/ /rig ma'i brtul zhugs ni rig ma gtso bor byas pa tshangs par spyod pa'o/ /ma nyams pa ni 'greng pa'o/ /gyen du rgyu ba ni nor bu dang pad+ma la sogs
232b4(rgyud 'grel): te lam 'dis ni du ba la sogs pa la yan lag drug pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang po dang bral ba'i bde ba ni ma nyams pa'i mchog yin no/ /pho nya kun ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gog pa'i rang
232b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nam mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi lhan skyes so/ /gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa la gzugs bsgoms pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sogs pa'i sgras yid kyi phyag rgya'o/ /dkyil 'khor ni rten yin la/ /'khor lo ni brten pa lha'i
232b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs so/ /sogs pa'i sgras sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de dag bsgoms pas 'jig rten ni khams gsum ste de'i grub pa ni 'og min gyi bar gyi dbang phyug grub kyi phyag rgya chen po grub pa 'jig rten las 'das pa gang la grub/ 'o na lam
232b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdams pa 'di thams cad la 'byung ngam ma yin te 'on kyang sems can la sogs pa'o/ /lam 'di bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis dbang la sogs pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal gyi dri ma dag pas rnam par dag pa'i slob ma la skye ba'o/ /phyag rgya
233a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i thig le las de gsungs pa/ ji ltar dug ni sngags sogs kyis/ /sbyangs pa yis ni bcud len 'gyur/ /de ltar dbang la sogs pa yis/ /ma dag slob ma dag par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /gang gi
233a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can snying rje gzhan don dang rtag tu dge ba la brtson pa'o/ /da ni lam thob na'ang bag med pas de dang 'bral ba'i rgyu bshad de/ /lam mchog la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid dka' tshogs med par gang gis thob pa de ni lam ste/
233a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dga' ba 'phel bar byed pas rin po che/ rnyed par dga' ba dang 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa ster bas yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /bag med ni phan pa dang bde ba la ltos pa med pa/ 'khor bar ris drug tu 'khyam pa/ /snying rje la
233a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i yon tan dang bral ba/ /gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba la ma brtson pa la 'byin na rang gi khyim ni chung ma ste de nyid nag yin te/ ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi rten yin pas so/ /der 'di la dbang po rnams chags pas yul te/
233a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa phyi'i yul longs spyod de ni dman pa ste lam gyi mi mthun phyogs yin pa dang/ rmongs pas bsten pa'o/ /de nyid chom kun te dag gis phrogs par 'gyur/ /'di dag 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi 'on kyang
233a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang lus dang rang nyid yid ches pa'i lam rin po che la the tshom dang le lo ni dge ba la mi spro ba'o/ /gnyis ni lus dang yid las su mi rung ba'o/ /'phyong ba ni las dman bdag gis byas pas lam mngon sum bdag gis bya
233a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mi nus so zhes bya ba'i rnam pa can no/ /choms kun 'di dag gis nye du ni bu dang chung ma la sogs pa de nyid nags de der zhugs pa'i grol lam mchog ni 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrib pa 'di dag 'ba' zhig pa ma
233b1(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi/ 'on kyang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang/ ngag 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log lta ste 'di dag gis kyang
233b2(rgyud 'grel): lam rin po che 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi 'on kyang bza' btung shin du tshad med pas kyang 'phrog ste de la bza' ba ni sha la sogs pa'o/ /btung ba ni chang la sogs pa'o/ /shin tu ni rgyal ba'i chos kyis so/ /longs
233b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod ni phreng ba tsan dan bud med la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /des brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yid 'phrog na brtson 'grus med pa'i lta ci zhig dgos/ /bag med ni grogs ngan pa dang 'grogs pa la sogs te/ des brgyal ba bzhin no/ /lam
233b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen brtag pa bshad de/ rin chen la sogs pa'o/ /rang gis rin chen yin min mi shes pas gzhan sdig can mi mkhas pa la rin chen yin nam ma yin zhes ston na/ des ma yin zhes smras/ de'i tshig gi skal ba med pas de 'dor
233b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed do/ /des sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa'i skyon bshad do/ /'o na rang gis brtag pa mi shes pa lam rin chen ji ltar shes she na smras pa/ rin chen la sogs pa'o/ /rin chen brtag dpyad mkhas pa kho na la bstan par bya ste
233b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i mi slu ba'i tshig gis rin thang med par shes par bya'o/ /des dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa bshad do/ /lam la zhugs pa la bdud byung na spang bar bshad do/ /pha la sogs pa'o/ /bdud sdig can sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i
233b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis bar chad byed de 'dis 'tshang rgya ba'i lam yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdud kyi las kyi le'u las bshad pa bzhin no/ /nye bar bsdus shing bshad de/ chom kun la sogs pa'o/ /gang gi phyir lam 'phrog pa yod pa de
234a1(rgyud 'grel): nye du dang the tshom la sogs pa spangs nas 'bad de bla mas gnang ba'i lam rin po che shin tu gsang bar bya/ /thar pa thob pa'i lam gzhan yang yod ce na/ smras pa/ bdag la sogs pa'o/ /bdag byin gyis
234a2(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i rim ni zhi ba'i lha la dmigs pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i rim pa ni drag po'i lha la dmigs pa'o/ /de ni thar slad du sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ma yin gyis 'on kyang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig
234a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de cis shes she na/ smras pa/ gang gis la sogs pa'o/ /rgyu mtshan gang gis pha dang/ ma dang/ dgra bcom bsad pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngan sems kyi khrag 'byin pa ste mtshams
234a4(rgyud 'grel): ? lnga byas pa rnams kyang bde bas 'bad rtsol med par rnam dag gi rim pa dbang gi don gyis bsdus par byas pa las gzhan du na mtshams med pa byas pa rnams dpa' bo'i rim pas drag po'i las las ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /
234a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin gyis brlabs bas kyang 'khor ba'i bde ba las thar pa mi thob bo/ /'o na rim pa gnyis po 'di lam ma yin na bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ste gsungs she na/ smras pa/ dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i
234a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni phyi rol du ma yin gyi gang gi phyir lus la srog rlung zad par byed pa 'di yin no/ /bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni rang sems kyi snang ba ste/ de yang nam mkha' la khams gsum gyi snang ba'o/ /bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni rang gi sems
234a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang ba ste/ khams gsum gyi snang ba yin pa byung nas de mi ldog pas 'khor ba mi ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas she na/ smras pa/ 'khor ba la sogs pa'o/ /khams gsum snying po med pa rdzun pa zad pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas
234b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa'i yon tan can 'bras bu 'byung ngo/ /dper na chu shing snying po med pa la 'bras bu smin pa ni de zas nas 'byung ba bzhin no/ /'o na sgyu ma ltar snang ba 'di ma rig pa yin pas de las byung ba'i byang chub kyis
234b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas ji ltar 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu yin zhe na/ smras pa/ rta bla mo la sogs pa'o/ /rta bla mo dang sdig srin la sogs rnams ni ma gang las skyes pa de gsod par byed/ de ltar thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyi sems de'ang
234b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa kun rdzob kyi gang las byung ba des rgyu ma de gsod par byed/ rnal 'byor gyi sems 'di'i ma nyams tshul gyis dbye ba bzhi dang bcu drug bshad de/ gnyis med la sogs pa'o/ /gnyis ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de gang la
234b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o/ /nor bu dang pad+ma las mi g.yo bas mi g.yo ba'o/ /thabs sam shes rab gyi rgyu med pas rgyu med do/ /bla na med pa'i bde ba ster bas yi dam ste rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o/ /dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya 'gog bas ma nyams so/ /chags pa dang
234b5(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i bar du gnas pas chags pa chen po'o/ /rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa las grol bas dngos po dang dngos min ma yin pa'o/ /shes bya ma lus pa mthong bas ye shes de rnal 'byor gsum pa'o/ /'gro ba dga' bar
234b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa sngon du 'gro ba sems can gyi don la zhen pas sems dpa' o/ /thog mdza' bar du dge bas kun du bzang po'o/ /bdud dang nyon mongs pa la rtog pa spangs pas phyi nang du brjod pa'i sgra med pas sgra med do/ /rang sgra'i rang bzhin
234b7(rgyud 'grel): med pas sgra chen de rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o/ /mnga' las skye ba spangs pas lhan skyes so/ /sku bzhi'i sgrib pa zad pas byang chub sems kyi thig le 'dzin no/ /stong nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pas dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje/
235a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims kyi tshogs rdzogs pas thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor te rnal 'byor dang po'o/ /bsten pa'i phyir bla ma'i mtshan nyid bshad de/ de ltar la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje'i theg pa la 'jug pa
235a2(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas de kho na nyid bsgom pa/ byang sems bsrung bas dam tshig dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags la sogs med pas rnyog ma med pa bu dang chung ma dang rang lus la sogs pa ltos pa med pas 'dod pa med pa/
235a3(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i lam la gnas pa'i bla ma mnyes par byas pa/ dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i lam ston pa/ ma nyams pa'i bde ba thob pas de nyid du tshangs par spyod pa/ bdud bzhi 'joms par byed
235a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bla ma de ni rdo rje 'dzin pas byin gyis brlabs pas de'i sprul pa yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' yin no/ /da ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub pa'i phyir lha'i dmigs pa bshad de/ lha'i la sogs pa'o/ /de nyid kyi
235a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ni sna tshogs gzugs sgom pa'i sbyor bas so/ /skar ma'i 'khor lo/ /bzhin ni nor bu sngon po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa can thig le'i nang du mdza' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mthong ba sngon
235a6(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro ba dpag tshad brgyar ring ba'i dngos po mthang ba'i sha'i mig gi khams gsum gyi bum pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang/ gzhan sems rig pa dang/ chos thams cad mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can
235a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi spyan dang ye shes kyi spyan kyis dngos po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mthong ba'o/ /tha mal pa gzhan gyis sa la sogs pa la byas pa dang/ ra gan la sogs pa la blugs pa/ spro pa la sogs pa med pas
235b1(rgyud 'grel): shi ba'i ro ltar mthong ngo/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bshang ba dang/ gci ba dang/ rkang mar dang/ khrag dang/ sa bon no/ /sogs pa'i sgras sgron ma lnga ste ba lang dang/ khyi dang/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ mi'i sha'o/ /nang gi bdud rtsi lnga ni phung po lnga ste
235b2(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma lnga ni dbang po lnga'o/ /de la ltos pa med pa'o/ /zas ni mngon par phyogs pa ste/ tha mal pa'i gzugs la sogs pa mngon du phyogs pa las log pa ni so sor rtogs pa'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa gzhan ni rdul phran ma yin pas 'jig
235b3(rgyud 'grel): rten las 'das pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje'i pad+ma ni spyi gtsug gi pad+ma ste der 'char ba ste/ bdud rtsis ni ma nyams pa'i byang chub kyi sems so/ /zla ba bdun gyis ni nye bar mtshon pas zla ba dgu'o/ /phung po drug gis ni gzugs dang/ tshor
235b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam shes dang/ ye shes kyi phung pos so/ /chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas sa thob pa ni chung ngu la sogs pa bzhi pa gsum gsum la sbyar bas so/ /rab tu dga' ba nas ye shes can gyi bar sa bcu
235b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so/ /bden pa rnam pa bcu gnyis don ni lug dang glang la sogs pa'i khyim bcu gnyis kyi dag pa sna bug tu 'pho ba bcu gnyis 'gog pa'o/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig ni 'khor ba'i cha drug zla ba'i cha zad pas ma nyams pa'o/ /rnam pa
235b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi shus byang chub pa ni sbyor drug bsgoms pas dag pa'i dbu mas sbyangs pa phung po lnga dang/ khams lnga dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ skye mched lnga dag pa'i rnam par rtogs pas so/ /rnam par sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa 'gog bas so/
235b7(rgyud 'grel): kun rig ni dngos po thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pas so/ /de nyid kyi phyir mchog yin no/ /zhag 'ga' zhig gis ni lo gsum dang zla ba phyed dang gnyis dus kyi 'khor lo'i zhag gis phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa
236a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur ro/ /da ni tshig bcad rdo rje sems la sogs pas sbyor ba drug bshad de/ /so so rtogs ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i dbye bas rnam pa bcu'o/ /bsam gtan ni sna tshogs gzugs
236a2(rgyud 'grel): la yul dang yul can bcu gcig tu 'gyur bas so/ /srog rtsol la ni g.yon dang g.yas kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gcig tu gyur pas so/ /'dzin pa ni lte ba snying ga mgul pa dpral ba spyi gtsug tu srog rlung 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
236a3(rgyud 'grel): med pas rnam pa bcu'o/ /rjes su dran pa la 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu yis dbye bas ni/ sems dpa' 'dod dang lus tshad 'byung/ /kha skam pa dang za mi 'dod/ /'dar dang myos pa lus 'khor dang/ /sems 'khrul
236a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang shin tu brgyal/ /sems can lus la gnas skabs 'di rdo rje 'chang gi gnas skabs yin/ /ting 'dzin rlung bcu 'gog pa ni/ /srog dang thur sel mnyam pa nyid/ /gyen du rgyu dang khyab byed dang/ klu dang ru sbal kri ka ra/ lha
236a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nor las rgyal ba'o/ /chags pa dang chags pa dang bral bas rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das so/ /mig la sogs pa lnga gzhan gyis ni sha'i mig la sogs pa sna tshogs gzugs mthong ba'o/ /nges pa ni stong
236a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du nges pa'o/ /sna tshogs gzugs la zhen pa ni yul la sogs pa'i yid rtsam gyis bla na med pa shes rab dang thabs ro gcig tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pas yid bde ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ba'o/ /bde ba mi g.yo
236a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni lus sbyangs pa la sogs pa'i bde bas so/ /lam gnyis dbu mar 'jug pa ni sna bug g.yon par nam mkha' la sogs pa lnga dang/ g.yas su sa la sogs pa lnga mi rgyu bas ro ma dang rkyang ma 'gags nas dbu ma'i lam
236b1(rgyud 'grel): kho na la 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can phra ba ni srog rtsol yin no/ /rgyu ba gnyis bral ni lte ba snying dang mgul ba spyi gtsug la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pas so/ rnam pa bcur sngar bshad pa sems 'dzin pa la gnas
236b2(rgyud 'grel): pa na rang gi dang gis du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu'i snang ba sngon du 'gro bas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snang ba gzugs brnyan lta bu rnyog pha med la de nas 'od du ma 'phro ba/ de nas khams gsum du lha'i dkyil 'khor spro
236b3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba sems la sogs pa 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu'i mtshan nyid can rjes su dran pa'o/ /srog rlung la sogs pa rgyu ba med pas ni gtum mo 'bar bas rdo rje'i nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa ma nyams pa'i byang sems
236b4(rgyud 'grel): yin pas rim gyis 'khor lo drug pa nyi khri chig stong drug rgya dbugs rlung 'gog pas rtog med ma nyams pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin zung du 'jug pa ye shes kyi rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin yin no byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes
236b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni skye ba dang byang chub pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la sogs pa mi mdzad pa ste/ de mdzad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho nar grags par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o/ /dbang bcu ni tshe dang/ las dang/
236b6(rgyud 'grel): mos pa dang/ yo byad dang/ smon lam dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ chos dang/ sems dang/ skye ba dang/ ye shes la dbang pa la sogs ba'o/ /nA da la goms pas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi dga' ba la goms pas so/ /ji ltar
236b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i gzhon nu ma'i pad+mar rdo rje bcug cing g.yo ba med par ngal so la de'i pad+mar rdo rje'i nor bu mnan la dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bas yud tsam mi g.yo zhing gnyis ka la nyams pa'i dga' ba 'char pa na hUM zhes brjod pa sngon du
237a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas bla ma dam pa'i drin la mngon du phyogs shing/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bzhi pa myong bas byang chub kyi sems bkag ste ma nyams pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i gnas su 'gro /bcu gnyis
237a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mthar ni sna bug g.yon pa na nam mkha' nas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du sor bcu drug nas bcu gnyis kyi mthar ro/ /bcu drug mthar ni sna bug g.yas pa nas sa'i dkyil 'khor nas nam mkha' i bar du sor bcu gnyis nas
237a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug gi mthar ro/ /hUM gi sgras brjod pas srog dang thur sel gnyis sbyar bas lto bar thim par byas nas dbu mar bcug ste glog gi me dang mtshungs pa gyen du bskul bas khab lta bu'o/ /grong 'jug ni nus na 'pho ba byas te rdo rje langs pa
237a4(rgyud 'grel): ni bde ba'i ye shes kyi mchog bskyed nas so/ /mkha' la spyod pa ni 'og min gyis bar du dbang byed pa'o/ /mngon shes lnga ni rdzu 'phrul dang/ /lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
237a5(rgyud 'grel): ste mngon shes lnga'i rang bzhin du sna tshogs yum gyur te phyag rgya chen po la chags pas rtog med gtum mo 'bar bas so/ /ma nyams gsum ni sems kyi thig le ni gsang gnas su 'gog pa dang/ ngag gi thig le lte bar 'gog pa
237a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lus kyi thig le snying gar 'gog pa'o/ /ma nyams pa'i bde bas ni rdo rje'i rtse mor thig le'i tshogs ma nyams pas ye shes kyi thig le 'gog pa'o/ /rlung gnyis 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mkha' spyod kyi sgrub pa bstan/
237a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs yum zhes bya ba'i bar gyis phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa bstan to/ /phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma lta bu ni me long dangs pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu/ nam mkhar sems su med pa ni sems ma yin pa'i sems la'o/ /shes rab dang
237b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi go rims bzhin du ni chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa ni shes rab bo/ /ye shes ni 'dzin pa'i sems so/ /dbu ba la sogs pa'i snang ba ni de'i gzung bya yin no/ /ji ltar me long gi gzugs brnyan mig rang gi mig gis mthong
237b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rang sems kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang sems mthong ngo/ /gzung pa'i sems du ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid 'di la rnal 'byor pas dbu ma la srog rlung gzhug
237b3(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /des mtshan ma mthong ba'o/ /'di ni bla ma'i zhal dang po sku'i rdo rje'o/ /de bas nyi ma dang zla bar 'gro ba'i srog rlung bsdams pas gnyis la srog rtsol gsung gi rdo rje'o/ /byang sems ni byang sems sna tshogs gzugs brnyan la chags
237b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum pa thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /bde ba'i mchog gis rdo rje bslang/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi sgo nas dga' ba ma skyes na de'i tshe bul bar rdo rje'i sgra bya'o/ /gal te shes rab ma ma rnyed na de'i tshe rang gi lag gi rdo rje gsor ba bde ba la 'phel
237b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir de ltung ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /de ltar byang sems mi 'dor zhing bde ba dang ldan pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa bzhi pa ye shes rdo rje 'di'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i nges pa'o/ /dang po sangs rgyas ni dbang
237b6(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa'i skabs su ste 'di kho na la sogs pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dung shing can/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me du la sogs pas 'di kho na rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ste/ ji lta
237b7(rgyud 'grel): bus she na/ rtsa ba'i rgyud dang/ rgyud phyi ma dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nges don gyi mdo las grags pa/ stong pa nyid la snang ba rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas bsam du med pa de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu
238a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon du 'byung bas mtshan ma sogs gzung 'dzin dang bral bas rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan/ phyi nang gyi sgrib pas ma g.yos pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ yod med la sogs pa'i rtogs pa
238a2(rgyud 'grel): med pas yod med las 'das pa/ rang rig yin pas rang sems kyis myong ba'i don/ ma byas pas ngo mtshar ba/ rang bzhin med pas rdul phra rab kyi tshogs pas stong pa/ mo gsham gyi bu mo dang phrad pas bde ba rmi lam du 'byung ba ltar
238a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan la/ /brten pas rang la de bzhin no/ /sa yi rnam pa la sogs pa ni gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid do/ /'dir stong pa nyid kyi snang ba dngos po ma yin pa sa la sogs par snang ba sra ba min/ khu ba'i
238a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa can smig rgyu'i chu bzhin du chu ma yin/ de dngos po ma yin pas so/ /me'i rnam pa can me min mi sreg pas so/ /g.yo ba rlung ltar snang rlung min dngos po min pas so/ /nam mkha' lta bu de min mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma'i grong khyer ltar
238a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan kyang dngos po ma yin pas mdog ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad dang ldan yang byis pa rnams kyis mthong bya ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa dang bdud kyi mthu ste/ g.yon dang g.yas srog rlung rgyu
238a6(rgyud 'grel): bas so/ /da ni dkyil 'khor lnga thim tshul bshad de/ sa rlung la sogs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa mig brtan cing khro bo'i stangs kyis stong pa la sems gtad pa de'i tshe sna bug g.yon nam g.yas la nam mkha' la sogs
238a7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am sa la sogs pa rgyu bas sa'i rlung chu rlung la thim/ de ltar g.yon nas nam mkha' la sogs pa rnam shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar ro/ /de ltar stong pa nyid du ba la sogs pa rtags bcur 'gyur/ rtags kyang rnam pa thams
238b1(rgyud 'grel): cad ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan du 'gro/ /gzugs brnyan de ma nyams pa'i bde ba 'gro/ /de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes yin/ ye shes las nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang khams gsum gyi dbang phyug
238b2(rgyud 'grel): gi bsgrub pa skye ba 'di nyid du grub par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor nye bar bsdus shing bshad de dbu ma la sogs pa'o/ /'dir dang po 'dzin pa'i sems stong par thim pa ni ro gcig tu gyur pa'o/ /byis pa dang dar la bab pa dang 'dzag pa ni thabs kyi
238b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa'i bde ba gnyis 'gyur ba dang bul ba'o/ /shes rab ma'i 'dzag pa ste myur du ma nyams pas so/ de dag gi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa gang gi mi mdzag pa de bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po las byung ba'o/ /da ni rang gi sems kyi
238b4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba me long gi gzugs brnyan la bu la 'jug par bshad de/ nam mkha' la sogs pa'o/ /mtshan mo ni mun pa nye bar mchod pa'o/ /chags pa ni nam mkha' la sems thim pa'o/ /gzugs kyi snang ba ni me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu de rnyog pa
238b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba thogs ma med par snang bas so/ /sgra'i snang ba ni mgul pa dang rkan la sogs pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba ma yin bde ba chen po'i stobs kyis rang sgra tsam myong bas so/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis sku gnyis bshad do/ /gzhan sems shes pa
238b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa ni rang gi sems las tha dad pa gzhan gyi sems shes par byar med pas so/ /gsungs pa/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ 'dir ni shes bya gang mthong ba/ /de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin/ /phyi yi shes bya las gzhan phyir/ /de bas rang
238b7(rgyud 'grel): gis rang nyid la/ rgyas 'debs pa ni gar yang med/ /ral gri chen pos rang nyid kyi/ /rang sos gcod par mi nus bzhin/ tshigs bcad 'dis chos kyi sku sgrub par bshad do/ /phyi nang khyab pa'i du ba'i rnam pa sprin gyi snang ba'i rjes su 'byung ngo/ /
239a1(rgyud 'grel): de gsungs pa/ dang po nyid du sprin bzhin snang/ /du bar snang ba gnyis pa'o/ /zhes so/ /smig rgyu ni g.yo ba'i chu bzhin no/ /srin bu me khyer dang mar me'i rnam pa grags pa bzhin no/ /mtshan ma bzhi po 'di dag ni bug med
239a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyim du mun pa la 'byung bas mtshan mo'i sbyor ba dang nam mkha' i sbyor ba'o/ /gsang ba 'dus pa las dang po dang gnyis pa bzlog par gsungs pa/ sems 'gog rdo rjer gyur pa na/ /mtshan ma dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma de yang rnam pa
239a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ /byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/ thog mar smig rgyu'i rnam pa can/ /du ba lta bu gnyis pa'o/ /srin bu me khyer gsum pa ste/ /mar me lta bu bzhi pa yin/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni/ /rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o/ /zhes so/ /sprin med
239a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' snang ba sngon du 'gro ba me'i rnam pa can 'bar ba dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba grags pa bzhin/ /sgra gcan ni rin chen nag po ltar snang/ /glog dang thig le chen po ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba gsal bar byed pa mdog sngon po
239a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa ltar snang/ mtshan ma drug pa 'di dag ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha' i snang ba las byung bas nyin mo'i rnal 'byor dang bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas de'i dbus su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag
239a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mthong ba bsngon du 'gro ba skad cig gcig la lag mthil na yod pa'i chu bzhin du dang ba rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i bum pa dang ras la sogs pa'i sna tshogs gzugs 'od gsal ba
239a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'o/ /btsum pa la sogs pa ni bar snang la phyed phyed pa'i mig nyid kyis stong pa ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba las te/ ma brtags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gzugs brnyan du ba la sogs pa rtag tu bsgom par bya'o/ /
239b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gnyi ga nam mkha' la chags pa la sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo gsungs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs pa rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rin po che sgron ma zhes bya ba dang/ zla ba'i snang ba
239b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnam pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de bas the tshom med par du ba la sogs pa'i lam 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bsgom par bya'o/ /'o na rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba phyag rgya
239b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po yin la/ bsgom pa ni sgro btags pa ste ji ltar bsgom par bya zhes bshad ce na/ smras pa/ bsgom pa la sogs pa'o/ /gdams pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi nang med pa la sgom pa'i gzugs brnyan de nyid la/ rnal 'byor pa'i bsgom pa
239b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir bsgom pa ma yin no/ /'o na dngos po'i yin rung dngos po ma yin pa'i yin rung rtog pa la khyad med pas ji ltar dngos min sgom zhe na/ smras pa sems ngo la sogs pa'o/ /gang gi phyir stong nyid kyi gzugs
239b5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan la rnal 'byor pa'i dngos dang dngos min gyi rtog pa med de/ stong nyid kyi gzugs brnyan ma rtags pa'i du ba la sogs pa la mngon sum du mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /dgongs pa 'di lta ste gal te brtags pa yin na dngos por 'gyur te lugs ma
239b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o bzhin no/ /mthong ba med na dngos po ma yin par 'gyur te mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin no/ /'dir ni ma brtags par mngon sum du mthong bas thams cad legs par gnas so/ /ma brtags par mthong ba'i dpe bshad de
239b7(rgyud 'grel): pra phab pa la sogs pa'o/ /pra phab pa ni sgrub pa po'i byed pa ste/ me long dang ral gri dang mthe bong dang mar me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang chu la mig gi sbyong yul dngos po las ma byung ba/ chom kun la sogs pa bems pa'i chos las ma byung ba ma
240a1(rgyud 'grel): brtags par mthong ba 'di la dngos po dang dngos min med do/ /dngos po med par don byed nus pa tsam dmigs pas so/ /'jig rten kho na la dngos po med par dngos por mthong ste/ dper na rgya ma dang rmi lam la
240a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o/ /chos can la sogs pa ni rtogs pa med pa'o ye shes 'byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don grub par byed pas yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /dpe bshad de snga la sogs pa'o/ /sngar ma mthong ba'i chom rkun la sogs
240a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mig gis gzhon nu mas pra phab na mthong/ sgrub pa pos ni gzhon nu mas bshad pa der song la nyi tshe ba'i mig gis mthong ngo/ /bsam pa 'di ste sgrub pa'i man ngag sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs
240a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo'i spyan gyis rnal 'byor gyi gzhon nu mas bzhin byang sems ma nyams pas ma bstan pa/ tha mal pa'i bgrod bya ma yin pa nam mkha' la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid mthong ngo/ /de'ang spros pa mdza' dag dang
240a5(rgyud 'grel): bral bar bshad de/ gzhan gyis la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong ste dus gzhan du mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /rang gi mig gis mi mthong ste mig ras kyis bkab pa'i phyir ro/ /pra phab pa'i dpe 'dis rnal 'byor gyi mngon
240a6(rgyud 'grel): sum rang bzhin kun med pas ma skyes te/ rmi lam du gzhon nu mas bu dmigs pa bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub po/ /sbyor ba yan lag drug gi ni/ /bdag gis bshad pa'i dge ba gang/ /de ni 'jig rten ma lus
240a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ma nyams bde ba thob par shog /sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta chen po nyi ma dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po sh+rI bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras
240b1(rgyud 'grel): ? lag gi snying po 'bring mtshams kyi sa'i cha/ dpal rgya rtags kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// ` (//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i gdams ngag nyi ma zla ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
240b2(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI kA la tsakra pa de sha sUrya tsin+d+ra sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i gdams ngag nyi ma zla ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /b+he ku ni zhes bya ba'i paN+Di ta/ dbus 'gyur tshal du sku 'khrungs pa//
240b3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i gnas lnga kun la mkhas pa/ dgung lo bzhi brgya bzhes/ sa dang po'i bden pa mthong/ 'jam dpal gyi lung bstan thob nas mu khyud 'dzin ri'i 'gram du rkang mgyogs kyis byon/ /rigs gsum mgon po'i brgyud ba bram ze nyi ma'i shing rta
240b4(rgyud 'grel): la dus kyi 'khor lo dam pa dang po gsan/ /dbang sgrub thabs dang bcas pa thob/ /de'i dus su srong la rgyal po zla ba bzang po byon/ /khyod yul dbus su 'gro ba la phyi dus kyi 'khor lo shes kyang nang dus kyi 'khor lo mi shes so zer ro/ /de khyod la zhu
240b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pas nang g.yo ba rlung la gdams pa/ bde ba ye shes rdo rje yis/ /phrin las drug gi 'khor lo bskor/ /ma rig 'khrul 'khor bcom nas ni/ /ye shes lnga ni bskyed mdzad pa/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la 'dud/ /bag chags rlung gis bskyod nas ni//
240b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rmongs shing sdug bsngal bas/ /gsal byed 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /skyed dang gnas dang dbye ba dang/ /rtsis dang lam du bya ba dang/ /nas 'joms pa dang 'bras bu gnyis/ /rnam shes bskyod pa'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung las me ni skyes pa'o/ /
240b7(rgyud 'grel): de las chu dang sa 'byung ste/ nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa'o/ /rlung las skyes pa'i dug lnga yis/ /las bsags 'bras bu 'khor ba smin/ /pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung/ /thod rgal ba dang bzhi ru gnas/ /yang na 'byung ba lnga yi rlung/ /rnam shes
241a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i tshul du gnas/ /ming dang gnas dang kha dog dang/ /rgyu dang byed pa'i las dang ni/ /zin dang log rengs bcos thabs dang/ /ngag dang yon tan bskyed pa'o/ /ye shes khams las thur sel dag /stong pa dag
241a2(rgyud 'grel): las srog gi rlung/ /'di gnyis rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rlung gi rlung las mnyam gnas dang/ /me la gyen du rgyu ba ste/ chu la khyab par byed pa nyid/ /mkha' las rlung 'byung de las ni/ /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang/ /lha byin dang ni nor
241a3(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal/ /lnga po sa rlung me dang ni/ /chu dang sa las rim 'byung ste/ /drug gi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /sa lte chu snying me mgrin dang/ /rlung dpral mkha' gtsug ye shes gsang/ /snying 'khor rlung dang dpral 'khor chu/ /'khor gzhan
241a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas khams mthun pa'o/ /sa ser chu dkar me ni dmar/ /rlung gnag mkha' sngo ye shes ljang/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' ni/ /bcu gnyis bcu gsum bcu bzhi dang/ /bco lnga bcu drug phyi ru rgyu/ /phyir 'phel nang du thung ngu rgyu/ /ye shes
241a5(rgyud 'grel): sa mkha' mnyam du ste/ /sna bug gnyis nas rgyu ba'o/ /'og nas sa dang g.yon du chu/ /g.yas su me dang steng du rlung/ /bzhi dbus nam mkha' rgyu ba ste/ /sna bug gnyis mnyam ye shes so/ /khyim ni bcu gnyis dbye ba yis/ /dus sbyong
241a6(rgyud 'grel): 'pho tshan bcu gnyis la/ /'byung lnga rlung gi dbye ba yis/ /dus sbyor 'pho chung drug cu'o/ /'byung lnga'i 'pho chung re re la/ sum brgya drug cu rgyu ba yis/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'pho chen re'ang/ /stod dang brgyad brgya rgyu ba ste/ /zhag
241a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig rtog rlung nyi khri dang/ /dgu brgya nyer lnga rgyu ba'o/ /'byung lnga'i 'pho chung mtshams re nas/ /bcu gcig bzhi cha chad pa yis/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis mtshams re nas/ /lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhi cha rgyu/ /zhag gcig
241b1(rgyud 'grel): ye rung drug brgya dang/ /bdun cu rtsa lnga rgyu ba'o/ /skyes bu khams sdoms zhag gcig la/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu/ /skye 'jig gnas 'pho 'khrig dus dang/ /brgyal gzas zin ting 'dzin thob/ /de min 'jig rten rlung du zad/ /de ni rlung gi rgyu ba'o/ /
241b2(rgyud 'grel): gti mug sa la nga rgyal chu/ /'dod chags me la phrag dog rlung/ /zhe sdang mkha' ste ser sna'i sems/ /ye shes khams kyi byed par bshad/ /sems can kun gyi srog gyur pa'i rlung gis las kun byed pa'o/ /mthun dang mi mthun zin pa yi/ /gnyis stobs
241b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum stobs shes par bya/ /srog 'dzin log rengs 'chi smyo dang/ /thur sel log rengs rtsa chu sri/ /gyen rgyu log rengs dbugs mi bde/ /me mnyam log rengs rmu chu skran/ /khyab byed rlung log rengs pa na/ /mdze dkar la sogs nad mang byed/ /phyug
241b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba dang/ /dmigs dang byin brlab bde ba bsgom/ /zas dang spyod lam sman spyod dang/ /rten 'brel gyis ni bcos par bya/ /rlung sems 'dres shing dag pa yi/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kun gyis byin rlob pas//
241b5(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bzhi ni rtsol med 'grub/ /sa rlung yon tan 'chi ba med/ /me yis skrag la drod dang ldan/ /chu yis bde dang snum la 'gril/ /rlung gis gsal dang yang bar byes/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' lta bur 'grub/ /ye shes yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /gzhan
241b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rlung brtsis phyi nas brtsi/ /phyogs dang dus dang byed pa'i las/ /gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang/ /sgra gdang sgra yi byed pa dang/ /rgyu tshul spyod lam la sogs pa/ /'byung ba lnga dang 'byung chung dang/ /dgra bshed grogs su 'gyur ba dang/ /btang
241b7(rgyud 'grel): snyoms byed pa'i rlung rtsis brtsi/ /'di ni phyi yi rlung rtsis so/ /nang gi rlung rtsis nang nas brtsi/ /A li kA li rab dbye bas/ /khams drug rlung ni rtsis kyis 'jug /g.yas g.yon dbus nas rgyu ba yi/ /rlung drug byed las brtags pa yis//
242a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang ngan bye pa las shes par bya/ /'di ni nang gi rlung rtsis so/ /rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsis shes nas/ /'char tshul gzugs dang kha dog dang/ /spyod lam tshes dang dbang thang dang/ /phan gnod las kyi ltas kyang shes/ /lha
242a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dre sgra yi ngos 'dzin dang/ /nas dang rten 'brel phan yang shes/ /phyi nang byed pa 'char bar 'gyur/ /khyad par phrin las bzhi la 'jug /mo rtsa mo rtsa ma ning rtsa/ /pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung/ /thod rgal bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dis kyang phyi nang
242a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bar nus/ /sngon 'gro sbyor ba ldan pa yis/ /lam ni bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas dang gsum/ /yi ge gsum gyis rtsa lam spyad/ /rdo rje skyil dkrung sogs gnas pas/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yis/ /rlung ni lam
242a4(rgyud 'grel): du byed par 'gyur/ /'khrul 'khor sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /rlung lnga a ba d+hu tIr gzang/ /rgyu ba dag pa rang gnas bsgom/ /zhag lnga a ba d+hU tI ru/ /tshung ba'i rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bum pa can dang btsan thabs kyis/ /bcings
242a5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhi bar byas pa yis/ /nor bu'i me la srog zhugs pa'i/ /bde ba skye bar nges pa ste/ /'od kyi 'khor lo mthong ba dang/ /mgo bo na na gzhag par bya/ /thur sel rgyu ba 'jam rlung gzung/ /rlung gi nang rnams spongs bar 'gyur/ /srog dang
242a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsol bas bad kan sel/ /btang bas mkhris pa sel bar byed/ /'dus pa'i nad la steng 'og dgag /dangs ma'i sbyor bas sel bar byed/ /lte ba'i 'og tu srog rlung dgag /ma lus pa ni sel bar byed/ /khyad par rtsol ba'i rlung
242a7(rgyud 'grel): gis sel/ /a ba d+hu tIr dangs bar byed/ /kha sbyor rlung gis rkyen snang bsrung/ /reg dang ral gri bcud dbang po/ /bdud rtsi 'bras bu ri lu dang/ /gi wang dang ni mig sman dang/ rkang la byugs dang mthil lam brgyad/ /'jig
242b1(rgyud 'grel): rten dngos grub brgyad dngos 'grub/ /mchog gi 'bras bu ster bar byed ces gsungs so/ /yang nam gung la rgyal po grags pa byon nas/ /khyod 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul dbus su 'gro ba la nad pa lto gos la sred pa mang pas/ /nang gnas pa rtsa
242b2(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo la gdams pa 'di dgos gsungs nas gdams pa/ ji ltar sgom pa rtsa yi gnad/ /rab tu phye ste bshad par bya/ /brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong dang/ /nges par phye na 'bum sde'o/ /ba spu bye ba ji tsam par/ /rtsa yi grangs kyang de bzhin te/ /
242b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa las kyi rtsa rnams ni/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu brjod/ /la la nyi ma'i rtsa yis ni/ gling bzhi gling phran rnams la bskor/ /ra sa zla ba'i rtsa ba yis kyang/ /gong bzhin bskor nas gnas pa'o/ /'khor lo
242b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rtsa yi gtso/ /gtsug tor bzhi la snying gar brgyad/ /spyi bo ru ni mi yi bdag /mgrin pa ru ni so yi grangs/ /lte bar brgyad kyis brgyad sgres pa/ /gsang bar rgyal po nyis 'gyur nyid/ /rtsa ba lte ba'i dkyil nas gyes/ /rtse mo don snying lnga la
242b5(rgyud 'grel): zug /don snying las ni rtsa lnga gyes/ /rtse mo skye mched lnga la zug /yul lnga dag ni myong bar byed/ /lte ba'i dkyil nas rtsa bzhi gyes/ /brgyud kyis lus ni skyes par byed/ /rtsa yi gtso bo gsum du bshad/ /a ba d+hU tI zhes bya ba/ /lhan cig skyes
242b6(rgyud 'grel): ba skyed par byed/ /'di ni rtsa yi rgyal por bshad/ /sngon 'gro bya ba rdzogs nas kyang/ /sbyang zhing gnad la bor bar bya/ /gling bzhi ri rab dag la bsdu/ /ri rab srog shing bsang bar bya/ /rgyu ba'i nyi zla gzung bar bya/ /nyi zla'i 'od kyi rab bsros te/ /raM las glog gi
242b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun byung nas/ /mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa yis/ /oM huM A:yi bar du bsreg /haM las babs pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /yig 'bru gsos kyi bar du bsgom/ /rgya mtsho'i dkyil du nyi ma dgong/ /ri las byung ba btum mo'i mes/ khams gsum po ni me ru
243a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg me yis ni/ til mar dgang blugs de bzhin no/ /ri rab bskyod dang rlung lta ste/ /bud shing bzang po bsten par bya/ /glog gi me yi rtse mo yis/ /spyi bo'i zla ba bzhu bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis
243a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le bzhu/ /'di las mgrin pa snying ga dang/ lte ba gsang ba ru ni 'gog /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal to/ /'byung po'i dug rnams ma lus sel/ nad las rnam par rgyal ba thob /gtum mo yon tan brgyad dang ldan/ /bde ba
243a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa ston pa dang/ /chos kyi dbyings ni ston par byed/ /mthun bzhi rim pas nyams su blang/ /zhag bdun nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /skye dang bstan par byed pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /yang nam tho rangs rgyal po pad+ma dkar po byon nas/ khyed 'dzam
243a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gling gi yul dbus 'gyur tshal de na/ chags pa la mchog tu sred/ tshe thung nad mang dbang thang chung bas nang 'gyu ba byang chub kyi sems la gdams pa 'di dgos so gsungs nas gdams pa/ gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /gsang ba'i
243a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po 'di skad thos/ /khyod la rab tu bshad par bya/ /brtag dang nyams pa'i nyes dmigs dang/ /nyams pa'i tshul dang mi nyams bsrung/ /dangs 'phel thabs dang rgyas pa dang/ /dangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o/ /lus dang rtsa yi sgo rnams
243a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /skra dang ba spu bye ba dang/ /mdog dang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /sems nyams skad kyi gdang dang ni/ /grib ma gnas khang lus las shes/ /mtshan ltas rtog la drang srong mkhas/ /bde gsal med pa'i sgyid pa skyur/ /stobs
243a7(rgyud 'grel): chung shes dma' snying mi dga' / /skrag mdangs lus stobs med pa dang/ /grang la ba spu log pa dang/ mi 'am ci la yi dags lus/ /ngag nyams thos la snying rlung 'jug /nad mang bgegs 'jug tshe yang thung/ /'dod yon chu yis skams
243b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /dbang thang chung zhing longs spyod ngan/ /byang sems dpag bsam bskams pa yi/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu ga la 'byung/ /pho mo dbang du mi 'gyur zhing/ /mthun pa dag kyang dpral bar 'gyur/ /mi ma yin rnams mi 'du zhing/ /zhi drag la sogs 'grub
243b2(rgyud 'grel): ba min/ /mkha' 'gro dbang du mi 'du zhing/ /dngos grub dag kyang nyams bar byed/ /gnas khang lung pa byin med cing/ /sa yi snun yang med par 'gyur/ /mi yi nor bu med pa la/ /de yi bde legs ga la 'byung/ /rgyun 'dzag gang bas 'dzag pa dang/ /
243b3(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang bag chags chags skyes 'dzag /kha zas kyis kyang 'dzag par byed/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /kha dang dbang po dag nas 'dzag /khyab byed thig le zhes bya ba/ /rdul dang gdongs nas 'dzags par byed/ /chu dang rtsa 'khru'i dus su ni/ /nad bzhi
243b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gis 'dor bar 'gyur/ /me dang nyi ma ngal dub pas/ /nad drag po yi rgyun las ni/ /'di rnams kyis ni skams par byed/ /sna rtsa rlung ni kha rdal lam/ de bzhin kha dang 'og rtsa d+hal/ /nyi ma 'dor bar byed pa yin/ /mo yi nyams pa'i rkyen dag
243b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dkar po pho dang cung zad mtshungs/ khyad par chags skyes chags spyod 'dzag /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi dang/ /nya dang gnam stong gang yin la/ /phyi ru sgra gcan rgyas pa yis/ /nang du nyi ma 'dor bar 'gyur/ /kha sna nu ma nas kyang 'dor/ /rgyu dang
243b6(rgyud 'grel): rkyen dang byed pa'i las/ /gnod pa'i 'bras bu shes par bya/ /'dzag gnyis thur sel dbang du bya/ /'khrul 'khor gyis ni legs par dgram/ /sngags dang rdzas dang rten 'brel bsrung/ /rgyud ngag gsang rlung dbang du bya/ /glang mo
243b7(rgyud 'grel): myos skad shes par bya/ /zas ngan spangs la zas mchog bsten/ /steng rlung 'gog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khrul 'khor bya zhing gsang rlung gzung/ /khong gser mkha' 'gro d+hU tIr gzhug /drod kyi sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /gtum mo
244a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing dgram par bya/ /drag spyod spangs la bag yod bsten/ /drang srong rig pa sman du btang/ /gnas kyis drug rnams dag par bya/ /nyi ma ri rab dbus su snga/ /dgram pa'i sbyor ba shes par
244a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rgya mtsho dkyil kyi sgra gcan gyis/ /nyi zla gnyis po zos nas ni/ /nyi zla ri rab rtse ru drang/ /'khrul 'khor gyis ni dgram par bya/ /de 'dra sbyor ba snang gis ni/ /kun mkhyen rig pa de la dris/ /rnal 'byor dbang rab
244a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni/ /don dam phyag rgya che bsten nas/ /mi g.yo bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/ /rgyu mthun bde stong ting 'dzin bsgom/ /lo gsum zla phyed gsum gyis ni/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par gsungs/ /rnal 'byor dbang
244a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bring rnams kyis ni/ /sems brtag ye shes phyag rgya bsten/ /rang lus thabs ldan sbyor ba yis/ /cha mthun bde stong ting 'dzin bsgom/ /gzugs khams lha dang thun mong gi /dngos grub thob par rgyal bas gsungs/ /rnal 'byor
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang tha rnams kyis ni/ /mtshan chos ldan pa'i las rgya bsten/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dzag kha sa bde stong ting 'dzin bsgom/ /'dod khams lha dang mthun mong gi /dngos grub thob par rgyud las gsungs/ /
244a6(rgyud 'grel): chags can bde stong spel 'dod kyis/ /kha sbyor rlung bcings 'dzin bsgrubs te/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bu mo la/ /skyabs 'gro dbang bskur snod du bya/ /lus la rigs drug sa bon dgos/ /skyes dang sdud pa'i rim pa yis/ /rdo
244a7(rgyud 'grel): rje pad+ma phyin gyis brlab/ /gzugs sgra chags pa rgyas par bya/ /spyod des dangs ma g.yo bar bya/ /sngon 'gro gsum ldan sbyang byas nas/ /'du shes gsum ldan bsgom pa yis/ /dngos gzhi snyoms 'jug sbyor ba yis//
244b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang 'gyur 'di stong ro myang bya/ /rjes su ldog cing gnas su bsdus/ /dgram pa gnyis med bsrel la bsgom/ /rus sbal 'gros su dal bus dbab/ /dgos pa gnyis la mkhas par bya/ /thur sel rlung ni gsum du 'gyur/ /bde 'phel rgyun
244b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grogs rab 'jug dang/ /khyab byed rgyas ba'i rlung gis gzung/ /rgyun 'grogs bskyong pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/ /thur sel dbang ni thob pa na/ /bde 'phel chos 'byung gnyis med bsres/ /rgyun 'grogs kyis
244b3(rgyud 'grel): ni nye 'od 'dren/ /rab 'jug rlung gis gnas su gzung/ /zla ba rgyun 'grogs kyis 'dren ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis gyen la bzlog /tshang par lhan skyes myong bsdus pas/ /mgo bo na na dgram par bya/ /sems dang rlung ni rim gyis dgram/ /
244b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig rim pas so/ /rlung sems gnyis su med bsres la/ /zhen pa ye shes gnyid med bya/ /bde stong zung 'jug ting 'dzin bsgom/ /dangs ma'i dangs ma 'dren pa dang/ /dangs ma'i bde ba skyes pa dang/ /bde ba rtsal sbyangs thabs la
244b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen por 'gyur/ /yul la chags ba skyes pa na/ /dangs ma'i dangs ma yul la 'dzag /nang du dngos 'dzin skyes pa na/ /dangs ma'i dngos po nyams par 'gyur/ /zhen pa dang bcas spyod pa na/ /dangs ma'i dngos po rnying
244b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /gnyis med gnas na dangs ma 'phel/ /gang yang der shes dangs ma rgyas/ /yon tan tshogs ni dangs ma'i stobs/ /gsal ba'i dangs ma stong pa nyid/ /rtog pa'i skyon bral zla ba yis/ /nyon mongs gdungs sel bar byed/ /stong
244b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dangs ma gsal 'od can/ /thugs rje ye shes nyi ma yis/ /ma rig sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /bag chags sprin gyis ma gos par nyi zla mchog tu rgyas par bya/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ /de skad gsungs pa bdag gis thos/ /dus
245a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i skad/ /gzhan du bshad pa ma yin no/ /nyi zla sku la rgyas pa yis/ /skrag mdangs gzi brjid chen por ldan/ /snum zhing 'gril la pags pa dangs/ /nad med bde ba rdo rje ldan/ /byin
245a2(rgyud 'grel): chen dangs dang ldan pa dang/ /bde skyed tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur/ /gsal bas phyi nang chos rnams shes/ /rtogs med bdag 'dzin rang sar grol/ bde stong rdo rje sdug bsngal 'joms/ /lus dang rus pa sems la smin/ /
245a3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /lus kyi thig le rgyas ba yis/ /tshe dang longs spyod dbang thang dang/ /'dod yon rgyas shing ye shes 'phel/ /kun rdzob bde bas sdug bsngal zhing/ /don dam thig las 'khrul ba ni/ /gnyis med thig
245a4(rgyud 'grel): las sgrib pa zhi/ /'di ni zhi pa'i phrin las so/ /bud med mkha' 'gro dbang du 'du/ /mo chags kun gyi yid du 'ongs/ /lha klu gnod byin ma mo yang/ /dbang 'gyur mi yi smos ci dgos/ /tshangs pa la sogs dbang du 'du/ /skyes pa rnams ni smos ci
245a5(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /rdzas dang 'dod yon de bzhin no/ /phyogs skyong rnams ni dbang du 'du/ /drag po'i las la mtshon char 'gyur/ /bsad dang bskrad dang rmongs dang rengs/ /kun la dbang sgyur rdo rje yin/ /rlung sems 'dres la rgyas pa
245a6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /ting 'dzin stobs kyis gang yang nus/ /phal cher dangs pa'i thig le yis/ /sa 'og gter rnams mthong ba dang/ /lus kyi rtsa mthong mun pa sel/ /dangs mas sems ni bde bar 'char/ /sangs rgyas lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur//
245a7(rgyud 'grel): dangs ma'i dangs ma gyur pa yis/ /lus la bde ba rgyas pa dang/ /khro gtum stag sogs ldan par byed/ /rab tu dangs pas mchog mthong 'gyur/ /mchog tu dangs pas mngon shes drug /de bzhin rjes dran drug kyang
245b1(rgyud 'grel): 'char/ /dangs ma stobs 'gyur zhes bya ba/ /sred med bu yi stobs sogs thob/ /dangs ma bcud ces bya ba yis/ /snang ba bde bar 'char ba dang/ /khams gsum rol spyod par nus/ /mi g.yo dangs ma zhes bya bas/ /'khor ba bde bar shar nas ni//
245b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob po/ /dbang sgyur dangs mas sprul pa 'gyed/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'char/ /mchog dang mchog min sprul par nus/ /rdo rje dangs ma zhes bya bas/ /ji lta ba dang ji snyed shes/ /sa rnams dbang phyug thub pa'i sku/ /zag med
245b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag zhing du ni/ /zag med rdo rje'i skur bstan nas/ /nyid dang mnyam pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /bde ba chen po'i chos bstan nas/ /'khor dang bcas pa mngon sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas gtso bor dbang bskur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bla ma
245b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hi du ma yis dus kyi 'khor lo tshig dang don du bcas pa spyan drangs 'ongs pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i mu khyud 'dzin ri thal thal bskyal nas/ /paN+Di ta khyod kyi nged kyi mdzod stong par bzhag zer ro/ /de lta na rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jam bu'i gling du
245b5(rgyud 'grel): byon la chos 'di rnams kyi bka' srungs kyis byas pas bka' srungs byed par dam bcas te/ rdo rje'i 'gyur re blangs pa ni rin chen mkha' 'gro na re/ /a ba d+hu tI rtsa yi mchog /dang po'i mdud pa khrol nas ni/ /rlung sems dbyer med 'dzud
245b6(rgyud 'grel): shes na/ /lhan cig pa mngon du byed rtsa lam sbyongs shig rnal 'byor pa zhes dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro na re/ /rlung gi rgyal po srog gi rlung/ /'dzin cing dag par byed shes na/ /phung po rdo rje dbang byas te/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro bar
245b7(rgyud 'grel): nus/ /srog rtsol sbyongs shig rnal 'byor pa zhes dang/ pad+ma mkha' 'gro na re/ e la baM gis rnam par brgyan/ /dga' ba gsum la rim gyis bslab/ /lhan cig skyes pa ngo sprad pas/ /mtshams med lnga po byas pas kyang/ /rang
246a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ye shes rtogs par byed/ /bde ba sbyongs shig rnal 'byor pa zhes dang/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro na re/ /ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don/ /dri ma med pa do shes pas/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das par grol/ /
246a2(rgyud 'grel): rang rig sangs rgyas bla na med/ /gnas lugs rtogs shig rnal 'byor pa zhes gsungs nas gsang tshig snying gtam du gdams te rang gnas su gshegs so/ /de nas bla mas yul dbus 'gyur tshal du byon sangs rgyas kyi
246a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dar bar mdzad do/ /gnas pa rtsa yi dus 'khor gyis/ /phyi nang chos kun shes par byed/ /g.yo ba rlung gi dus 'khor gyis/ /srid dang zhi ba kha lo sgyur/ /'gyur ba byang sems dus 'khor gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa skyed par byed
246a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsum gyi don thos nas/ /'khor lo gsum gyi don bkod pas/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /sku gsum mngon du rtogs par shog /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa
246a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma zla ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga d+ha la'i paN+Di ta ma hA pI buA ti tsan+d+ras/ dpal ding ri glang 'khor du sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur nas gsungs pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar
246a6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dz+nyA na tsak+Shu sA d+ha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ ye shes spyan sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsungs yon tan phrin las rab rdzogs pa'i/ /spyan lnga sgrib med 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /dpal  
246a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan lha'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan dus 'khor dam pa dang po las/ /mkha' 'gro rab gsang spyan lnga rab sgrub pa/ /sgrib pa dang bral gsel bar bdag gis bri/ /dur khrod shin tu bla gab can yid 'ong/ /phyi nang gsang
246b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchod pas rab mchod nas/ /khrus byas gdan gnas mtshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan/ /skyil krung bcas nas dbang po rnam par phye/ /thub pa'i lta bas rnam par bltas pa ni/ smig rgyu du ba me khyer mar me mkha' / /zla nyi rA tu la dang glog
246b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang/ /thog med snang ba la sogs gang yang 'byung/ /brjod gyis mi lang sha yi spyan gyis mthong/ /srog rtsol sbyor bas 'dzin pa sbyang/ /rdo rje gtsug tor lta stangs lus gnas ldan/ /nam mkha' sems can mig gi 'dzum pa yi//
246b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i las su zhugs pas nam mkha' las/ /du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer dang/ /mar me 'bar dang zla ba nyi ma dang/ /rA tu la dang glog dang thig ler snang/ /snyigs ma snang ba rab tu 'byung ba yin/ /gnas shing mkha' i sbyor ba yis /dkar dang ser dang
246b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang ldan/ /mthing kha sangs rgyas 'od rnams 'char/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /'od skor 'og min zhing yang mthong/ /gzugs brnyan gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de nang gzugs brnyan yul med pa/ /longs spyod rdzogs
246b5(rgyud 'grel): sku du ma mthong/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam me ba/ /lha yi spyan gyis rnam par mthong/ /ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa las/ /srog rtsol sbyor bas 'dzin pa sbyangs/ /brten 'gyur rdo rje'i lam
246b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /nam mkha' i khams su spro bar bya/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'char bar 'gyur/ /d+hU tI'i nang du 'od gsal gzung/ /rtog med sems kyi de nyid shes/ /rdo rje lus kyi de nyid mthong/ /gsang
246b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags chos la mkhas par 'gyur/ /srog rtsol sgo ru 'od gsal gzung/ /rgyu ba rlung gi de nyid shes/ /rlung lnga'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhi rgyas las rnams dbang du 'du/ /snang ba'i steng du 'od gsal gzung/ /phra ba 'od
247a1(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas ni/ /rags pa'i 'od chen ngo sprad pas/ /rtog med 'di la srid 'das snang/ /kun rdzob rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos/ /chos kyi spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/ /sgrib pa med pa chos
247a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyan/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid shes/ /shes rab spyan gyis rnam par thob/ /da ni sangs rgyas spyan bsgrub te/ /srog dang rtsol ba la brten nas/ /rtog med chos sku mthong par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas longs sku mthong/ /gnyis med
247a3(rgyud 'grel): snang dag sprul sku mthong/ /rtog med gsal bas me long ye shes dang/ /rtog med dang las 'od rnams so sor rtog /snang tshogs stong snang mnyam nyid ye shes so/ /rnam par dag pas bya sgrub ye shes te/ /ma skyes chos shes chos
247a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ye shes so/ /ye shes lnga mthong sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas ni/ /mdor na phung po drug rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas drug tu rab tu grags/ /rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang/ /dkar dang sgrol ma zhes
247a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /me dang rlung sogs rab tu grags/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sangs rgyas bde chen zhing khams gnas/ /de la bcom ldan dam bcas pa/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/ /zhag gcig yongs
247a6(rgyud 'grel): su brtag par bya/ /gal te yid ched ma byung na/ /de tshe de tshig bdag gis brdzun/ /snyan rgyud lag len ldan pa gces/ /skye ba bskyed pa'i rim pa las/ /'chi ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'jug /'byung ba rim par thim pa las//
247a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi ru stobs thim nang du nus thim na/ /'od lnga spyan la sogs pa'i bsu ba 'byung/ /rigs lnga snyoms 'jug ye shes ngo yi gzung/ /'od gsal chos sku'i ngo bo sangs rgyas 'byung/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' 
247b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod gnas su khrid pa'o/ /'chi ba 'od gsal chos sku las/ /par dor longs spyod rdzogs sku 'char/ /snang ba mched dang thob pa las/ /snga gzugs shin pa'i sha gzugs can/ /dbang po tshang kun thogs med 'gro /las kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam
247b2(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab/ /'jigs pa'i sgra bzhi yang dag g.yang sa gsum/ /thig le mi brtan bzhin du snang ba 'gyur/ /snyigs ma nyams pas 'khrul snang sgra ru ldang/ /'od lnga nyams pas rig drug gnas su skye/ /snang pa la sogs chos kyi sku ru
247b3(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /'khrul pa'i snang ba rang gi mdangs su shes/ /'jigs skrag med shes skyes bu las zin 'dra/ /spros bral mkha' mtshungs chos sku phal skyes/ /dangs ma'i 'od las longs sku zhal yang mthong/ /nyon mongs lnga dag ye shes lnga
247b4(rgyud 'grel): rung shang/ /zag med bde ba nam mkhar mi mthong ngo/ /skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru mngon sangs rgyas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis dang sku gsung thugs/ /sa bcu bskrod nas gsangs ba'i sgo las ni/ /byon nas 'gro ba'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /
247b5(rgyud 'grel): dus 'khor shes kyang gdams pa 'di mi ldan/ /dal ba don med sangs rgyas 'bras mi 'byung/ /phyi rtsis gsal yang snying po'i don mi gsal/ /de bas skal ldan 'gro kun phan phyir bris/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i gdams pa dam pa dang
247b6(rgyud 'grel): po las spyan lnga bsgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dus zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dus zhabs kyis thugs rje chen po la sogs pa rig gsum mgon po la gsan no/ /des ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro surya d+harmmA la/
247b7(rgyud 'grel): des radna sh+rI b+ha dra la/ des shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra la/ des rgya gar shar phyogs dzA ga d+ha la'i paN+Di ta mahA bI b+hu ti tsan+d+ras sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad nas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri dzo gi h+ri da phyi ka ra
248a1(rgyud 'grel): nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor gsum gyi snying po gsal ba zhes bya ba/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM rdo rje sems kyis snang ba lam du nges/ /hUM rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal nas//
248a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba rab tu gyur pa'i lam/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bshad/ /dbang gis smin byas dam tshig ldan/ /de la rnal 'byor gsum bstan te/ /gzhan la nam yang ma yin no/ /byin gyis brlab dang rtog pa bsgom/ /rang bzhin
248a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gsum du nges/ /'chi ba'i rtags nyid shes byas nas/ /srog gi thig le nges pa gzhug /so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang/ /srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang/ /rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor lan lag
248a4(rgyud 'grel): drug ces bya/ /mtshan mo gser med khyim du ni/ shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgrub pa pos/ /byed pa lnga la bcing pa gnyis/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /yod dang med pa las 'das pa'i/ /du ba smig rgyu srin me khyer/ /mar me
248a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi nam mkha' mthong/ /gzhon nu ma yi pra las ni/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i rkun ma mthong/ /nyi tshe ba'i mig gis ni/ /sgrub pa po yi son nas mthong/ /chu 'dzin dang ni bral ba yi/ /nam mkha' dangs par gyur pa la/ /snga dro nyi
248a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rgyab phyogs te/ /phyi dro yang ni de bzhin no/ /nyi phyed mig la gnod phyir spang/ /nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /ye shes skar ma lam me pa/ /'gro ba'i mar me
248a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgron/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /sngags mchog sngags bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ /ji srid thig le'i nang du ni/ /ri mo nag po skra yi tshad/ /de mthong 'od gsal go
248b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phang ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mthong ba yin/ /so sor bsdud pa snyoms 'jug pas/ /sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis brlab/ /shes rab rtogs dang dpyod pa dang/ /dga' dang bde ba mi g.yo ba/ /bsam gtan yan lag lnga brtan
248b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /mngon shes lnga thob mi bdag kye/ /bar ma dbugs 'byung mchog yin te/ /bshang gci dang ni zla nyi yi/ /rtsa bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis byin
248b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs/ /srog rtsol ba zhes byar bshad/ /rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug /lte bar gtum mo spar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas/
248b4(rgyud 'grel): haM bsregs pa las zla rgyun 'bab/ /dam tshig sems dpa' spyong yul can/ /sku mthong nas ni nyin re yis/ /dus su srog gi rlung dag ni/ /rnal 'byor thar pa 'dod pa yis/ /bum pa sbyor bas dgag par bya/ /ji srid du ni 'khor
248b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ma/ /rang gi lus la yongs su bskor ba/ /'od zer 'khor lo mthong 'gyur te/ /sngon gsungs sku la rang gi yin/ /des ni zla drug reg spangs bde/ /chu nyi lta bur rab snang bar/ /dri ma med par sna tshogs mdog /rnam pa kun du rang gi
248b6(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /rang gi sems nyid bde ba nyid/ ting 'dzin bde chen rnal 'byor la/ /spyan lnga mngon shes drug 'byung ste/ /chu srin la sogs khyim rnams su/ /ma rig la sogs lugs bzlog pas/ /sa ni bcu gnyis thob 'gyur te/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos can
248b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /dngos po gnyis su rab bstan te/ /ye shes yong pa des na de/ /skyob pa ye shes can du brjod/ /dmigs
249a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i snying rje yis/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu ni/ /mdza' yas sems can re ba skong/ /sems can sgrol ba'i bde ba che/ /'dzag pa'i 'dod chags sel bar byed/ /'gro drug
249a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal sel byed pa'i/ /lam mchog tshol dang phrang par shog /rnal 'byor gsum gyi snying po gsal ba zhe bya ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal rgyal po grags par gdul bya la dgongs nas skye ba bzhes nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
249a3(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang/ lo tsA ba 'gro shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams dang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus kyi 'khor lo phyag 'tshal nas/ /rnal 'byor yan lag drug
249a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya/ /so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang/ /srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang/ /rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin/ rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu ni/ /rgyud du sangs rgyas mchog gi gsungs/ /kun la rab tu shes bya ste/ /rab kyi dang po rtogs
249a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'brid gis srog brtsol la sogs yin/ /tha mas drug po rim pas bsgom/ /byis pa gzhug dang bum pa dang/ /gsang ba ye shes sngon song bas/ /bzhi pa yi ni dbang byas te/ /dam tshig rtsa ba yan lag can/ /de yi dben par gnas
249a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /so sor sdud pa 'di ltar bsgom/ /bsgom pa stong nyid bsgom pa yis/ /'gag pa rlung ni 'gag par byed/ skye ba shugs la bde ba skye/ /'byung ba lam rtags dngos su 'byung/ /ngo bo stong ba nyid yin te/ /so so'i rtog pa thams
249a7(rgyud 'grel): cad sdud/ /dbye ba bcu ru gsungs pa yin/ /dbang po'i mngon sum dag tu gzheng/ /ye shes phung po shes rab bo/ /'bol ba'i bstan la bde bar ni/ /lus bsrang rdo rje skyil krung bca' / /lce bzlog gsus sbyar mig gyen bzlog /gtsug
249b1(rgyud 'grel): tor sbyar ba'i lta stangs so/ /lag gnyis rdo rje bsdam par bya/ /des ni rlung rnams 'ching byed pa'o/ /dpral ba'i thig ler srog bcug la/ /g.yas pa sa'i rlung dus su bsgom/ /mtshan mo bla gab bcas pa ru/ /nam mkha' la dmigs stong nyid 
249b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /stong dang tho rangs gung la min/ /nyin mo bla gab med pa ste/ /nam mkha' la bltas snga dro phyi/ /nyi zer nyi ma'i gung la min/ /de ltar bsgoms pas yul sogs dgag /nang du lta ba'i mig sogs te/ /stong nyid gzugs te dmigs
249b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas mthong/ /chos la pha rol bcu gnas pa/ /lha la lha mo bcu zhes bya/ /rtags su lam la bcu mthong 'gyur/ /du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dang/ mar me 'byung ste 'byung rlung thim/ /tha ma sprin med nam mkha' ni/ /rtags can shes rab
249b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin/ /'bar ba zla nyi glog sgra gcan/ /thig le drug ste tha ma yin/ /thams cad rgyur mthong rtags can te/ /'byung lnga ye shes phung po lnga/ /gsang 'dus mtshan brjod nas phyed phyed/ /sprul sku longs sku rtog med do/ /rdo rje bslang
249b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde ba 'byung/ /bsgoms pas dus car ri mo nag /mthong ba nang du stong gzugs so/ /des ni stong gzugs rtogs par byed/ /so sor sdud la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sngags kun byin gyis rlob byed pa/ /dag ni bden par 'grub pa'o/ /
249b6(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba'i yul dang bral bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa bsam gtan yan lag ni/ /stong gzugs brtan phyir byed pa'o/ /ngo bo yul ni stong gzugs te/ /dus ni nam mkha' rgyu dus su/ /dbye ba rnam pa lnga zhes bya/ /lta stangs de nyid phyag rgya ni/ /
249b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gzhag yid kyi mngon sum ste/ /sgom pa sngar kyi stong gzugs la/ /sems gzhag nam mkha' lta ba yin/ /'byung ba'i rim pas gong thim pas/ /sa sogs gong mthong sgyu ma ltar/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par mthong/ /bsam
250a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan chags pa'i bde ba 'byung/ /lha mos bskul la lung bstan thob/ /stong nyid sems 'jug shes rab ste// //dngos rnams sems 'dzin rtogs pa'o/ /
250a2(rgyud 'grel): de 'dzin 'jug pa spyod pa'o/ /sems kun gzhag pa dga' ba'o/ /bde ba phun sum mi g.yo bde/ /mkha' yi bdag nyid rnam shes so/ /bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs na/ /mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur/ /de
250a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thog mar dge ba ste/ /stong gzugs rtogs pas bsnyen par gsungs/ /de nas stong gzugs mthong nas ni/ /mi 'gyur bde ba skye ba'i phyir/ /srog rtsol yan lag bsgom par bya/ /rkang pa gcig gis gcig mnan
250a4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /mthe bong nang bcug khu tshur bsdam/ /yul ni rtse gsum rlung yin no/ /'du byed phung po rlung rgyu'i dus/ /lta stangs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /phyi ru dang po rlung gtor nas/ /nang du myur dang snam sdud dang/ /rengs dang sngags
250a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor gda' yi ni/ /bum pa can dang rdul mdza' yis/ /rlung gnyis dbus su rab bcug nas/ /rlung bcu rab tu zhi bar bya/ /rdo rje'i me la srog zhugs pa'i/ /bde ba nges par skye bar 'gyur/ /zla ba drug tu brtson byas pas
250a6(rgyud 'grel): zhag re rlung bcu 'gag 'gyur te/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya 'gag /de yis lte bar rlung gnyis 'dom/ /ye shes gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /sangs rgyas lha mo bcu bsang nas/ /khu ba bcas pa'i bde ba 'byung//
250a7(rgyud 'grel): steng dang 'og tu gnas gnyis dod/ /ma zos bkros med thos kyang 'jug /thur sel mi 'dzag bde ba 'dzag /sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che/ /lus yang la sogs mi rtog bde/ /yid kyi mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /srog dang
250b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsol bas nges par ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams gzigs/ /rlung sems rab tu brtan bya'i phyir/ /'dzin pa'i yan lag bsgom par bya/ /yul ni bde ba'i rlung nyid do/ /brtan par 'dzin pas 'dzin pa'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po dbus
250b2(rgyud 'grel): mar gnas/ /lta stangs la sogs de 'dra la/ /lag pa gnyis bsdam nam mkha' i dus/ /d+hU tIr rlung ni tshud tsam gyis/ /lam du mi gsal thig ler gzhug /lus sogs thig le bzhi po la/ /rim dang cig char rlung sems ni/ /nges par
250b3(rgyud 'grel): btsud nas mi g.yo bya/ /de la mi g.yo brtan gyur pas/ /thig ler chags pa'i bde ba skye/ /bud med kun la snyoms 'jug kyang/ /thig le ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lung ston bde skye lus brtan 'gyur/ /de yang yid kyi mngon sum mo/ /
250b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug /'chi bdag la sogs kyis mi tshugs/ /'gro dang 'ong ba zang byed cing/ /nyon mongs la sogs zad par byed/ /stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /tshe ring nad
250b5(rgyud 'grel): med khams cha snyoms/ /de gnyis bar du dge ba ste/ /nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bshad la/ /drag shul spyod par gsungs pa'o/ /de nas bde ba spel sbyang phyir/ /rjes su dran pa'i yan lag bya/ /yul ni bde ba nyid yin te/ /bde ba
250b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud la dran pa'o/ /ye shes rlung rgyu'i dus su'o/ /lta stangs lha'i lta ba ste/ /'du shes phung por mthe'u chung gzhug /dbye ba gsum ste bsgom stobs dang/ /lag pa bud med sbyor ba yis/ /'khor gnas dpral gnas byang sems
250b7(rgyud 'grel): dbab/ /rdo rje nor bur rab gzung ba/ /dngul chu'i dpe yis shes byas la/ /steng nas 'og tu rdo rje gcig /de 'dra rlung sems gtang pas ni/ /dga' ba bzhi la bcu drug skye/ /yar ngo chags chen mtshan nyid do/ /ras bal rtag la pe
251a1(rgyud 'grel): shing dpe/ /spros bcas spros med shin tu med/ /'pho ba'i bag chags spangs byas pas/ /sgrib pa gsum po dag par 'gyur/ /chags pa shin tu sbyang bar bya/ /de don bsgoms pas bde chen ni/ /lhan
251a2(rgyud 'grel): cig skyed ba skye bar 'gyur/ /mngon shes drug kyang cher 'gyur zhing/ /gzugs sku rnam gnyis mngon sum mthong/ /nges par lung bstan thob par 'gyur/ /rang rig mngon sum du ni 'dod/ /rjes dran la ni snyoms 'jug
251a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'gyur bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ye shes sku las so/ /bsgrub pa zhes ni gsungs pa'o/ /de nas mi 'gyur bde bsgrub phyir/ /ting nge 'dzin ni nges par bsgom/ /ngo bo bde stong gnyis med de/ /de la rtse
251a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig gnas pa'o/ /gzugs kyi dbyings kyi phung po sogs/ /ye shes rlung rgyu'i dus su'o/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i lta stangs ste/ /lag pa ting 'dzin phyag rgya'o/ /bsgom pa dmigs bcas stong gzugs dang/ /dmigs
251a5(rgyud 'grel): med bde ba ro mnyam la/ /sems ni mi g.yo brtan par gnas/ /dngos po thams cad bde 'char ro/ /dpal ldan mi 'gyur bde ba skye/ /sangs rgyas dngos su yang dag mthong/ /de la brtan par gyur pa des/ /thig le
251a6(rgyud 'grel): byin log spyi bor 'gro/ /rdo rje nor bu ngo bo nyid/ /thob nas chos sku longs sku dang/ /sprul sku gnas bzhir thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bzhi dang rnam thar dang/ /byang chub bzhi yang rtogs par 'gyur/ /gsang gnas bzhi
251a7(rgyud 'grel): yang rtog par 'gyur/ /gsang gnas spyi bor rlung dag ni/ /stong dang brgyad brgya 'gag pa yis/ /sa ni bcu gnyis rim pas thob/ /sku ni bcu drug dag par 'gyur/ /thig le spyi bo rdul nor bu/ /mi gnas mya ngan/
251b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das par brjod/ /yon tan thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang sgyur tsam gyis ni/ /sgrib pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur/ /dri ma med par dag par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi phung por gsungs pa'o/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad de/ /rnal 'byor mngon sum yin par 'dod/ /de gnyis tha mar dge bar 'dod/ /de ltar yan lag drug po la/ /lo gsum zla phyed gsum gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste/ /sa dang thob pa zhes kyang 'dod/ /khams
251b3(rgyud 'grel): drug sbyangs pas ye shes drug /rigs drug pha rol phyin drug 'dod/ /mngon shes drug dang rjes dran drug /rlung drug ye shes bla ma gsungs/ /lus gzir 'phags la phyag rgya gsal/ /de nas spyod pa gsum byas pas/ /dag
251b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku bzhi ye shes 'grub/ /stobs sogs yon tan kun rdzogs pa/ /tshe 'dir nges par 'gyur ba'o/ /bar dor sangs rgya'i man ngag 'di/ /'og rlung steng gi bu gar gdon/ /sbyor drug man ngag 'di pa dag /ma sgoms na yang skye
251b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun 'grub/ /so sor sdud pa'i rtags byung zhing/ /gal te shi rab gyur pa na/ /de ni lam dam pa dang 'phrad/ /de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /chags can sbyor drug man ngag ni/ /dbab dang gzung dang/ bzlog pa dang/ /gnas
251b6(rgyud 'grel): su bskyal la rtsa dmigs gdab/ /rlung bsre sbyor ba drug pos bya/ /so sor sdud pa'i spog pa ni/ /drag tu byed cing 'tsham par bya/ /bsam gtan stong gzugs drag tu bsgom/ /btsan thabs sbyor ba rlung bzung ba/ /mgo bo mi
251b7(rgyud 'grel): na'i bar du bya/ /rlung sems drag tu thig ler gzung/ /chags la las rgya mang la sbyar/ /bde chen ro mnyam dag tu bya/ /'di min mchog ni mi 'grub ces/ /gsungs pas nges par 'di bsgrub bya/ /rtog bsgom 'jig 
252a1(rgyud 'grel): rten 'khor gsungs pa/ /bskyed rim la sogs ci zhig bya/ /dus 'khor zhabs kyi gsungs pa yin/ /sbyor ba yan lag drug gi man ngag rje dus 'khor zhabs kyi mdzad pa'i snyan rgyud zhal gyi gdams pa
252a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang/ lo tsa ba 'bro shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag sbyor ba yan lag drug gi dka' 'grel bzhugs so//) //*/ /rgya gar
252a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sh+rI kA la tsakro ba de sha yo ga Sha Dang+ga tan+t+ra pany+dzi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag sbyor ba yan lag drug gi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yod
252a4(rgyud 'grel): min med min yod med min/ /gnyis ka'i bdag nyid med pa'ang min/ /mu bzhi las ni rnam grol ba/ /bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med las/ /'jam pa'i rdo rjes phyung ba yis/ /sku rnams bzhi yi don
252a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa/ /mtshan nyid de ni dgrol bar bya/ /shes rab thabs min zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/ /'dir shes rab ces bya ba ni cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid dkar po'i phyogs so/ /nag po'i phyogs ni zla ba'i cha zad pa'i phyir
252a6(rgyud 'grel): na thabs so/ /de ltar dkar po ni mtshan mo ste/ /nag po ni nyin mo'o/ /de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni shes rab las kyang ma yin no/ /thabs las skyes pa yang ma yin no/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'di lta bu zhes bya
252a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul lo/ /de ltar yod pa min te/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi bde ba zad pa'i phyir ro/ /med pa yang ni ma yin te/ /skad cig ma dang po'i dga' ba'i cha'i dngos po ni nag po'i phyogs med pa yin no//
252b1(rgyud 'grel): yod med min te/ 'di dag gnyis ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir/ /gcig tu 'dus shin lhan cig byed pa med do/ /gnyis ka'i bdag nyid med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs mar ngo dang/ /nag po'i phyogs mar ngo 'di
252b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka la yang cha rtogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba med do/ /de ltar mdza' bzhi yongs su rdzogs shing dag pa'i cha bcu drug ma ni stong pa nyid rnam par mi rtogs pa spros pa dang bral ba gzung 'dzin med pa'i chos can de ni mu bzhi
252b3(rgyud 'grel): las grol ba ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i skur brjod do/ /bde chen sku zhes bya ba ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin su la yod pa de ni he ru ka yin te dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni de lta bu su la yod pa
252b4(rgyud 'grel): de la ni lus kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang/ ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /des na shes rab ni rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams la bzhi pa zad pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar na shes rab ma grub pa'o/ /
252b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi skur ni 'gyur pa ste/ /shin tu gnyid 'thug po log pa zad pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang shes rab dang ni thabs kyi rang bzhin
252b6(rgyud 'grel): nges par mun pa dang bral zhing/ /ye shes dang rnam shes dbye ba nyid ces bya ba la 'dir ye shes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i 'dzin pa'i sems so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzhan gyi sems gzung bya ste/ /de'i phyir shes bya ba'i mtshan
252b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /de ltar 'dzin pa'i sems ni shes rab ma ste/ rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thabs kyi sems ni kun tu rtags pa'i snying rje'i mtshan can no/ /de'i phyir 'dzin pa dang gzung ba'i
253a1(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba de yis shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin ni gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i chos kyi sku ste/ de yang lhan cig skyes pa las byung ba'o/ /de ltar rgyu mthun pa'i bde ba ni lte bar lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor
253a2(rgyud 'grel): lo ni rnam par smin pa yin te/ der ni chos kyi sku'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /sgra brnyan dag ni lta bur ni sems can du ma'i don mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir lha'i mig gis
253a3(rgyud 'grel): gang dag 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta du 'am/ chu'i zla ba lta bu dang gsal ba gang mthong ba de las sgra 'byung ba'i sgra brnyan de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes rab kyi ngo bo lha'i snyan gyi rnam par
253a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa ni 'dzin pa ste/ sgra brnyan ni gzung bya'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i grangs shes pa ni che ge mo'i rtogs pa dang/ che ge'i mo'i dus dang/ che ge mo'i zla ba dang/ che ge mo'i phyogs dang/ che ge mo'i nyi ma la
253a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la che ge mo 'dir 'gyur zer ba ni/ /de'i sems can so so'i skye bo rnams gdul bar bya ba yin te/ /de ni rmi lam gyi gnas skabs zad cing med pa'i phyir ro/ /mgrin pa la skyes bu byed pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ /
253a6(rgyud 'grel): steng na gnas pa'i sa bon can rnams la yin gyi/ sa bon med pa rnams la ni ma yin no/ /sems can rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du slar yang 'di ru 'gyur ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/ /longs spyod
253a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid de/ gcig dang du ma sems can rnams kyi sprul pa du ma mthong ba'i phyir du ma'o/ /de ltar gcig dang du ma'i
253b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ni don dam par ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu ni gcig dang du ma 'gal ba yin te/ de yang sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa'i phyir dpral ba dri ma med pa'i sprul pa ste/ de yang gzugs rnams
253b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la sna tshogs kun tu bde ba ston pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni nor bu rin chen tog ces bya'o/ /de ltar lhan cig skye pa gcig pu la ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang/ chos kyi sku dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sprul pa'i sku ste sku re
253b3(rgyud 'grel): re la yang bzhi bzhi'i bdag nyid can no/ /de nyid thams cad kyang sngon du brjod pa de nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'di gcig pu dus mdza' i sprin dang 'dra ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dral zhing med par byas nas he ru ka ru gyur pa ste
253b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni mi 'pho ba'i chos kyis nyams su blangs pa'i rnam par shes pa la de bzhin no/ /he ru ka zhes pa ni drag po rnams ni smin par mdzad pa'i don du rdo rje sems dpa' phyir spro ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de yang rmongs pa rnams smin
253b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba 'am/ dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ de'i don go bar bya ba'i phyir ni/ de yang dam tshig rgyal po sogs zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa ste de bzhin no/ /rin chen 'dzin pa de nyid sdug
253b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa'i don du rin chen 'byung ldan gnas gyur pa ste/ mi 'pho ba'i chos kyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa yis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'phrog par byed pa zad par byed pa'i tshor
253b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bde ba de gzhan ma'o/ /de yang pad+ma 'dzin pa chags bcas rnams kyi chags pa'i rgyur zhes bya ba ni snang ba mdza' yas su 'gyur ro/ /de yang snang ba ni sems bde ba snang ba'o/ /mi 'pho ba'i chos kyis gang 'pho ba'i bde ba
254a1(rgyud 'grel): ster pa'i 'du shes te don gzhan ma'o/ /de yang bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don du ni phyag rgya pad+ma ral gri 'dzin don yod grub pa ru ni 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mi 'pho ba'i chos kyi 'du byed rnams te/
254a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnams gang sgrib pa med pa sems su byed pa'i phyir ro/ /bdud la sogs pa'i sgrib pa rnams gzhom par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa phung
254a3(rgyud 'grel): po lnga dag pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'o/ /de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis par gsungs so/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te/
254a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po 'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor gyis dngos grub bsgrub pa ni 'dod khams gyi lha drug tu skye ba dang/ ral gri dang/ mig sman dang/ rkang mgyogs dang/ ri lu la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgrub na 'grub po//
254a5(rgyud 'grel): yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang nA da la sogs pa rtogs pa can gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis ni gzugs kyi lha bcu bdun du skye bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pas thob cing thun mong
254a6(rgyud 'grel): gi dngos grub bsgrub pas 'grub pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i yin gyi/ de rnams ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ni ma yin no/ /zhes phyag na rdo rje'i bstod 'grel dang/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi le'ur bcom
254a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don du gsungs so/ /drang ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kha cig tu bskyed pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas par 'gyur zhes gsungs te/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa rmongs pa mi shes
254b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la drang pa'i don tu gsungs pa yin te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang rab byed du dbang bdun po 'dis sa bdun po thob ces gsungs pa ni byis pa rnams 'jug pa'i phyir yin te/ nges pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das
254b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni ma gsungs te/ de yang dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud kyi ye shes kyi le'ur zad par sa la sogs pa bzhi bsgoms na brtan pa thob na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lhar skye bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i
254b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs su bstan to// //da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sbyor ba yan lag drug bsgom par rgyud mdza' dag tu yang
254b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs la/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bstod 'grel du yang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dkar pos 'grel pa dri ma med par grags par yang rgyas par bshad do/ /slob dpon zla grags kyis sgron ma
254b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar yang bshad de don go bar yang ma gsungs so/ /de yang 'grel pa dri ma med pa la brten nas sbyor ba yan lag drug rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ de la dang po so sor spong ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
254b6(rgyud 'grel): pa las so sor spong ba ni mig gi dbang po yul rnams las log pa'o/ /rna ba'i dbang po sgra rnams las log pa'o/ /sna'i dbang po dri rnams las log pa'o/ /lce'i dbang po ro rnams las log pa'o/ /lus kyi dbang po reg bya 'jam
254b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsub rnams las log pa ni so sor spong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /'dir so sor spong ba'i sgra ni dang po'i las can gyis rnal 'byor pa 'am/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi spyod yul yin zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de yang rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya
255a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni shes bya thams cad 'dzin par byed pa/ ye shes kyi phung po yin zhes brjod do/ /de yang ye shes kyi phung po'i yul du gyur pa'i mtshan ma'i dbye ba rnam pa bcu gcig gzung bar bya ste/ de yang dang por
255a2(rgyud 'grel): so sor spong ba'i dus su du ba lta bu dang/ gnyis pa smig rgyu lta bu dang/ gsum pa nam mkha' gsal ba lta bu dang/ bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang/ lnga pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu rnams ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi mar gsungs
255a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ de lnga ni so sor spong ba'i mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas de rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni so sor spong ba dang po'i bshad pa'o/ /yang so sor spong pa gnyis pa ni nyin mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas mtshan ma rnam pa drug 'byung pa
255a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /dang po 'bar ba lta bu dang/ de nas zla ba shar ba lta bu dang/ de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta bu dang/ de nas 'ja' lta bu dang/ de nas glog lta bu ste/ de la sgra gcan 'dzin lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni phyi rol sngo bsangs
255a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mdog dang 'dra ba zlum pa'o/ /de'i nang du dur ser du gnas pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba lta bu snang ba cha phra ba/ 'chor ba/ 'dar ba/ gzhig par dka' ba'o/ /de'i nang na thig le lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'od zer 'phro ba lta bu snang ba ni 'od
255a6(rgyud 'grel): zer lnga'i tshogs gnas pa'i che chung skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du rnal 'byor pas mthong ba ni thig le lta bu ste/ de ni so sor spong ba gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o/ /da ni bsam gtan bshad par bya ste/ de la bsam gtan zhes bya
255a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni dmigs pa'i yul de nyid la sems mi g.yo zhing mi ldeg par gnas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'o/ /yang bsam gtan gnyis pa ni de ltar bsgoms pa'i dbang gis de ltar yang mthong ba'i dbye bas brtags pa ma yin pa'i
